1b1(dkon brtsegs): rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya ba las le'u bcu drug pa ste/ 'phags pa
1b2(dkon brtsegs): yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba de kho na nges par bstan pa/ bam po dang / 
1b3(dkon brtsegs): po/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pi tA pu tra sa mA ga ma nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra
1b4(dkon brtsegs): bod skad du/ 'phags pa yab dang sras mjal ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen
2a1(dkon brtsegs): po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan pos dang
2a2(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos padus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
2a3(dkon brtsegs): krol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul bdul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ zhi bzhi pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rgal
2a4(dkon brtsegs): 'argal ba'i 'khor dang rgag pha rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa thang la phyin pa zabal phyin pa'i 'khor
2a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa
2a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa
2b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs 'tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig bsal ba'i chos cad sdig bsal ba chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
2b2(dkon brtsegs): reg pa can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pabo sgrogs pa po'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i
2b3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par bsal pa yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ ye
2b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dang ba yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen baphreng dang bral ba bsnyen pa khring dang bral ba'i 'kho
2b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ bzung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo srung sa phun sum tshogs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan
2b6(dkon brtsegs): rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i bden pa gastsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa btsam pa spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 
2b7(dkon brtsegs): / phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid ba sgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ kur
3a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun su rtog pa'i rig pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nang ba sa lda dang pa ma pa rtog pa yongs su chud pa'i 'khong dang kya dag
3a2(dkon brtsegs): byung dag 'alal las kyi byed la grus kya ga nga pa/ lden pa 'al bdun par gros 'i pa la la bangon pa sa po ldan pa/ sems na
3a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam thor grol ba sems shen rnam po gal pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes papa shin tu rnas /  'ges rab shi bya grol ba ning ba bstan pa/ 'dzugs pa
3a4(dkon brtsegs): 'a dang / la nyi /  pa / gas su shA rA/  ga klu
3a5(dkon brtsegs): krod+hA'i kur dga' rab na lnga sde dang / thugs byin dang / char ka da / steng rgyas 'od snang dang / ga wA 'od srung dang / rgya ga 'od srung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / shA ra'i bu dang / por
3a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi phul 'gas pa/ dge slong slong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun che dang dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa led pa/ nyan po
3a7(dkon brtsegs): pa med ga/  nga ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu nab par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/  shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ phung po
3a8(dkon brtsegs): ba ga zhi ma pa/ sre pa na kyi yongs 'das/ pang dka' mas mas pa sun ma/  kyi shi das pa'i
3b1(dkon brtsegs): ba sha lhag dang thabs gcig ste/ de'i tshe na ma gyi thor ngas kyi res la bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas
3b2(dkon brtsegs): zlag 'a med pa na dazhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gzung byar thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzugs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong
3b3(dkon brtsegs): dge 'dun la gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ 
3b4(dkon brtsegs): / dang ldan pa kun shes kai Di n+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal 'de logs su thal me sbya ba
3b5(dkon brtsegs): tud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang mi mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de srid ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
3b6(dkon brtsegs): kyirtse dang ldan pa kun shes kau Di n+ya la 'di skad kyis bka' stsal to// kau kye+e khyod ni zlal bla mar bya ba'ichos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug shig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / 
3b7(dkon brtsegs): ming chen dang grags byin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srung dang / chu klung 'od srung dang / g.yA 'od krung dang / 'od srung chen po dang / tshe dang ldan bi shA ri'i bu dang / mau dgal gyi bu chen pos kyang
3b8(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la 'dis daces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das padag shes rgya po zas gtsang ma mngon pa dang par bkye'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
4a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ maud gal gyi bu khyod kyang blam bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya yin gyis 'dug shig/ de
4a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed sbas te/ de nas tshe dang ldan
4a3(dkon brtsegs): gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la
4a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing dge slong 'char ba 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste 'di lta ste/ dper na khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyam
4a5(dkon brtsegs): bya phyogasu lta ba'i shar phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi brtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'ang
4a6(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA la shar cing dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi
4a7(dkon brtsegs): po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge
4a8(dkon brtsegs): 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lci yin gyis/ khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang
4b1(dkon brtsegs): bya bar dad pa skyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas tshe dang ldan pa maung gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po rigs na
4b2(dkon brtsegs): de dang par bya bar shin tu dka' ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni lhag par dka'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bos nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba ste/ tshe dang
4b3(dkon brtsegs): bi mong gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na shi ba zur btsu / nyi shu'am/ sum cu 'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shi bzur ba rgya yang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing skam
4b4(dkon brtsegs): bang du lon pa zhig yod la de la me la la zhig gis me btang na me'i phung po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar zhig gis gtor na ma'i phung po de bas ches
4b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'bar te/ de'i steng ngam drung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin du dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka'
4b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa song gal gyi bu chen po 'di la ste/ de yin glang po chemache ba can la gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin du dka'o// tshe dang ldan pa maung gil kye bu chen po de bzhin
4b7(dkon brtsegs): po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka'o// de skad ces spras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa maudang gal gyi bu chen pos tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras pa
4b8(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bya bar nus po zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing ba
5a1(dkon brtsegs): yin no// smu stsu / tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi chen po com ldan 'das kyar 'dag ga la po sa rgya ma dang par byed par dgongs pam/ smras pa/ sadang / 
5a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'chang ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka de rgyal po thas gtsang ma dad par byed do nas dgongs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyisatshe dang ldan pa
5a3(dkon brtsegs): cher gal bka' stsal pa// 'char ka rjel po zas gtsang ma dang par gyi ba shig/ de ci'i phyir ne na// 'chang gargyal po zas gtsang mad yang dngas dad par bya yi/ yang na khyod kyis dang
5a4(dkon brtsegs): / 'chang ga pa'i nyan thopa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na khyod ni 'di ltar rig ma drud par byed pa mchog lan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis do'i mtshe dang ldan pa 'char kAl
5a5(dkon brtsegs): gas su bcad de bka' stsal ba// 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rigs rnams dga' ba skyed pa yi// rgyal po'i dam
5a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab tu dad par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dad par byas nas ni// rigs su lgad gdang ni ba rnams la// mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi yi dam pa sbyar du dang
5a7(dkon brtsegs): byos// daldan ne kya'i bdag po de// mngon pa'i dargyal rtog pa sa dkrug ci gang nyams// de la ngo dbaza' 'brel je bzhin du// bcor 'phrus rtsom pa thams cad pa
5a8(dkon brtsegs): byed pam// yi sa gan gyur papa pa dang pang ba // / da ya nga la bad/ mamra na na kya migs pa bzhin/ 
5b1(dkon brtsegs): nan lha dag shi 'byor shing // lha rdzab 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal po 'de nyams b+hing rje smye thugs 'dod// nga yi rin pa che ni sna bdun dpa/ 
5b2(dkon brtsegs): me ye phun sum tshogs pa bzhi 'o dang // tshangs spyod dag ni rjes bu dran byed cing // sa bdag de ni snying rjer smre sngags 'dron// mngangs 'phrag byed pa'i srin po stab sa cad gyes// ji ltar mi
5b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su non gyur na// bdag kyang me shes gzhan yang mi shes ltar// sal bdag po de yang de bzhin no// ti se'i gangs kyi ri bor bsgrib pa gyur na// de ltar mi dgra blta ba mi mthong ba// 
5b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos 'byung ba'i// mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin du
5b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po des kyang dge ba ye shes so// dper na khrim thab shibs smos pa yi// bud med steng rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin rgyal
5b6(dkon brtsegs): myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snyeng rjer ste sngags 'don// de lta bstan 'char ka thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par rtsos// nga rgyal chal mtshan rab tu brtsal bar/ 
5b7(dkon brtsegs): byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod ma gtogs par srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag na skal 'thun spyad med pas// rgyal po'i sems ni rab tu dad bya bar// 
5b8(dkon brtsegs): gi gis rus pa'i dge slong gang yang med// 'char ka sdod kyi du ba byung ba ni// 'das pa'i duban pa yi bdag 'o zhig/ ming ni bde dang 'phel zheras bya ba ste// sa myong byed pa rnam
6a1(dkon brtsegs): par grags pa byung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnam pa kyis mchod// rgya mtsho'i mtha' mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni/ 
6a2(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des kyang bsgyangs// grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dag dang shed las skyes
6a3(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong dum tsher ma rba shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu klung 'ab
6a4(dkon brtsegs): bde bas rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyub ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun du bslabs// ngan song la mngon nams ni rab tu bcad// de nas sems can
6a5(dkon brtsegs): rbadag gnas 'dod// rgyal po de la bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtse ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros
6a6(dkon brtsegs): ming ni blo gros snying po zhes bya ste// srogs chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na ga nas kyang dben pa dga'/ 
6a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lA yi pho brang 'dra ba'i khyim mchog 'dir// na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzung la spyod ces blas/ 
6a8(dkon brtsegs): dam pa khyod yang mi mni// ri gyur 'ded pa'i rgyab gang sa byas// 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid kyi'i phyir// mams la su kyang myung du smos// srid pa'i 'gro ba mtshan tanam
6b1(dkon brtsegs): bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed// bud med rin chen 'khod dang 'phrogs kyis te// yul la dag 'a zhing mos pa bskyed par gyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag
6b2(dkon brtsegs): de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// dka' thub btang zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag ru gcig khyod la bstabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgya
6b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khyed dang mthun// rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra ba yi// gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'dral
6b4(dkon brtsegs): raphyin pa// rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang grul mkhas// bsnyen bkur snyams shing yon tan yid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni pad+ma'i lom 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdog 'dram chu mdzes yid du
6b5(dkon brtsegs): so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // dpral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa sdug/ bad+ma ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra// phrag po shas rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan/ lag dang
6b6(dkon brtsegs): bzil ni zangs kyi mdog/ sor mo byin pa phra bar lags dang ldan// lce ni bangs ma dge 'dra ba srab cing dag/ tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// son thags bzang po rnams
6b7(dkon brtsegs): da mche bar rab dkar mchog gi rkyen dang ldan// ltob phyeng der 'dug cing lte bsdug/ sA zlar langs shing rked pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra dang // mda' rgyu snying po legs
6b8(dkon brtsegs): / khrims pargya kya na 'du bra yang thar// gnang du ma sems yi kyis spyad pa tha// ce ba 'did cing dpal pa'adang can// gnon du c-ing ji stos la
7a1(dkon brtsegs): byo'o//  me / snod dang du med 'di dag gi// mdog 'azang ba dang dang la bab pa yang// shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin srung gis// nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsnyen par
7a2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros snying po ldan des sme ba yi// pa dang 'khor rnams kud la 'di skad smras// yab cig khyod ni ba 'arang gsung ba lags// gang dag tshig gis grag pa pa ma smad mdo// yon tan
7a3(dkon brtsegs): dpal la bos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan pa bang pa rgyal po gson// de ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag/ sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson// sa yi bdag pos
7a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tud med// long bamal
7a5(dkon brtsegs): ci yi rgyu zhig gis// myong ba'i tshig gis lam grol 'dzin par 'gyid// thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgon med chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol bu ji lta bur na
7a6(dkon brtsegs): ba yi// tshig gis btson du der ni 'jug par bgyid// sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam dang gnas la 'dod pa sbyang bar bgyid// sa 'dag 'dod pa rnams la
7a7(dkon brtsegs): bcas shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gi chus khyer ba// long brgyas khyer brtson rar gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam bgyid// mi yi bdag po khyod ni
7a8(dkon brtsegs): long ba bzhin// bdag nimi gcan khyen par mthong ba lags// khyod na 'dod pa'i chuthos khyed bapa lags// bdag ni 'dod pa nams las rnam par spyod// 'dod pa dag ni drug la
7b1(dkon brtsegs): lom bzhin// srul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa se// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri ma dung zung 'dra// me yi phung po shin tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// skyes
7b2(dkon brtsegs): 'don pa'i pa dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag lam bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi lpags rnying rjes pa ci 'di dang // ngar sna'is par byas
7b3(dkon brtsegs): 'i thal ba bzhin spangs te// blo gros snying po ldan pa tshogs med par// sdig drang rnam par bral te rab du klung // gzhon du de ltar rab tu byur gyur nas// blon po'i bus zhig rjes bu rab myong ba/ 
7b4(dkon brtsegs): de ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni// grogs dang bcas pas mngon pa
7b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa lnga// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na// pi yi seng ge de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya'i phyir// tshangs
7b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khro la rob tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gzhon tu rab tu byung bas // rade bu lam dang gyur pa dang // zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad pa'i tshig gis dga'
7b7(dkon brtsegs): bAchar ka khyod ni de la jig ma sems// de sh+lo kras snying po gzhan pa la// nga nyid de yi ldan dar gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'gyur ka spyod dede pa snyam
7b8(dkon brtsegs): sems// bden pa 'phel ba gzhan ni g.yon ma ma// ma bdag zas gca di nyid dam tshe// rgyal po bde pa 'phel nes kyir gyur// 'chang gipyod na des rgyam mas/ 
8a1(dkon brtsegs): su rab byung zlas khyer gzhan sum 'am// khyod nyid de ci ye dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas na 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir/ 
8a2(dkon brtsegs): po zas gtsang dang ba myo na kyid cing // sa sbyang byed pa 'did dung byung ni// skyed pa chen po phun pa myi tshogs par 'gyur// de nas che dang ldan pa char kas bcom ldan 'das
8a3(dkon brtsegs): smra bar khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das napa snga dro'i dus kyi tshe chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong
8a4(dkon brtsegs): na por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas ga tsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na shAkya snong tsam zhig dang / dgos pa zhig gi ched du dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kya
8a5(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing / ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shang n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab
8a6(dkon brtsegs): bas bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu da khyim na gnas na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mtha' ba nyid rnam par rgyal ba/ cho
8a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa/ chos kyi rgyam po rin po che sde bdud dang ldan par 'gyur to// de'i rin po rgya sna bdun 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po ma dang / glang po rin po che dang / te rin po che dang / 
8a8(dkon brtsegs): na pa cadang / zung med rin po med de/ khyim bdeg rin po dang/ blon pon 'ad// la du palag/ dul po dag/ yan lags chog gi gzugs dang ldan pa
8b1(dkon brtsegs): sde rab tu 'dom pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur bzhag/ des gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing mtshon gyis 'da' ba med la mnyam ste/ mi mnyam pa med ci
8b2(dkon brtsegs): dring bathun pas legs par bab nas bskal pa rdzogs par bskyangs par 'gyur bzhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing
8b3(dkon brtsegs): rim gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po yang rnyed par 'gyur ba zhig na da ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu
8b4(dkon brtsegs): nga bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des de snyam du bsams nas shAkya rnams la bsgo ba/ nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur
8b5(dkon brtsegs): kro shig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na de'i lus la gnod pa'i cha dpas bcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas kyu
8b6(dkon brtsegs): nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rkyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas tshe dang ldayu ba 'chang kag kha ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang
8b7(dkon brtsegs): bar mgu bar byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kabyon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga'
8b8(dkon brtsegs): sa dang ldadon pa/ bde bar bzhugs pam/ mi bdeb ma mnga'a'am/ de le gsang brtse yang ma mnga' 'am/ com ldan 'das bdi bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ ba mas
9a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'ang kas shA tso'i bu dgan pan banan la 'di nad ces smras so// dga' ba'i bzhin de bzhin du/ 
9a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la skur mi mnga'o// spobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga ba che yang mi mnga'o// bde bar byon te// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms rjes
9a3(dkon brtsegs): brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas 'khor de nas
9a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur sbyin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char dbyon pa legs la/ 
9a5(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig nas byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ stob pa dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga'
9a6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ de la nyam dra ba ce yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin du ma mi nyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'am ba rgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 
9a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'char kas shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sadal 'di skad ces smras so// shin du lags par sang de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la snyan mi mnga'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde ba
9a8(dkon brtsegs): so// mi bde ba mi mnga'o// de la nyam ba ce yang me ma nga'o// bde bar byen to// mnyal ba med do// bsad snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya le bu mya ngan med dang / mya nganas
9b1(dkon brtsegs): kyang tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin du legs par sad gnas dben pa nar khod pa mthong nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song ste/ tshe
9b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par masu par byas nas tshe dang ldan pa 'cher ka/ tur spyan/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka phyin pa lags so//  dang ldan pa'iH rAkra stA kyang ring shigan byin to/ 
9b3(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka badzam ldan 'das la sun me mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan des/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga'i ci yang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'om brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kAs shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral la 'di skad ces
9b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// mya dran mad dang / mya ngan bral bcom ldan 'das la skur mi mnga'o// spobs dang ldan mam/ bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde bri mi mnga'o// de la nyam nga brtsi yang mi mnga'o// ba
9b6(dkon brtsegs): byin to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa
9b7(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par byed de// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad cem smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cas
9b8(dkon brtsegs): com ldan 'das la blta ba dang bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma sa nga'i bul blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur bya
10a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir su yang ma 'gro shig/ la la na gra de la blta ba'am/ bstan bkur bya ba'i phyir song na lus la gno pa 'chang bas pacad da nas bka' stsal to/ dubs na 'phags
10a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am bsnyen bkur byed du 'dod par mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ 
10a3(dkon brtsegs): ma N+Dal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni shin du yang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'o na btang bdag gis rnamal
10a4(dkon brtsegs): la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing tal bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil po dkrung bcas te rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka
10a5(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ sems mnyam par gzhag pa des nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas bar snang la skyil mo dkrung ngaHsa
10a6(dkon brtsegs): rgal po byas gtsang ma gal ba der mang // rgyal pa las gcang mas kyang tsha dang ldan pa 'cha ga tung ring ponas nam mkha' la shing tu la bdun snyed du 'phags te rdzu phrul gyis pang
10a7(dkon brtsegs): la skyil mo dkrung bcas shing 'ong ba mthong nas de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad nas smras pa/ chen bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar bya
10a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod la gang dgis de yang myur du sbyin// bdul zhugs grub pa mthong bar shin du dka'// de skad ces spros pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas rgyal po bas gtsang ba la tshig su ca
10b1(dkon brtsegs): deslar smras pa// rgyal po bdag na khyod kyi sras kye Ta// bdag la chos dgos rgyal po gdan bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba shes byal te/ bde bar gshegs pa skyob
10b2(dkon brtsegs): bshos bskur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// snod la me mchog sras mang 'grag pathog/ gze brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang
10b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun du 'od byed mngon par 'bar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun du snang
10b4(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ston gyi nyi ma shar ba na// srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ji ltar nyi mas
10b5(dkon brtsegs): rim non snyed ma rnams// nyin par 'di snong lam med mi rung bya// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod bras kyis// rol gyis man pas mu thogs gzhan mi snang // ji lar nyi ma'i zal non zlab ste// 
10b6(dkon brtsegs): dam mkha'i dbyings nas 'od stong nyid mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras pil mnan mu stegs rnams// nyi ma'i zil nor zla bzhin gsal ba med// seng ge'i nga ro thos nas phra mo rnams// shugs
10b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du// ri sul gseb du byer nas 'khra' zhing gnas// stag gir ro gzhan gyis bzod par dka'// de bzhin rgyal po drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag med
10b8(dkon brtsegs): ngo su steg pa gzhan thos nas// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i tshe phyir byar// gsung pos pas na thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten long ba la// sun dang ldan pa
11a1(dkon brtsegs): mig kyang stsal// snang ba mdzad cing rdul kyang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// bde dang mi bde las gnyis rab tu bstan/ 
11a2(dkon brtsegs): lam dang grol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan/ lam stong skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// dadeb kyis 'alas kyang thang la gron// de ltar sgom pa'i sal sprin gyis ni// sring dang
11a3(dkon brtsegs): gshong bcas car gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal ba gling gi khyon kyi zas// grel la tshor gyi sa ngom pa par 'angs tsha gyi sa rnams pa'i riyul nags// wa dang zhes
11a4(dkon brtsegs): banags tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po spun gyi namar dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyisas mdzes pa// de bzhin ma khas jug mi 'jigs mnga' ba drag// mA 'dres btsa
11a5(dkon brtsegs): tshochos mnga'i sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bu sbal pas rgyal po'i phras mdzes so// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ra// lha'i gnang gyur
11a6(dkon brtsegs): sbrul rnam par mdzes// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi skyes// dge sbyong rgya mtsha'i nang na rnam par 'jog// bde sogs kyisathab brgya byin lha dbang po/ lha'i spyan yang jug na
11a7(dkon brtsegs): bltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byas la'i stobs can zal po'i 'brug bsgrags te// rmugs rje chen po'i smig phreng
11a8(dkon brtsegs): maldan pas// drad pa nyer banag cer rdzun 'daba' phrogs te// rgyal bkru mtshan na mas ma 'pheb // long sa dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrimasar gzer// ting lan
11b1(dkon brtsegs): mongs lha yin rab 'jod dang // ye shes nye zer srid pa'i sred pa skems/  ran tshul thams gzings dang klu chen te// ngan pa
11b2(dkon brtsegs): dang du rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'gyur gnas bsam gtad rlabs// zar pa 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya ma mo bsten par bya// tshul khribs rnam dang
11b3(dkon brtsegs): 'ang thug/ ting 'dzin lom dran pa yal ga 'dab// byang chub yan lag me tog stong pa'i sdod// bdag med grib ldan rgyal ba'i sdong po stan// tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa
11b4(dkon brtsegs): / ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri khrod mug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med slan med spyod yul can// rgyal ba stabs can sa dge khyod kyi sras// thub pam gnas gnas pa rnam par ston/ 
11b5(dkon brtsegs): chog brjid pa'i skyabs bzhud bas// byis pa sa so mu stegs gzhan bsngags te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sa yang 'byen// tshul khrims gter dang yon tan dbyig gis
11b6(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang ba'i ni gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes sdes bsungs zang ba'i spyod yul can// rkyang ba tshar dpon ga dor gtong ba de// dge ba yongs su bzung bas sdug bcom ste// nyor
11b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs ni mdzad dge bsnyed bka' stsol pas// lha dang lha men bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog srin blo gros klog 'byin
11b8(dkon brtsegs): thub pa gnas pa'i mnyig 'bras bu stsol// khyad kyis pani du chen 'jug gasgrags// rgyal bas klas pa/ gang bgam chog pa
12a1(dkon brtsegs): sam ci// bsod snyoms rgya bas 'dren pa mdal pas// de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam/ thang gnas ut+pa la bzhin ma rnyis sam// 'char kas smras pa/ rdzu
12a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam gtan spyod yul can// dgyes shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub bzhi pa'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi
12a3(dkon brtsegs): rnyis// rgyal pos smras pa/ sngon chad rdza rnga nga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra bsnyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med gru yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang nas// da ltar sang na sdug bsngal mi
12a4(dkon brtsegs): byong ngam// 'char kas smras pa// bsam gtan dgongs pas ting 'dzin ni yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs par
12a5(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ che ba'i rkyen 'ongs mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis
12a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyo cing nyal nyal nA// da ltar sun 'ar nyal na cis mi mongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa no// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes 'de bar
12a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dgyes dang ldan pas na// srid med btang snyoms can la mongs mi mnga'// rgyal pos smras pa// shAkya dpa' bos de nag mdun du ba dar// bstan bcos
12a8(dkon brtsegs): mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' byas te// gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na// nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char kas smras pa// chos kyis byung ba zhi sems ldan rnams kyi/ 
12b1(dkon brtsegs): bab thugs mnga' da dag mdun du bdang // ne ba'i dgon par zhi ba bsnyen mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so// rgyal pos smras pa// sngan chad gzhon nu khyim na gnas / 
12b2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar zhim byugs te// rgyal po'i rkyen du 'os pas khrus byas na// nags kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkru// 'char kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab
12b3(dkon brtsegs): glegs chos na rje ba ste// thu pa de'i bkrus gzhan yang bklubs sa// sbrul mog/ dmas dang banas su 'pheg/ rang yang rgal ste skye bo pa ma cher sgrol// rgyal pos smras pa
12b4(dkon brtsegs): gser ci thad pa nor bu'i phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen pos gos mchog pazing po tshon// can dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris// nags chen dgas pa thub pa bu yis brgyan/ 
12b5(dkon brtsegs): char kas rgas pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bza' ting 'dzin bsam gtan rgyan// mngon shes reg pa rnam thar brgyan pa'i sku// rnam grol gan
12b6(dkon brtsegs): mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral grim tshon thogs pa'i// dpa' 'o g.yul du 'ongs pas lus bsrungs te// bla re gdugs kyis rtag tu
12b7(dkon brtsegs): dgab dka' ba// gcig pu nags na 'dug na su yis bsrung // 'char kas klas pa/ bums pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos nabs 'bring g.yog/ 
12b8(dkon brtsegs): yon tan chag pa la ngas pas 'jigs mi mnga'// stobs bcud kyis pa mnga' zhing mi 'jigs brnyes// rgyal bas smras pa/ nga ye bu yi yon tan khyod kyi bsgrus// chos legs spyod
13a1(dkon brtsegs): / rgyu yon rgyas su m+b+ha//  pa sa jug/ du bsgyu / cidang ldan pa smra/ 
13a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpor/ tshogs kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su su dpa/ drang srong
13a3(dkon brtsegs): oM// dge sbyong gi tshogs sten na bsregs na dge sbyong gi rgyal po snyam sa ldan na thang ga// rgyal po chen po 'des te/ da /  la gyi rjem paco gro ma zlab d+ha yong / 
13a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa'i hU~Mr ma tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni snyam mi ldan ne ltung ngo // de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi chags kyi nang ngan 'bugs na lham mi ldan ni lgang ngo// 
13a5(dkon brtsegs): mo chen po 'di sa ste/ dper na nyi ma ni ston ka'i drub na shin du l+h+wam te lhun ne lta de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi rlung du bzhugs na shin du
13a6(dkon brtsegs): basnron sa bye'o/ 'dis kyi/ dper na ring rgyam pa'i ra mtshong ma ma 'dren pa de sam mi sman kyang ngem de pazhi tsam ldan 'dri pang den kyang gcim tho na pa khya sum mi byed/ sang po// 'dis
13a7(dkon brtsegs): dalha'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzang lha'i mdun san gnas na lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'dra de yang dge sbyong gi chog kyi nang na bzhugs na lham me lhan na lha ngo'o// 'di tu ste/ dper na lha'i bu dpal
13a8(dkon brtsegs): thal dang / khri'i bu mo su dgang ldan dang / lba'i bu rab baphrul dga' dang / lha'i buganan 'phrul da ba byed gyur po ga kyinang nags gtum me ldan ni byung mo// de bzhin dupa mo ldan 'das kyang da sbyong gachogs kyin 'khrugs
13b1(dkon brtsegs): dge sang ngo/ di ga sted/ de man me med kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni chas pa rkye khra sto de rlo ma na lta /  na tu com ldan 'das de yang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi da ngang bzhugs na lham me
13b2(dkon brtsegs): lha ngo'o// de nas rgyal po bas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tand sa thu brjod pa di thoman pa 'di snyas du sems te/ 'din bamam ldan 'das de'i nyan pos su bdan 'di slar rdzu phrul
13b3(dkon brtsegs): ramathu chel 'di ltar dbang che bar grags na/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi chos chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun du rab tu g.yos/ 'gul rab tu 'gul// 
13b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rab tu 'phrul/ ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg/ ches ches rab tu che mchem/ kun du mches/ 'u ngur rab tu 'ur bur/ kun du rab tu bur bur/ dkrugs rab tu 'khrug/ 
13b5(dkon brtsegs): kun rlurab tu 'khrugs shing sdang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ba brten par sa la gom pa bdud bor ba dang / steng ge bar snang las chu'i rgyun kyang don pa 'ganyis
13b6(dkon brtsegs): ra ste/ de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang / steng gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs dang / rnga ba'i dang bcas pa byu ba lta ci smos/ 
13b7(dkon brtsegs): thig tu lha thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa da// gang gi tshe btsas nas gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa la brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa
13b8(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu rgyun mi gcod par brtson 'brul btan pa/ yang dag par sla ba/ slu ba med pa la ci sro / gang gi tshe blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bar
14a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ rgal nas bskal bar bya'o nas skam pas kyi spos snyam / des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa 'dam bcas pa de dran nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis
14a2(dkon brtsegs): smras so// blo mchog ldan pa gang zhig ltam ma zag/ nor ba med cing gsung ni brjod mdzad de// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltam par
14a3(dkon brtsegs): ma thag nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya zhes// dgon pas mnyam pa med pa'i gsang brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su nig yid miches// su TI ga rmang lam rmi nga'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi
14a4(dkon brtsegs): trag ni nam yang ma gsungs te// ji skad gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar ma nus
14a5(dkon brtsegs): shing // gang zhig chags la rnam par 'dras skad pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mtshan rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar ma nus shing // zhe sdang dngas pa
14a6(dkon brtsegs): las ni rab 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su ni ga mims// chags par 'gyur dang she sdang rmongs 'gyu rabs// gang nig rdul par nus par mgyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang nI ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas
14a7(dkon brtsegs): ba su zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang shig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi chos// rmad du byung ba
14a8(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa brgyad dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mingam pa// de la mkhamapa su
14b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang zhi gang cing dbang tu ya ra 'gyur pa// de la mkhas pa tsunag yi mi ches// don gyis tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// ga shi
14b2(dkon brtsegs): bcing bar nus par mgyur ba// de la mkhas pa su nig sir mi ches// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gur pa// gang zhig grang mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe// dngur rnams kyis ni thub par mgyur pa// deye/ 
14b3(dkon brtsegs): gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir/ gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med tu phyir ring gas spyod mdzad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yod mi ches// byang chub
14b4(dkon brtsegs): dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// ma drug par du dka' thub drag smad pa// de yi gsung la sruni pa yid michas// 'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir// byang
14b5(dkon brtsegs): chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug lon pa'i tha mar chod khu gsol// de yi gsung la su nig lid mi chas// gang la lo drug par du bdud kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags btsal kyang // de la glag
14b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par mgyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang dral gyur cing // su la cung zad tsam yang mi slong la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid ma
14b7(dkon brtsegs): ches// gang shig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzangad bar// rtogs par dka' ba rab tu zhi pa yi// byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas pa// da yi gsung la su zhig yid mi tshos// gang sdig tshangs pa nyid kyis gco
14b8(dkon brtsegs): btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de 'i tshig gsan te/ nyin gyi chos ni ba tu ba gad par// de la gsung la du zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs bkye don gyi phyir/ shA ba'i grang khyerd khyim du byon gyur te// shAkya'i
15a1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pan// da la gsungs sra nag ye mches// rgal bar gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// kun 'thugs dam 'acas pa dgong pa
15a2(dkon brtsegs): dedebadag cag srid pa'i rgyu las sgrol mdzad na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// de dus dpa' de ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de mi dus mkhyer te// 'dred pa dus
15a3(dkon brtsegs): thugs brtse mdzad pa bo// dpe gsung la su zhig che me ches// me yi 'dren pa ye ni sku mchog la// blta ba'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes// rgyal po des ni rang gi sems kyis su// de snyam du ni rjes su
15a4(dkon brtsegs): bsam par bya// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas de ltar ring zhig tu rjes su bas mu nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa/ dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa
15a5(dkon brtsegs): char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshogs su bcad de sbyar sral ba/ rgyal po khyod kyi don du ba lam byas te// khyod nyid dad par bya phyir bdag 'dir 'ongs// byas bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sem
15a6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed na// skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dod// stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon tan chad med ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdza pa// 'dir byon rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang / 
15a7(dkon brtsegs): / grags pa tshad med la ga rten 'byung // khyod kyi phras ni med dbang dam pa ste// stobs bcu thugs te thugs brtse che mnga' ba/ chu khrod padra bzhin chags med par// stobs ban chags med zhugs/ 
15a8(dkon brtsegs): mnga' spyod pa ma dzang // sred pa'i chu bo bzhi las rgal gyur nas// 'grab mang po chu bo che las sgrol// rkang gnyis gtsab la 'jigs pang 'dan gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ 
15b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i zug rdub zho po kun bton te// smad pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byen// gsob byed pa mkhas padam pa'i mchog/ 'dran pa mi mchog la di dad pa skyed// bdud rtsi skye chen dpag med pa
15b2(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yangs man nanas// mchog tu zhi pa'i byang mul ba skyes gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang ba skyed// 'grob dkrol zhing chos kyang bstan padang/ 
15b3(dkon brtsegs): bede ni bami la bshad ga/ sol zhes// mi dbang la ni ska dbang gsol 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchogs ni dad bskyed// phas kyi rgol bIHkra na mra zi la mnan te// ston pa dpagayas la
15b4(dkon brtsegs): rab bskoran nas// sems cad bye ba tshad med 'dras mdzad kyis// 'dren pa me mchog la ni dadra bskyed// dub dag spyan mnga' de ni 'gro ba dgra sa mun pa rab ribastug pos pasgrims pa yis/ 
15b5(dkon brtsegs): nga rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs pa// rga ri med mchog mi la spyon mdzad cing // 'tshe med gnas
15b6(dkon brtsegs): na'adon mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la de dad pasbed// me chen gsum gyis bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshogs la srin chen char pa bzhin// bzhi gnyil dam pa'i srid kyi
15b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed/ dreg sum drim spangs shing skyon gsal te// dri ma gsum pas skye bo 'grol ma cing // skyoms btsun pa par snang ba byed
15b8(dkon brtsegs): yani dad ba skyed// skyed kun mas pazhin thugs pa bas// stobs 'du thug pa rje sangab ba byas par dag la// lugs sa cus la le 'grom ma sa// 'dun pa mtsha
16a1(dkon brtsegs): slo nga bcom ldan de na mdung sems can 'dul// thugs rje mnga' ba mni'i mdzad cing // rkad pa rnams kyang nyan mongs 'i mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog pani dang rdzu
16a2(dkon brtsegs): bye rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho las ni lta bus rdo la bar// stobs bcu thugs rje ma mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// tshad med yon tan tshogs
16a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang ba'i thugs kyis spyad// yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye ba dang mdad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dang bskyed// nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin
16a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba skye bo dad par spyod mdzad cing // mi yi 'thob rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad bskyed// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yangs dag pa// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba
16a5(dkon brtsegs): su skyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bsal dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dgra ba yongs su skyed// 'jig rten gcol dad pa thob gyur na// lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor/ 
16a6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rgyud spangs ni ba mchog tu 'dod// 'dren pam mchog la ni dad pa da// bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// nam mkha' dbyings la mkha' snying rjes bzhin te/ 
16a7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan mthar phyin min// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa yang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang
16a8(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu yang nyid kyis mngon du mthong // sngon bdag chal nas skyes bu lu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o// zhes dam bcas pa yang rjes su dran nas da
16b1(dkon brtsegs): rna pa kyi ma ldan 'dus kyi sa sbyi rnam nga // de bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dag slong dag rgyam khrims gca tsa ni dge slong 'char gsas
16b2(dkon brtsegs): 'i don gyu//  ma dzin pa nga na gas /  sa gas yo na bdag gis byas rnamasas
16b3(dkon brtsegs): du la gso to// dan ma ldan 'das kyi gapa pa zhes ba kAn ste/  gsegang mi migs so// da rgyal par phag sa ma dpa'abya
16b4(dkon brtsegs): na nga myed /  sa hrI nga ma ga/ da ma mnas maman pa
16b5(dkon brtsegs): na shes gargyun shi ma na ni byug+sa 'i 'jig rten gyi mag klung ga sa tha~Md kyi jig na sa su sa po dpa mang da
17a1(dkon brtsegs): do mtshan ma'i rnam pa de lta bu mdzad pas rgyal po chen po nam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas 'di lta
17a2(dkon brtsegs): dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan bla lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas
17a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas byang phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis
17a4(dkon brtsegs): nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung yang de za bye ba khrig khrig pa rgya stong du mas yongs su
17a5(dkon brtsegs): cing mdun du bdang nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brten te/ steng gi bar
17a6(dkon brtsegs): drize'i tshigs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chem po 'phags skyes po yang grul sum bye ba lag
17a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas
17a8(dkon brtsegs): sa logs su brten te/ phreng gi dang sa grul bum gyi tshogs kyis bag nas thal ma spyod ti/ bcom ldan 'das dang dag slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug pong gyur to/ 
17b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdang nam sngam bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan ldar 'dug pa gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis
17b2(dkon brtsegs): lamig pa phyag baphyogs pa/ kye gi ba gas bzhis lal ma sa'i na da skye shi na ngan dug pa / 
17b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu byedab khrag khrig brgya stong dupas yongs su 'askor cing mdun du bdang nas sngam bzhin steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
17b4(dkon brtsegs): dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mtshad cing 'dug pa gyur to// de bzhin du na'i rgyal por ba tha ba bral dang / yongs su dga' ljin dang / rab 'brel dga' dang / lha'i rgyal 'oganano 'phrul dbang byed de
17b5(dkon brtsegs): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i rgyal po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyapa dang / 'bras bu che dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ 
17b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo sa phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la re re zhing yang g.yog lha'i tha bye ba khrag khrig brgya snong dum dang lhan cig
17b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags grangs ris kyang lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug bcu dang lhan cig tu 'di lta ste/ dper na skye
17b8(dkon brtsegs): bas dang ldan pA lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thigs zangs res lha ma yin gyi gnas nasa'i sdang bar gyur te/ bcom
18a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun ma mchod cing 'dug pa gyung
18a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'i rgyal po mdab bzangs brgyad kri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
18a3(dkon brtsegs): bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun du rgyu rgyal po'i khams tha dad pa nas lhags pa bye ba phrag
18a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad du yang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nye ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams ci
18a5(dkon brtsegs): mnan nas ni// nam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ga// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'jom// tog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnanan
18a6(dkon brtsegs): mkha' lnga skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas na/ 
18a7(dkon brtsegs): ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma'i 'odi zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// stong gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cig// nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mtshag
18a8(dkon brtsegs): la yang 'byod// la mi rgyal po dbang pob tu byin ni// dun ci ma tshogs kyis yongs bkang ba// lha ye 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas de// bde sogs kyim thab bye ldar ram/ 
18b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal skugs pas bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun padang stong gsumam// rtog na chags rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus/ 
18b2(dkon brtsegs): narnam par mdzes// lha'i dbang po 'thab bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa// 'tha' bral bzang po lha tshogs na zhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug/ 
18b3(dkon brtsegs): papa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan ngan 'gror 'dod pa zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad pa rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyi
18b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mdzes// lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lha yi tshogs kyis bskor// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu
18b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzo// de bzhin la dang smin tham yang /  tu chags kyis ma sgrug/  dag zam kyis lananan // skyes bri ma gad ma 'jig rten mjog/ 
18b6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po bdag pa rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis munan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na// gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs nas/ 
18b7(dkon brtsegs): las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyi mnan nas rnam par mdzes// lha'i rgyal po dbang rgyu/ dbyed pa
18b8(dkon brtsegs): ni/ lha gnas 'dug cing lha mchog zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i spyod pa dag/ sngan
19a1(dkon brtsegs): smad pas kyi mi 'i la mA nan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi 'arjid kyis// rgyal po de de rab tu rnam pa mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i
19a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su rjod par byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshang ba 'drar gyur pa// dge slong rgyal po dge
19a3(dkon brtsegs): spyo tshogs rnams kyis// mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtas gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon par mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang // lto 'phye chen po dag ni
19a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston par mdzad// bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pos gzhal du
19a5(dkon brtsegs): yang srid// ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' togs mi nus so// rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u kye dang po'o// / de ras tshe dang ldan pa
19a6(dkon brtsegs): ka song nas ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas shAkya rnams la bsgob/ grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni gang 'di dmar reng 'char ba'o// dmar deng shar na
19a7(dkon brtsegs): nyim 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka yang bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges
19a8(dkon brtsegs): par thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grags pa dag srubs na bzhon pa'i mchog rnams spyod de stagan gyis sheg// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring yon bdag cag bcom ldan da
19b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu bltan sdug pa de lta zhing 'dong ngo // lha legs so zhes gsol nas shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams myur du bsnyad do// de'i tshe rgyal
19b2(dkon brtsegs): zas gtsang mas sir skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing bye ma gtsang ma bdal du bcug ste/ nyams pa
19b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / me tog silams gang ba dang / dang gyi lnga ldi dang / phreb ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs bu gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / gyad dang / bum nga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang
19b4(dkon brtsegs): cha spyad dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bzhon pa'i mchog dang chas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ 
19b5(dkon brtsegs): 'iganas kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba ga la ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shAkya la la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad
19b6(dkon brtsegs): na po rnams kyis drangs shing / rkyen rnams kyang sngo la dril bu ga yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 'khor rkyen sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / mod dang / nor bu can gyi nga yang
19b7(dkon brtsegs): ma rgyan can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma bcad pa'i ngas sngon po gyon zhing rgyan sngon po thogs pa'i zhal ta ba rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lhag thogs pa dang / khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa
19b8(dkon brtsegs): lamatshad sngon po bsgreng ba shasug ste/ shing te re zhing yang rkyen sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shA kya la la'i bzhon pa rnam pa 'di sa bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag cang lam
20a1(dkon brtsegs): da du dmar ba dang / thams cad da ga ba nga/ mas ca du kra swAH/ shing ta shing la g+sa nA gra sa na skyes khrag ras pa bar du snyam ban / 
20a2(dkon brtsegs): dkar ra gyi bzhin du yang grang ba brgyad legs kyid kyis 'chan pa/ gisar kyi rgya can/ gser gyi rlabs g.yogs pa gsu gan shems te/ 
20a3(dkon brtsegs): skyed du rin po ma sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ bltan sdug pa brgya khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to// glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyis rgyan gyis brgyan
20a4(dkon brtsegs): ga ma drug brnam pa/ rin pa ma sna bdun kyi rkyen dang ldan pa brgyad khrib shams te 'dod bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bas gtsang ma da / shAH rnams
20a5(dkon brtsegs): yonas 'ong ba gzig nis dag spyong nas sel sprul pa/ dge slong dag byed gang dag gis gnas kyis bskyed mi mchil du 'do bamamathong ba dag gis
20a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas 'ong ba 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams sder bya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsus ci bskyed pos tshal du 'dod pa deng nges
20a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sing s+ya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam s+thA// skal bzas gtsang mi yi khyi mchog de// 'khor dang bcas ti lcer 'od myung pa// de ltar bstan gyis khyed rnam sad
20a8(dkon brtsegs): shing rta brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mangs par smras nas ni// si bya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// 
20b1(dkon brtsegs): na kyang rdzob dang // yang lnga ning sngo ba'i 'khor dang banas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang slom sa// de bzhin gos kyi dam bdag kyang s+t+wa~M// lhag kyang sto nong zag srang rnams kyang / 
20b2(dkon brtsegs): ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mernams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mangs par byas// sheng rta ser zhing rgyan kyang seng ba dang // rta yang sa shing ser po'i 'a
20b3(dkon brtsegs): sa// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang mir po ste// de bzhi dgos kyi das pa dag kyangs / sdug kyang sed ning zag srong rnams kyang sed// dril bu ga yer ka'i dra rnams dang \u0f7fsa// mi rnams
20b4(dkon brtsegs): deser po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sdes bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing ta dmar ning rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // tA yang dbar zheng dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan pa lnga po dag kyang
20b5(dkon brtsegs): mar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam padag kyang dmar// lhag kyang dmar zhing thag srang rnams kyang dper// dril du g.yer ka'i dra bas na pas dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmang po'i gos can te// 
20b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dkar zhing ldan kyang dkar ba dang // ta yang dkar ring dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhi dgos
20b7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing zag srang rnams kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can ste// rgyal mtshan lnga po
20b8(dkon brtsegs): sa mdzes par byas// gang pan zhing kyar yang bzang dang // yang bkra gang bag pa'i labar dang bcas// mamanam lnga ba dag kyang ba zab ste// de nin gas kyings pa dag kyar bal// 
21a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag kyang bkra zhing thag srang rnams kyang bkra// dril bug per ka'i dra 'a rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan khra bo bsdeng bsdam
21a2(dkon brtsegs): byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khri tshang bar bshas pa nas// gser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyar// glang chen rnams ni gser gyis
21a3(dkon brtsegs): par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// shi rta rnams kyi phyi bzhin 'brang bar bshams
21a4(dkon brtsegs): debazhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu yang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis dga' bar brgyan// rgyal po'i chas gos rgyal po 'tsham stabs can// glang po de dag rnams ni phyi bzhin 'bra // 
21a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dri zhim kha dog lnga pa yi// me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lda ldi dag kyang rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni legs par brgyan// glu mkhan garas
21a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang rgyun rnams dang // bus dpogs pa rnams kyis mangs par byas// rol mor me po sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dag la ning rgyal zin gyi bzhin 'azang // rgyal bye ga shegs
21a7(dkon brtsegs): / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rta babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste phyin nas bzhon pa las babs te/ rkang thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su
21a8(dkon brtsegs): bkod cing mdun du ba dang / n+ya gro 'i kun dga' dbar dongango // de'i tsha bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang mar rgyal tsho bar mkhyen nas mi gang lhag tsam gyi steng gi bar snang gi rnam
21b1(dkon brtsegs): la rgyal po zas gtsang sa mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyag chagacing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i g.yas phyogs nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 
21b2(dkon brtsegs): 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhabs 'bring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zhabs 'bring du lha'i rtul por rabya 'ja
21b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab gyis g.yo ba par
21b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngas
21b5(dkon brtsegs): smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis
21b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar
21b7(dkon brtsegs): btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul pa
21b8(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mu da dang / pad+ma dkar po dang / 
22a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i kun du bas ska dang rkyen 'dag/ lta ma kyi skyes rab 'thor bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba phyir gaSha mam sem stan dang / rgyu
22a2(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang steng gi ba snang las sgra 'dren par gyur to// mi'i las 'das pa'i sgra'i ngaro yang seng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi chang zam thim yang 'bab 'dagyur d+hi/ 
22a3(dkon brtsegs): me tog ut+pal dang / lce'i tsan dan gyi bu ma'i char yang bab par gyur to// ngan sa de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gad mngon par mdzadapas lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig
22a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar zung ba de la bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par mdzad do// de nas rgyal ba zas gtsang sa pa lha de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa yang mthong // lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal
22a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das ga
22a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i tshe 'di skad du ngal ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang bar 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni song gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang mi'i nang du chos
22a7(dkon brtsegs): dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du bad/ bcom ldan 'das ni yung
22a8(dkon brtsegs): du sbyar tos so// danas rgyal po thos gtsa mas bla zhes phyags gcig sul gas te/ bum mo g.yas pa'i gangs la bcugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyin bas la phyi khyis
22b1(dkon brtsegs): tshig 'din danas smras so//  ldan da ma mtha tu sus kya rten pa rtson pa lags dun bathud de/ phyogs 'di gamigs nam gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'am
22b2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'dig na na ga so// nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / zhi ba dang / bachibam tha nga byung ba gis gsungs pa de'i mo yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyin pas gnyis la mgo bas sa
22b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil ba la bzhugs pa'i tshe nyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi skum pa
22b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// nga yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang lan gsum du
22b5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo zhes smos nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod ba ltams nas// sa chen 'di la gos pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten dani mtshag
22b6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen shing ba'i grong bzhud tshe// 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pam btang zhing // lha bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur ba/ 
22b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// da yang 'di ga khyod la lan gsum du// sgrub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal lo// thugs rje rje mnga' lha mis mchod pa gas// khyod 'dra 'jig
22b8(dkon brtsegs): mchis lhag ci smos// mtshan ni don grub lags shes sngon 'arjod pa// pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags// khyod kyi bas mardzogs 'dud rtsi ba rnyes pas na// don grub lag
23a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ngagadod 'tshal// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis na 'tsha bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge 'a khre lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa tu chog
23a2(dkon brtsegs): pu spel ba bshams sa// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' bar yang lnga'i yid bzhin gyi sa ras bcos bus log par bting ngo // steng du yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i bla
23a3(dkon brtsegs): bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdan khri bshams pa la bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma yang 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zha
23a4(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te bar
23a5(dkon brtsegs): sdang la 'khod par gyur to// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser sku nas bya grong khyo dam pa y-i// n+ya gro d+ha'i rab nyams dga' bar// rgyal po zas gtsang de dang gang ni
23a6(dkon brtsegs): rig rten sa gon po phreng ba 'i che// bye ba mang po dag ni 'du ba te/ wa ma yin dang mkha' ldi dbang po dang /  chog rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang // dri ba'i rgyal po rnams kyang 'dul
23a7(dkon brtsegs): b+hu// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'amache'i tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin ga
23a8(dkon brtsegs): mas su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'dagasal ba dang dag rgyas padag da // 'bram bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsar 'das// dge slong pa
23b1(dkon brtsegs): sa pa/ gas kun bang ga/  zang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis/ 
23b2(dkon brtsegs): da po zas gtsang de yi sems// yongs su smin par bya ba 'don gyi phyir// de la tshen 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnam
23b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su tshas par mngad// nga ni rgyal brgyal po zas gtsang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan pa bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyod rnaMs bdag rtse
23b4(dkon brtsegs): yi// rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung shig ces stan gsol pa// gleng bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sbyar ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis
23b5(dkon brtsegs): rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur// 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste// gling ba ni dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal cher 'gyur/ 
23b6(dkon brtsegs): me yi bdag dang mi yi mched par 'od// lce 'an chos mchod 'gyur zhes gsol ba btab// de nas de tshe byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa byeg khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu
23b7(dkon brtsegs): den pa'i tshig sbas kyis// rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis// bdag la sgrub mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lha'i tshul las rgyal po
23b8(dkon brtsegs): po khyod// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mir// rgyal po chen po sngon tshe byung ba ni// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyi
24a1(dkon brtsegs): dus la doni khron pa'i dang du lkung // de la yon pa'i dang ni duskal gyis// rtsa ma'i duskal gang nas 'dir yongs lnga'o// nga mi zi tsam skyes pa 'acang pa'i phyir// snang du
24a2(dkon brtsegs): shes de spyad smras// blon pa'i nang gi dumyal de nyi la// rnamatsho'i duskal des smras pa// da ni mtsho'i rlabs kyis bkung bku // khron pa 'ding ni de ring bor bar 'gyur/ 
24a3(dkon brtsegs): na de ni phyir lag song// nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// da ni brags bar gyud ba man// du bral khyod ci khron par gnas 'cha'o// de la khrod pa'i nang gi rgya bral gyis// rgya mtsho
24a4(dkon brtsegs): // na te zan pa 'dims bzhin/ dris rangs spyang du sa shes smras/  ra mo sa/  kyal sa tshigasmras pa// tsha la na / 
24a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya chung zhing shes pa rab tu nan// nga ni lan tshwa tsan gyi chu der bcos// yun ring dus na de na skye skye yang // rgya mtsho mtha' ma shes par ma nus ra// dbus la/  shes pa ga la nus shes smras/ 
24a6(dkon brtsegs): mi yi bdag go da rgya kya // bdag gi btsud thugs nga// gling chen po mamachod 'am kyi ste// khyod kyis bdag le smra snang dbang bad // bdam ma
24a7(dkon brtsegs): por 'gyur// chad pas mi gcad mtshon chas bda' med par// song gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bskyang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod po po ba pa 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul stobs bsgoms pa
24a8(dkon brtsegs): /  'ad kyis rgya cha snang shA // dbyu pang ngag dang // sems ca rnams lathugs kyis na /  sa
24b1(dkon brtsegs): / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod par bya ba'i sems thog par skye bar 'gyur ba de lta ba
24b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzangad do// dedas la ma yid kyis dbyed pa zigs pa pa yin lag khrig phrag d+hag tu dang / sgyum yin gyi bulo khrag thes k+Sha d+ha/ rlu ma ldan 'das pa mchod pa
24b3(dkon brtsegs): thog mar byas te// de nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che'i rin thang yod pa dang / rin zang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir phul lo// 
24b4(dkon brtsegs): rin po che bzhi rdul tsho chen po dan med padag kyang mngon par sprul ba byas te mchod par phul lo// ri po ma lnga bdun kyi rang bzhin cad kye shing ta ba ke khrig phrag drug cu yang mngon pa stsal to// 
24b5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag de ring yang taHnga shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu mngon par sprul te/ ta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdu kyi la bu g.yer ka'i de ba can la ga sas rjed gser las byas pa/ ring po mi smrab
24b6(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i 'phyang ma ba can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgya pa sha stag go// dacang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang
24b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// shing te de dag kyang gser gyi rgyal mtshan can gser gyi rgyad kyis brgyad pa sha stag go// yid pa'id kyi nor bu'i bla de dag kyang srung gi bar snang las shing rjed dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang ba cu
25a1(dkon brtsegs): ge da lu s+ho shi myong lags rkun ma tha dag pa sa ma
25a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i pa ma mo// yid pa da no sa sa ga cag so ga'i ldam napa / gis pa
25a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyi da bu'i bla de'i rkyen de dag rlung gis bstod na mun cing yid du 'ongs mnyan ni bdo ga ga zug 'brub 'a gyu te/ bdig ste/ dper na 'i tsho ba la stan na lag brgyad dang ldan
25a4(dkon brtsegs): bal brang de sgra snyan ci pa yid du'ong ba dpa matan ni 'a bar 'byung ba yin du shing ci'i can dad grangs te'i na de ga dang / yid bzhan cin dza'abru la rkyen de dag rlung gis papyod pa
25a5(dkon brtsegs): cing yid du 'o la mnyada' bde ba sha stag 'byung bar gyur to// shi ha de gaga'ang jug kyang sring 'i bar sngar la dpag tshad drug chubasgrilas te ma rang byar gyur // gang ti dag gi
25a6(dkon brtsegs): yang la m+bu ste kun rdzu la la sag te/  gams mas ma ma nam can ba na da do// sem nam sa la
25a7(dkon brtsegs): phyi lA la ni ro la mo byed/ la lA ni sil sran dkrol/ la la ni klu men la la ni gang byed/ la la ni tsan dan dang su t+pa ba'i phye lal 'thor/ la la chisas ru dang tam che'i tshe
25a8(dkon brtsegs): la ni lum yin gyi rangs kyi sems sa pa/  nig pa sa sos/ ma sa grang ba dang / sred dang bcan podag sa gdas sa can
25b1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par 'byor ro// yal ni gser gyi me tog dang / datshus gyi matog / sa kyi mcho gnang /  rgyam matis dang / sdug gi me tog dang / mu ti ga dmar po'i me tog dang / de'i sgo
25b2(dkon brtsegs): tog gi mngon pa 'ayor ro// mal so ban dang / dbyug gis sem pa bag na macom ldan 'das la mngon pa 'thong // lal di pa 'a dang rgyar 'phrul lo// la
25b3(dkon brtsegs): dgas dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyun dang / sor gdu ba dang / gdu bu dang / gdu gu tham pa dang / dbu can rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyar dang / cod pan dang / gser srung dang / mu ti
25b4(dkon brtsegs): do shal dang / nor bu'ido shal dang / se mo ngas kyu do nga/ mgul rgyan sna tshogs 'am bar gyur to// la la ni mtsha la shri pa/ la na mamo/ na/ la la nin chag du bkor/ 
25b5(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches smras pa/ lA la ni rin po che'i phreng ba gser gyis spris pa/ la ma rde gsor kyang pa/ la la ni gser gyi phreng ba dang / nor bu'i phreng ba dang / mu tig zhi phreng ba thogs sa
25b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni gser gyi gdugs dper dub gyi gdugs dang / baicucu'i gdug sa dang / shes gyi gdus pa dang / sdug zhe gdugs dang / ro'i skyed pa'i gdug pa dang / mu tig dmang po ci gdugs
26a1(dkon brtsegs): la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shes la khod par gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das la phyogs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur to// mi
26a2(dkon brtsegs): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rkang gnyis gcol phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la do rgyu yongs ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la phyag 'tshal lo// ye
26a3(dkon brtsegs): mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal lo// 
26a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems ngag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mnga' zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing tul ba nyid// nges
26a5(dkon brtsegs): gsal phyag 'tshal lo// rin po che'i pho brang gi dal bltan sdug pa/ mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu yang mngon par sprul te/ rin
26a6(dkon brtsegs): 'ipho brang gi dal de dag re re zhing yang bzhugasas khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug rngu yang mngon par sprul to// bzhugasas de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rim
26a7(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// ba gam de dag re re la yang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ palta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
26a8(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig phrag drug cu phru du mngon par stsol to// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkrab bstan sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug
26b1(dkon brtsegs): dgu nu mngon par snyam to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung bram ni dngul/ grul bu dang sgra 'phar ne bai n+d+har+ya/ thes pa dpa ga khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni smug/ ka rba ni mra tig dmar po// sas
26b2(dkon brtsegs): de'i snying po'i rang bzhin rgyan shasug go// dngul mi byams rnams kyi gdung byas ri gsam bral bu dang zh-i par ni b+h+yaH/ thim pa dpas khyer ni shol/ ka byin l+h+wag/ gzhu gas
26b3(dkon brtsegs): sa gzhin rdo mi snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// bai DUd+ha'i khyams rnams kyi gdung byas ni shes/ gral bu dadza na'i bar ni gser/ thom pa dang la khyer ni dngul/ gA pa ni sdug/ 
26b4(dkon brtsegs): teg dmar po// sa gzhi ni de'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha sa ga~M go// shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyu ba ni bai DUr+ya/ grul bu dang sko par ni sdug/ them pa dang kha khyer ni de'i snying po/ 1
26b5(dkon brtsegs): ser/ ka'u ni da pa/ sa gzhi ni mu ga tig dmar po'i rang bzhi can sha stag go// spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyi ma ni rdo'i snying po// gral bu dang sgro 'phar ni mu tig dmar po// them pa kha
26b6(dkon brtsegs): gle 'di / na gi las gzhi ni ban+d+har+ya'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// mu tig dam po'i byams rnams kyi gdung byom ni sug/ gram bu dang skob par ni de'i snying mo// them pa dang 'a khyer nin
26b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gser/ kazhu ni bai DUd+ha/ sa gni ni kaM ke ru'i rang bzhin can sha sug go// rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phywa ma ni mu tig dmar po// gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni mepa/ them pa dang khwa khyer ni drang
26b8(dkon brtsegs): / gtsun gi ga/ mig na ni zhes kyi rang bzhin ni gsug go// byam pa de dag yu yang mdzin ma tho na pam sna bdun kyerang bzhin pa ma yin gyi nga brtses pa ma tshogs pa
27a1(dkon brtsegs): gtsa min de'i steng g.yogs can/ mtha' gnyis su danam babang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// se ng+ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po ma dzu
27a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung bzhin can dag la ras bcas bu sna tshogs 'di lta ste/ gi sa lalas byas pa zhe sa sa srin palas rgya la shen tum ba dang /  'i bud las bya ba gong phras/ shen lpags las byas pa shin tu phre ba da
27a3(dkon brtsegs): ka shi ka las byas pa shin tu phrab bye ba phrag drug tu drug tu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri de dag re re'i ngos gnyis su yang lha ma yin gyi bu mo rkun thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che snga
27a4(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu mo gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob po// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che
27a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dun las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin gyi che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig zag drug cu phyu du mngon par smra
27a6(dkon brtsegs): to/ de la gser gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon pa la yu ba ser po shel gyis smras pa dag btsugra/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spras
27a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzugs/ bai DUr+ya'i khams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po la yu ba ser po shel gyis sbas pa dag btsugs/ shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai DUr+ya gso
27a8(dkon brtsegs): sbas pa dag bcug so// rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai DUr+yas spras pa dag btsugs so// de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni rteg par
27b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mer po rnams me tog sngon po// rgyal mtshan dbar po rnams ni tog dkar po// rgyal mtshad dkar po na pas ni tog dmar po// rin po ma sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan nams na tog rin po che sna bdun
27b2(dkon brtsegs): gsug go// na rgya' ba zung gi pa de dag par sna seM ma mkhal/ lde zhing bcom ldan 'das lnga lanag sa pagad pa byed pa gyu to//  steste/ dbedzin su ga ma kyi sten
27b3(dkon brtsegs): glang pos srung gi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bskyed mos tshal yongs 'dus btol du nye bar 'jog go// de bzhin du pho brang gi dal de dag kyang bar
27b4(dkon brtsegs): snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor babyed do// rin po che'i lo brang gi da la de dag dang / bag med dag dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang // bang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang / 
27b5(dkon brtsegs): khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pa dang / a ka ru'i phye ma'i char 'bab par gyur to// me tog mar
27b6(dkon brtsegs): dAr ba dang / man dang pa chen po dang / sa mAl ka dang many+dzu Sha ka chen po dang / pa bung ka dang / pa ru khag chen po dang mdog dkar dang medag dag pazhin po da / s+thA snar dang / skya sngar chen po dang / skra
