27b7(dkon brtsegs): sde khra bo dang / sku snang bag rten gyi tshe yang mngon pa 'bab par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / bin d+ha dang / shes dang / smug dang / rdo'i snying po dpe/ mu tig dmi po dang/ rin pa
27b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// yid yizhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus lA ma yin gyi bu de dag
28a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po ga dang gang gi char 'bab par 'dod pa de dang de dag las mngon par baba' gyur to// da'i tshe med skya'i granas kyi gros khyer chen po ma sngo mug tu ni dpag da
28a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phang du yang dpag tshad drug khrir l+h+wam yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas byar gang bar gyur to// rin po che'i ba brang ge da la de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba
28a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sder 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po yang mi 'gre bdun tsam du me tog mar drang ba rgyas la dgas gyur to// spos chus kyang rngub tu gyur te/ 
28a4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi spong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rngub kyi dri des khyab par gyur to// snong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems
28a5(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag gis spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni
28a6(dkon brtsegs): spos kyang mi dgos so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thugs zangs rim rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la zhon te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon pa
28a7(dkon brtsegs): gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// byang chub dam pa den du gnyer skad du// skyabs kyi dam pa rab tu mi sprul pa// lhar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba'o// 
28a8(dkon brtsegs): bya la bdag ni skyabs su nye par mche// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs mngon// mog zhung dag tu ltung bar mi 'gyung ba// de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// dpe med byang chu
28b1(dkon brtsegs): tshal ba'i bud // mthong ba'i sdug bsngal dgan pashig sa la nas// byang rnalas da zhin mongs dag sus / 'dren pa gzhan gyi ba mi 'dzes la khyod ma bdag ni byabs su nye bar ba'i/ 
28b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'chibs nyed par gyur pa yi// lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// gang ma rgyab khyab 'i skye ga// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// de nas skas yin gyi dang
28b3(dkon brtsegs): grags papang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i mo he'i rgyan de dgra po shir ti'i rgya de dag dang / lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
28b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan de dag dang / bla re dang dril bu g.yer ka'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing ling du 'ong la mnyan na dga' ba 'di lta bu dag byung bar sbyar te/ 'di ltar dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag
28b5(dkon brtsegs): kyad pasakhas pas sgra snang ba bzhin no// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang / uk+Sha ba
28b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / a ka ru dang / ta pa la'i lo ma'i phyi ma'i char mngon par 'bab par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi blos kyi byem rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshang mngon par bab par gyur te/ lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang
28b7(dkon brtsegs): man dA ra ba chen po dang / many+dzu Sha ka dang / many+dzul ka chen po dang / pa ruSh+Ta ka dang / pa ru 'a chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / s+ya snar dang / bya snang chen po dang / 
28b8(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba sa chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sbrum ze'i me tog sna tshogs kyi cher mngon pal ba ba'o// gleng gi par lda pa la g.yeng dang / dngul dang / bcurgyad ni/ shes dang / sreg dang / de'i stong bdag
29a1(dkon brtsegs): tag dmang pa dang thams cad kyi ma tog gachar yang mngon par ba'abo// lha dang l+h+wa ma yin gyi spos su'i ra yang mngon par bab bo// spos bu'i chang de babangs
29a2(dkon brtsegs): se skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen ponas khor yug tu dpag cad drug tu tshun chad spos chu'i rngab tu gyur to// spos nu'i rdeb kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi srong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
29a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dring tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// 
29a4(dkon brtsegs): de lta lham yin gyi dbang po zags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed pa'i tshe/ bar sdang las l+h+wa ma yin gyi lhangs kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo // sil sran dang
29a5(dkon brtsegs): sras kyang stong gsum kyi sgong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad
29a6(dkon brtsegs): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris kyis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe lha ma yin gyi
29a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags 'angs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir la la ni glu len/ la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi
29a8(dkon brtsegs): / la de tsan ngan dang / u bral dang / a ga ru dang / tam la'i lo ma'i phyel 'thor/ la la 'i lha'i tshe tog sa ma dwe ba dang / man ngar 'a chen po dang / 
29b1(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / pa ru sha dang / bdushA ga can po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / s+ya snar dang / swA snar chen po dang / sgrasnar khra bo dang / s+ya sna ba kra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams du
29b2(dkon brtsegs): gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / ro'i snying po dang / mu tig dam po dang / rin po ma thams cad kyi mi tog nams 'thor zhing bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor / 
29b3(dkon brtsegs): de na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rags dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / sor gdub dang / gdubu dang / gdu'u tham pa dang / dbu rgyan ce gsum dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser srud dang / 
29b4(dkon brtsegs): ga gis phreng ba dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo dang / gya do dang / mgu brgyad snga chags dang / na cha dang / na ma gdug por dang / tshor tshe dgashibs pa dang / mgo d+hanA dang / phreng ba'i lnga lnga dang / 
29b5(dkon brtsegs): / lnga ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la niH
29b6(dkon brtsegs): ma pos sgril pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po ces sgrim pa bkang / la'agasar gyis snyim pa 'akang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro/ 
29b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di lang smras so// gang brteni gang la gnas btsas nA// gang zag mchog la mchod 'gyur ba// de 'dra ba yi grogs byo // rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/ l+h+wam yin gyi dbang bzag
29b8(dkon brtsegs): pa ris kyis nges byas bde bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas na ma rin po ma sna bdun gyi shing tal zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu
30a1(dkon brtsegs): bkar ba rgyad cang chags su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// spobs bcu bcod paden khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jig sa bral
30a2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// chos la ma 'dres nges par thud pa'o// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sun skyong 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor chud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal
30a3(dkon brtsegs): mthor phyer thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba byang ba sgrol la phrag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa'i mnga' zhig/ 'gro ba kun la thugs ni rnam grol te// pang/ 
30a4(dkon brtsegs): yis mi gos 'drab bo// blo zab pasam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid mkhyen// nam pa kun du mtshan ma thams rkang bshig/ khyod di gang du'ang sngon pa
30a5(dkon brtsegs): yong mi mnga'// mi gnas nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang por rab sim gyis ji ltang byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta ba rang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'a
30a6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod nga byas nas rin po che sna dun kyi shing rta bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skong ba byed cing ga per byi dag gis gtir nas tshigs su bcad bdag gis bcob ldan 'das la mngo
30a7(dkon brtsegs): bskyod pa// sa dang bar snang dang ni lha'i yul na'ang // bder gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung na phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'grob smig kyai 'dra bar khyod / 
30a8(dkon brtsegs): ma khyer// 'dir byed 'a tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben// rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi nas bstad// su nig/ 
30b1(dkon brtsegs): de gshegs bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i ngas 'brang ba// de 'dir 'dren pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ldar bstan pa de bzhin yang ltar spyod// nam 'dren khyod la bdag
30b2(dkon brtsegs): skad bsod nams gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa// dge ba'i tsA ba dkun ma lus mtha' dgra 'dir// 'gro ba'i rtsal gyis thams cad sangs rgya
30b3(dkon brtsegs): ma pa gsum pa// lham yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du rnam yin gyi dbang ba stobs ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te rin po che sna bdun
30b4(dkon brtsegs): kye shing tal non nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum slong babyed cing dngul gyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bskyed pa// 2
30b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho rtsa las pha rol rnams rgal ba// rgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pa rol thang ba de 'jig pa med 'jog pa// spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyig
30b6(dkon brtsegs): la gzugs// tho mchog khyod kyis 'gro pa thams cad kun du ma byed// phyin ci log lnga thibs bor rab zhin tho ldan te// 'khrul pa smig tu la bur ma shes byung rnams la// mtshungs pa med pa'i
30b7(dkon brtsegs): thugs je bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad snyam dang // smyig rgyu 'dra zhing mig yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa das pa khyod kyis chos kyis
30b8(dkon brtsegs): mchog bskyed/ sred pa gsum po dag ni mi chags srung pa spyod/ dngob sa log pa'i dadabyung rang bzhi brel ba dang / gzhan gyi dngos pos thong bar med pa byed kyis ma byan/ khyis bco
31a1(dkon brtsegs): blo gros rmi lam dag lta bur// mi dbang khyod kyis sras kyis chal na spyad pa spyod// lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis
31a2(dkon brtsegs): byab bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing nga la non te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskong pa byed cing me tog sa snga pa tha ba rnams kyis gtor te tshogs pa
31a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi mchog khyod kyi sku yi ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zi la mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos pa rjes cu bzhin no// 
31a4(dkon brtsegs): gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyan// gzugs kyis gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnam pa thams cad zil gyis mnan// dper na nyims maM khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung pog
31a5(dkon brtsegs): brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me byin// nyi mas me khyer zil brlag bzhid// ye shes rgya mtsho ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis
31a6(dkon brtsegs): mnan// zi la mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas zla 'od bil brlag bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po zla ga cad kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ ska ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang / @
31a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsul bskor ba byed cing me tog skya sngar khra bos mngon par gtor te tshigs su bcad
31a8(dkon brtsegs): gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// 'dren pa zla gros ni ba po/  ni gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi// 'dod spang gti mug rdula'i mdzad// chang bas rdul rnams ni bgyid bzhin/ 
31b1(dkon brtsegs): 'bar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// thug na N+Did kyis ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing sreg ldang // de bzhi nyon mongs dra nga sreg/ bskal pa bye ga khrag khrig ni// dpag tu das
31b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'a mas da // bdud rtsis lus thugs drug pazhin no// mud pa sun gang ba/ sel mdzad de// sur khung sbed ma 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang rna
31b3(dkon brtsegs): na yon tan bzhin// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin nu lha ma yid kyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin
31b4(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun gyi shing ta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing rin po che'i me tog rnams kyis gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gi bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 
31b5(dkon brtsegs): gdul dka' mi bzad sems ni khyod kyis bcul// g.yul la dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhir// shin tu tshar bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal
31b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom// gang du'ang mi bsnyeng sa mi bskyod bde ba bstis// khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu drug ni ma lus bcom// mthu
31b7(dkon brtsegs): byasas pa legs bsgoms te// khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyas// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros pa shig/ 'gro ba kun du khyod ni bdung po mnga'// shes rab nam grol ba
31b8(dkon brtsegs): sred pa bskams// shes rab nam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnams kun la zhugs ni chags mi mams// thams cad zil panar thub mchog khyod 'dra med// lha ma yin gyi dbang po gas
32a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dga' bas de yar byas pa de bzhin dugs yin byed bang pa mig pa 'angs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas 'a pa ma bdun gyi shing dal na te// 
32a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la lan gsus sang pa da ldan dasal ga po yang yul da tshogs su da pa dag gis pa la'ang 'dis la mngon par ba skyeng pa/ 
32a3(dkon brtsegs): byad byeng ni// sa rnams pang dag mdzan nyid pa khyen// gang 'am sa shes brnya pa yang // dan ba dang brtags chog / ma bya sa// rnam pa dun tu mi dmigs // 
32a4(dkon brtsegs): grwa ba ni chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam pa ces gsungs// mid ni ming gis dben pa ste// mtshan nyid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams mtshan nyid med pa rtse// ming yod med ces gyud
32a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis bshad// rab tu ba shad ces bgyi ba yang // ba shad pa ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang nim bshad cing // su 'a ba shad pa ma mchis so// khyod kyi sras pa mim sto/ nas bya/ 
32a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyad do thub pa che// lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po
32a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dis rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po masna bdun gyi gang ta la non te// bcom ldan 'das lalan gsum skong ba byed cing bcom ldan 'das
32a8(dkon brtsegs): gsas pa sa sa mas ga/ sa byed pa da med /  ni sag shisaso// 
32b1(dkon brtsegs): de 'jig rten gsum namatshungs ma mchis// dpyod kyad de gra la mtshungs ma maHsa// kyad kyig tug na chos skyes bskyed pas pa// zugs kyis pas kyis khams gsum zil gyis mnan/ 
32b2(dkon brtsegs): da pa'i stobs kyis mtshan daphur bu mchogs/ dpe byad dpun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims spobs kyis khyod ni mi bstod do// skye bo mkhas pas so song bsam mi la / dan
32b3(dkon brtsegs): khrims ldan zhing thugs kyang dag/ mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab spobs kyi spyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mches// de ni mi bsnyed sa 'jig rten gsum gtul nas// 'khor dus
32b4(dkon brtsegs): khrung sgra bsgrags te// tog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan// lA ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa bzhin du lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis
32b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ta la noran te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum spong ba byed cing rin po ches snyim pa bkang ste gtor na tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom
32b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus la mngon par bstod pa// zab pa chen po then ni tshogs pa 'dris// dad pa'i yid kyis khyod kyi na la dul// kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres
32b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa le// skye bo bsam pa ji bzhin sa song 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'thung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis
32b8(dkon brtsegs): gsung gcig brjod pa la// 'khor gyis thad da gsung du nam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang don de lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de de rtsol ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mchod// gsung gi gar tu brjod pa mdzad pa
33a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag par mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtog par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// snya ma yin gyi dbang po rnam thar byed
33a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis de ltar byas pa debarin du lA ma yin gyi dbang po btang thung gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas rin po me lnga bdun gyi shing ta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum sgo
33a3(dkon brtsegs): ba byed cing mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// rgyags dang nga rgyal sdig pa'i lta ba spyod pa gang // yi
33a4(dkon brtsegs): dga' rab tu dang bas mi dbang bde gshegs kyi// blol mngon par dga' ba de dag bag mchis te// mtshungs med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di dag ngos
33a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis ma mchis te// rmi lam dga' ba thams cad tshad ma ma lags 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyod ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzig
33a6(dkon brtsegs): skyon ka'i sprin dang mtshungs shing mu'i zla ba 'dra// byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi yid ni mongs par bgyi// gang dag rtag tu bag mchis bde gshegs blo mnga' ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dag la 'a
33a7(dkon brtsegs): nimongs mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rtag tu bag mchis gang // mi mchog dam pa de dag mi dal yod mi mchi// chos rnams thams cad mi lam 'dra bar rnam brtags nas// yang da
33a8(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par gyur// de nas thags zangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi dbang po bya ba phrag drug cu po de dag gis mchod pa 'di lta bu byas nas byang chub la gzhal
33b1(dkon brtsegs): sa zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/ dga' ba dang / yed bde ba s+ya te thal ma sbya nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur
33b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di na sangs
33b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgonas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog sum 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / 
33b4(dkon brtsegs): dkar po dang / le bzhan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dag lta bu dag byung nas de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang bas rgyas par bkang kyi phyir log nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lanag
33b5(dkon brtsegs): skor ba byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub po// de nas tshe dang ldan pa ta thul stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs te/ 
33b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo spang ba bdun nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad da lus pa/ 'jig rten pad bzhed rgyu ni gam mchis par// mi yi seng ge 'tsham
33b7(dkon brtsegs): I mdzadang// drang srong chen po ci srad 'dris pa srungs// skyes bu mchog gis 'jam pa'i sku yang gsung // kA med mtshad ba rgya chen gzigs gyur nas// 'jig da pan pa zhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad ma/ 
33b8(dkon brtsegs): min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// de ring sa yis ngogs med rgya chen sems// 'khor 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur ci
34a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ge 'dum pa mdzad par gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su// mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis
34a2(dkon brtsegs): debazhin gshegs pas gang gi bsamam khyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde ga shegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltang bde ga shegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// sraH
34a3(dkon brtsegs): dpung bcas bdud ni der bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tshom 'tshal ba'i som nyi gcad du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de
34a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba yi// the tshom sbyar te legs par bcad du gsol// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa
34a5(dkon brtsegs): tadz+wal khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis ljon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod
34a6(dkon brtsegs): phyir// lha min rnams kyis mchod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci la 'du chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dadang pa'i yid byas
34a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ri sa dong nas yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag phyi dus rgyal ba mi seng ga// gang+gA'i klung gi byes bye ba snyed// brtse
34a8(dkon brtsegs): bya nas pa rang babral pas// de gamam dmapa 'dun rgyam ma gyu/  bdag shegs phrag phre drun gyi rnams// 'angs can stos byag suM grags pa// 
34b1(dkon brtsegs): don mdza ga// nga rgyas pa'i 'dzin rten 'grel par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dganams ci zhis/ sbyi langs shi zugs sa med par 'gyur// des phyag khrig drug tu chus pa'i/ 
34b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal la mas kyis kyangagasum myong bas// da ga so napas pas pa ma // de da ga yi sbyi sa/  dag s+ho//  med pa na
34b3(dkon brtsegs): smyon par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi tshad du gyur pa ni// bskal ba khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur// chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzang // thub pa dedag
34b4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu ni gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug tu tshor bar ni// rang 'byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'a gro
34b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed kyi skye bo 'dul// dgra las rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur// zhing dang tsho nga chos gnas 'grub pa'ang 'thun// bde ga shegs de dag khrag khrig drug su la// 
34b6(dkon brtsegs): 'a me yongs su smin mngad de// blan med pa'i theg pas 'doms par 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin// rgyal bas kyu min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten pan phyer drang srong
35a1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dum ngan 'dis bu pa par shin grub tu dag/ la me pa bya mnyam pa gnagapas bskum pa zangs med pal pas sa dran ni da
35a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyud de dang dro 'tsha ba dang gyu ba dngadage ban pa gang deka/ mngon par 'du bdad pa dang / dge ba'i cha ba gang dag gis blan myed pa yang dag par rdzogs 'i 'ang
35a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go/ 
35a4(dkon brtsegs): na pa 'od srung chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdage nyed chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas 'di skabs du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po de lta 'u
35a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i zhugs paskyed pa gcig la yang 'jig rten gyi khams gda'i klung gi byes snyed na sems can gang je snyed cil 'khod pa de dag thams cad me'i lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa rnyed
35a6(dkon brtsegs): de snyed du sems can re res bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang de dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la yang lan lon par mi nub so snyam mo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od sru
35a7(dkon brtsegs): na'i ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ ngo mtshar dang dad pa thob par gyur nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshegs su bcad de mngon par bstod pa// thub pa byang chub gzhal ba yi// thugs bskyed
35a8(dkon brtsegs): re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// chang ma mi spyod ma'i seng ge/ de lnga'i yon tan mthar par te// lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa// tsan dad bu pa rang tsam// mi mcho
35b1(dkon brtsegs): mchad par 'os//  yab dge khyad la ni// gang+gA'i bye mches mang ba'i// rgya mtsha rab tu bkang nga yi// gos tu dag gis mchod 'a 'am// yon tan chen pa mnga' ba la// gang+gA 'byor ches yang
35b2(dkon brtsegs): tag tshogs ni rib mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam tshod 'os// rgyal bskonas dang byu ga/ ma ma'i snang po rab capa// 'brum rgyam tsho'i tu skang kyi// mar me rnam pa ses mchod par 'os// ma
35b3(dkon brtsegs): namanga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni tshe rnams
35b4(dkon brtsegs): sbal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' gapyod// rin po cha yi rgyal mtshan gyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig tan khams bka
35b5(dkon brtsegs): yul pa bsam yas mchod par 'om// mi li se ge khyod la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag mad par// gang+gA'i phye mchis mang ba'i// ba dang tshogs kyis mchod par 'os// drang srong ched
35b6(dkon brtsegs): 'ilhag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag bzung dpal gsun du gsol// gal steg ng+gA'i bye snyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig na kham
35b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su// me mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re'i mgo'o yang // gda'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo de dag re re zhing // de skad la dang dran
35b8(dkon brtsegs): la// kha rnams de dag shed// lde dag pa yi gra las nyam sa// gtA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par babyed par bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag slob pa mi bas// khyod kyi yon ta
36a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan bye// pha rol tu ni phyin par gyur// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag legs so lags so// 8/ 
36a2(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pani yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gsheg
36a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i yon tan gyi rdzogs kyang jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung ga byam snyed du ga par du 'gyur te// sems paskyed 'i ra yan tan gyi chags kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ga ng+gA
36a4(dkon brtsegs): snyed kyis bskal pag ng+gA'i klung ga sem srid dug 'di gas kyis che gsu da kyang 'dod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam pa yinas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin ga
36a5(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa spyod pa/  ma las pa dpag pa ra sems na du du nus pa ma nagang rnyed ga pa dag ca pa 'das par pa
36a6(dkon brtsegs): skyed pa gcig kyang med do// sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'bod napas de'ani gshegs pa'i se'as ba byed pa re ren 'byung ngo // sems can
36b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams ni mi zad bste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar ma gang pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems de ni sems can thams
36b2(dkon brtsegs): na pa'i don du byis pas sems can thams cad kyis mtshar kyang lan lon par mi nus so// de ba'i phyir zhen/ 'jin rten pa'i mchod pani zang ring dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub se pa dpa'
36b3(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i sems sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni sems cad 'khor gal gzhol ba 'di dag byang nga las 'das pa la ji ltar gnol bar 'gyur zhes te rang zing med pa'i phyir ro// 
36b4(dkon brtsegs): shegs 'a'od byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnalas kyi don du rang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa da'ag/ 
36b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ bgrang du med pa/ 'phab kyis ma khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gnal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dris na de yin gshegs pa dgra 'dzem pa pa dag par rdzogs pa'i
36b6(dkon brtsegs): pa bana'am ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten la khyed pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i yo ltung ba/ blan medang/ spyang du mi rnams kyi spyon pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dbang po'i tog
36b7(dkon brtsegs): ga rten du blang ste/ dge slong dag de bden gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des seb pa bskyed pa re re ning gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba phyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgo pa
36b8(dkon brtsegs): ra 'ad// de ban gshegs pa dbang po tog gi sangs rgyam kyi ning mang 'jig rten gyi khabs pa gi byem snyed la sangs rgyab kyi zhing gcig su gyu te/ longs su dag ce dang
37a1(dkon brtsegs): pa thams cad yongs su bang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yod med par gyur/ 
37a2(dkon brtsegs): lta 'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to// mngon pa'i ngargyal chen yod med par gyur to// lus dang ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su mdag pa dang ldan pa'i sems cad yod med par
37a3(dkon brtsegs): ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la
37a4(dkon brtsegs): cing gtams te rjes su bstan cing bslabs pa'i phyir ro// de ba nin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi ning den la 'ad pa'i
37a5(dkon brtsegs): can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i 'de' dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni khyim nas 'byung ba'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyis
37a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde 'dang ldan par gyur to/ del la ni blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mde'i dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de
37a7(dkon brtsegs): yang spyod la/ 'de ba de dag la yang mngon par zhedan pa med par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho yang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du sems
37a8(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang bde 'de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di lta'o// dper na bar sdang la rgyu ba'i bya bar snang la yang rgyal de la mngon par chags pa yang med do// dbazhi ga
37b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang bar rtog de'i sangs rgyas kyin mas ngan rnams la yi 'i 'ad bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba mdamangs par 'gyur ba medang/ gnan du yid ba dbang 'gyur bar dag
37b2(dkon brtsegs): ga la yongs su spyod de/ de ni 'di ltang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba del bu 'byed pa'i phyir ro// deci phyir nan/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des smon byang chub sems
37b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa spyod pa'i tshen mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog ste/ dge ba la btsud pas de dag la las gang gis sdug bsngal gyis tshor 'amyong par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med par 'byung
37b4(dkon brtsegs): 'i las de lta bu yod med do// ngem pasaka pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa na thas
37b5(dkon brtsegs): la sdug bsngal yang ma yin// bde ba yang sa yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung bar 'gyur 'di lta bu mngon par 'dum byas te/ dem bsags pa'i phyir rmongs par 'gyur ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal lang
37b6(dkon brtsegs): bde yang ma yin pa de'i 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sengs rgyam gyi zhi den tu gang gi'i sems canade dag dus gyur ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas nyams
37b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// drung nyams su mi bde ba mi ldang ngo // char nyabs su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe sem
37b8(dkon brtsegs): la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyil pa thams cang shes pa sngar du 'gro zhing shes rjes su 'brang ba bsdu par bshad bas se lal can de dag gis kyang byang chub sem pa dpa' delas po sa 'do po 'arnam
38a1(dkon brtsegs): / gdag yad kyilas thams cad shes pa mngan du rba nang shes pa'i rdzas su 'brang bar yong su bgrubs pas la 'de napa lnga sbed pas de dag la sangs par 'gyur ba 'am yad ma dga' bar 'gyur ba/ 
38a2(dkon brtsegs): med// ngas pa rnams sa byu gang gis 'debal ma yin/ thug pasas yang ma yin pa ba 'thung ya do// de sa sangs rgyas kyin ngan sems cad de dag la sdug bsngal ci mong ba 'ang
38a3(dkon brtsegs): ci bde ba yang ma yin sdug bsngal yang ma yin pa yang med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i sem pa can de bzhin gshegs pa des gtams pa dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas pa/ 
38a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de dag 'chag na yang chos nyid la sems shing chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag ste/ chos la thos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis bzag pa da dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // 
38a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dun pa dag / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad du yang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi ning de'i sems can de dag la lang bam spangs pa med de/ da
38a6(dkon brtsegs): phyiphyer yang bas spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spang ba yod pas de dag la skyo ba med do// de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// 
38a7(dkon brtsegs): rngon de dag la 'grer ba'i sdig pasngal yang med de/ den 'di ltar sems can de dge tshol thas cangs mngon pa med pa med pa'i phyir ro// de dag la mi mug pa dang brang ba'i sdug pasngal yang med de/ 
38a8(dkon brtsegs): grang sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i byer de// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ daci phyir ner/ 'di ltar de/ 
38b1(dkon brtsegs): dag pal mas cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i byar ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i drug bsngal ni sdug pa lasas byung ste/ de'i byang de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal yang byed do// sems can de dag
38b2(dkon brtsegs): la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang myi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar ri na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba chu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du ra 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig bu yod de/ 'di lta ste/ mi rtag pa'i sdug 'a
38b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam 'a'i chos ston te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog bskal bgad+hA'i klung gi byas snyid du 'phrogs pa'i tshad sa gsungs pa pying d+ma ba'i sems ca ga
38b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can de dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang
38b5(dkon brtsegs): bum pa dang / chud pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrub pa pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su 'azung ba dang / nyes par bsams pad
38b6(dkon brtsegs): nyebar bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed cig dor bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsams pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas
38b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'am/ sems can de skad yongs su smin par bya bar dus lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal ba/ dge slong dag de la ji sum du sem
38b8(dkon brtsegs): sems nad pa dang / sems dpa' ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems ran de min gi den bya ba'am/ de dag la phan
39a1(dkon brtsegs): drug /  rkyen yongs su dag par bya ba ma/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byab dus pag/ gsal ga
39a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' bul pa/ dag song dag da la ji skad du sems/ dad pa shad pa rasam nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dad pa'i bar dang / tshul khrims gan pa nas nye bar ba sru pra hrI tshul
39a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar dang / thob pa zhan du nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bas pa'i bar dang / brtson 'grus zhen pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi bar dang / dran pa zhen pa nas nye bar bsgrubs pa'i dran pal
39a4(dkon brtsegs): Dar dang / ting nge 'dzin na ni ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab rgan pa nA n+de par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de skad cig gis don bya ba 'ab/ de dag
39a5(dkon brtsegs): phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba sgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can da snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus pa
39a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa bzhen pa dang / sems zhen pa dang / dad pa dang / 
39a7(dkon brtsegs): khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / dpa' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsku'as pa dang / sU
39a8(dkon brtsegs): hral dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi sa sems cad de snyed kyi don gyi
39b1(dkon brtsegs): ya/ dadan parjod pa'am/ dbang bskungs pa'am/ sdug pasngalags pa 'a/ dar na'aphangs rgyas can yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can dasnyed yongs
39b2(dkon brtsegs): par bya byad mi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/  ched 'idus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba dreg dag yin snyam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge
39b3(dkon brtsegs): slong de dag cang me zer ba 'khod do// de'i tshe shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod
39b4(dkon brtsegs): de de bzhin gshegs pa gzi ba du 'phags pa'i rgyal ba ni sa bya ba de ltar bzhugs te 'tsho nang gzham la chos kyang ston te/ der 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'jug par gyur ba des bcom
39b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po dedal 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig
39b6(dkon brtsegs): na gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thul pa sa smyon gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub 'di la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
39b7(dkon brtsegs): dbazhin gshegs pa ga 'i 'arjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyung pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la dpa' 'ang shes na long shig/ de nas 'jam
39b8(dkon brtsegs): dpal bzhan dur gyur pa stan las yang sanyibacom ldan 'a gyu bdi ga zhanas pa ga'i du ba 'gas pa'i rgyal ba 'izhabs la mthopa'i phyug ma ma te la nas zhi bas / 
40a1(dkon brtsegs): la thod per na skyes gru mas dang na bsdum pa mas brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba ma pa bsgom pa gy-i oM mau pal gnon du gyur pa 'jog nyid kyi lam // 
40a2(dkon brtsegs): zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dir gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
40a3(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas 'jam dpal gnyen nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong
40a4(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du lems/ de'i tshe de'i dul na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ca
40a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de bzhin gshegs par gyur to// de ci'i srad du zhen/ 'di ltar btsam ldan 'das ni bsam gyi ba mi khyab pa'i thab ma mkhas pa dang ldan pa ma/ sems can yongs su srid par brtse ba la chog pa mi ma
40a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi ning yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis/ sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnamapa la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par hA
40a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par sman/ rgyal po gtso'o// rgyal ba drim pa/ rgyal ba mchog rgyal bar gyem 'dzo pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid lags pa pa yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par 'arjod // 
40a8(dkon brtsegs): sbas nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshegs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dpa' bon la sa ni thabs mkhas te/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhig/ sems cad yongasu smin mdza
40b1(dkon brtsegs): ra bachen po nam par 'phrul// bye ba brgyad cung rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang // dadung tshig pa'i 'du shes bsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug/ steng gsum thug
40b2(dkon brtsegs): gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag ma dad pas// de ltang thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal la khyod ni kun gyis brtsal// da dung dang po thugs bskyed par// de dang de ni yongs stan// dbu
40b3(dkon brtsegs): du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// gang zag mchog ni spyod par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la chags mi 'da'// khyod kyi gang
40b4(dkon brtsegs): mi khyed mdzad de// brgya byin tshangs pa'i ma byad dang // la lang bdud kyi byad kyil// sems can rnams kyis don mdzad// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtog pa mi nus// bud med ma byad stong
40b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams na'ang gda'// 'jig tan chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma trAs mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi// 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mang
40b6(dkon brtsegs): desan skye dgu 'di dag rnams// gdugs mtshan khyod kyi yon tan 'arjod// la lang bltam pa yang su bstan// la la mya ngan 'dab pa bstan// la la na ni 'khor lo stong// la lar spyad pa snod pa mang
40b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dul ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mgur len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can lus kyang yang ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga' chags pa'i lu
40b8(dkon brtsegs): sems sa pa sa / na sa pa phrus nga // ra med ma pa'i ma pan/  las kyi la/ 
41a1(dkon brtsegs): can rnam par gdul phrad du// 'dra rnam par 'gal ba mdzad// smos pa ba lags sgrol pa'i rdul// nanapa ma la ga ga 'a ltag// rnam par 'phrul ba sna chags kyis// sems can
41a2(dkon brtsegs): ni 'phrul la ma dang// de ltar bas ma yas mgon ngo khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bas ma mi khyab// dpa'i chen gyi la bya zla nga 'tshal// sems can ru cher 'drang gyur cig/ sngon byung ba 'od srung
41a3(dkon brtsegs): chen pos nub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab pa rangs brgyad khri drug slong gas lham yin gyi dbang po dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bathun pa yang thos nas/ 
41a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa
41a5(dkon brtsegs): shin du bkrub bstan sdug pa brgyad khri drug slong mngon par sprul to// lha'i rin po me sna bdud ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang/ baidUr+ya dang / shel dang / sprun dang/ mu tog dmar po dang/ ro'i hrI
41a6(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dun no// khang 'a brtsegs pa de dag kyang rin po sna bzhi'i lan kan gyi drab ris bkra'o// baildan sdug pa ma pa bdun gyis kun nas ban so// rin chom ldani ni 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngus dag rje
41a7(dkon brtsegs): / shel lo// gser kyi la na kun rnams kyi ka ba de/ gdang zhu rnams ni gsapa/ shar 'arnams ni ngul// dngul kyi lo gan rnams rtseg/ sa dang gdang dunam sa ni dngum/ shas rnams ni gse
41a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyig pa dang gdang kun 'i rje/ shar 'dams nigs/ nal bye la dgar rnabs byeg pa dang gdang thun mas ne zhes/ shar ba rnam la ni dbul la sa byab pa'o// khang pa rtsegs pa de dge
41b1(dkon brtsegs): ka yeng ka'i drab bgrang blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun dam bskor to// de dag kyang rin par sna bdun las phyum pa da stag ste/ 'di ltar gaper dang / dngul dang / bai DUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dam
41b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / dang snying po dang bdun no// 'ang sa brtsegs pa de dag rin pa che 'dun gyi drab pa krag/ bstan ldog pa/ 'di ste ste/ rdzi kyi drub dang / dngub kyi dra da pa bya pa dang / shes kyi dra ba dang / mu tig dam
41b3(dkon brtsegs): drab dang / sdig gi ba dang / der snying po'i drabs kun nas bka' pa gyur \u0f7f// gdugs pakra'o/  'aM na sdug pa brgyan mi drug stong bangon par skul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas rdon snying po'i bar byis
41b4(dkon brtsegs): bsna bdud las bsgrubs pa sha stag go// rgyal mtshan bklag/ bldan sdug pa brgya khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gaper dang / dngul da/ bai DUr+ya dang / shal dang / 
41b5(dkon brtsegs): ni'i rgyal ba bsgrubs pa sha stag / rgyal mtshan sngon pon mA ni takra se 'o \u0f7f// rgyal mtshan seng po rnams ni tog thod pocan rgyal ba chen dmar po rnams ni to dkar ba can sho stag mngon par sprural to// 
41b6(dkon brtsegs): bdan la dog sna chags can 'azab/ bltan sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur hU~M// b+ha ra ba kra ba/ bstan lkug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon pa ga
41b7(dkon brtsegs): gsong smad kyi khyer dang / dngul skud kyi sgra nga/ bai DUr+ya da / shel gyi da da /  mu~M tig dmang po'i thar dang / sdug gi ga re // de'i snying po'i tha ni/ rin po chesna bdun las bslebs pa shazugs
41b8(dkon brtsegs): 'ad sa rang sa de dag gis khangs tshogs sa pacam du byeng ba dag dang / gdugs pa rgya khri srin srung bar dadag dang / rgyas pa cang brgya 'dred de pa dag ni 'dang
42a1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa dang ga dang / zla ra brgyad wa drug snang bad dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad stengag par snang la ldang dang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsung bskor ba byas
42a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dis ste/ dbar na blang bgyi'i rgyal ba sa srung gi phun sum bu cu gsus kyi rnams mgol ni rnam mkha' las sangs/ yongs 'dres gtam duganags/ de bzhin du 'ang ba 'irtsegs par
42a3(dkon brtsegs): dag dang / gdugs da dag dang / rgyam mtshan de dag dang / bdan de dag dang / bla de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skong ba byed par gyur to// de nas 'dab
42a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyad khri drug stong pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyog sa gcig tu 'khod de thal po spyad nas phyag 'tshal /  tshigs zhu ba cad
42a5(dkon brtsegs): dgagis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// rga dang 'tsha las rnam thal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rma dang 'tshal sa nang grol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gzhal yas kha lo b+hur la byag
42a6(dkon brtsegs): lo// khyod dang mtshungs pa sa mchis lhag pa 'dam mchis so// bdag sa rnams kyang byed pad khyim yum ldam ni// srub cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyim yan lag bturan pa dang // pa byed pa
42a7(dkon brtsegs): nus shin tu mdzes byas pa'i// sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod badrang d+ha par shog/ bdag dge 'dis gang 'di cig 'i ldan shing // mngon 'phags gzugs rgya dam pas mdza gyu ste// nga lam
42a8(dkon brtsegs): dang bdag cag ldan gyu cigag/ 'gro nams myong bya ma shig/  ga can tu mkhrim mamanas dan// nami na pa mdzan gyur ba thog// des rnam pa'i dzin nga
42b1(dkon brtsegs): rab 'phrul sangs rgya ma grub par sheg/ 'dren pa 'angag tan mkham pa kyad sa bu// bdag cag badran pa// pa 'argyaldan pa dang / ma 'das pa co brgyad chos khyim par byin cig/ 'jig rten 'bas sems cad
42b2(dkon brtsegs): ban du no// bdag cag kun kya gro ba ma med dpa// me 'a gyu draganas pa med pa dang // zag sa rnamam kha' 'dra byer na rgyad che// dzis/ dam 'dren kyad don yizhin drugs/ de nas pacom ldan 'das
42b3(dkon brtsegs): bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nasa'i dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa na thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsal pa// rgyal ba rnams 'dren gtso bo sangs
42b4(dkon brtsegs): rnams// d+ham mchis par bshad pa'i ma da na// 'jam ma 'dis spya ni gang migs pa// 'jig rte pa nam ngadathug sa rdzabanga'abs gsungs/ ga su' rang rnams kyis rgyal ba ched 'chis te/ 
42b5(dkon brtsegs): ra nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rabasbyar cing // dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i
42b6(dkon brtsegs): mas kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro bcir 'gyur nyan par 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la khong dag mthib ni// 'gro ba thams cad the tshom med 'gyur zhing // 
42b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tsham med pas 'khor du jigs med sagyur// 'di de sa ngas rgyas mnyes par 'gyes shegs // mang 'di 'dzig pa med rab tu dga' bar 'gyug/ yangs su kya sa shing shin du ston pas ldanas/ 
42b8(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bas lung bldan de dag mngon dga' ste// slob ma mchog la rnams bstan pa bzhin// thechom 'tshal ba'i the cho ba gcad du gang rang rgyas mdza rjes su ldon pa mngong// dga' risems kyis
43a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dus kya byam// rang 'byung mkha' lding 'gro cir 'gyur gsungs// da nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nga ldan pa phrul la chags su bdang klang bka' stsal pa
43a2(dkon brtsegs): mas cadapal gnon skyobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po nub pa de bzhin gshegag/ 'dren pas yan lag babyed ldan gsungs dbyengs kyis// ma dang 'drangs 'gro ba tathul bka' phrul pa
43a3(dkon brtsegs): dbul khyod kyis dri'i la grub par dreg/ 'jig rten pan phyir 'dzum gang nga'i bstan pa// da yi 'bras bu dga' ba'i yid kyis nyon//  chos sol la rab tu dga' bskyed// blan med pa'i byang chu shi 'dzin
43a4(dkon brtsegs): bas dang mi 'jigs bzhi po gang rnams kyis// 'dren pa'i jigs med 'gyur ba btsal ba'i phyir// mda' chags dbang pos pal mtshad legs byas// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni bla la yi// sred 'i dbu lus
43a5(dkon brtsegs): shin du 'khregs pa dang // bum cu gnyis mtshan dpe byed pazang po rnams// yongs su btsal phyir ngal mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrims ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul she
43a6(dkon brtsegs): rab dgi// phu sum zhing dang 'gro nam dgrol pa/ 'di dag kun 'tshal don du mchod pa byab// de dag pa la dga' bas mchod byas pas// dud 'phro gnas nas de dag gi 'apo nas// lha dang bcul thugs
43a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thun par de dag 'dod// 'don ngan song srid pa'i ma ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gad+hA bye skad du// de dag lha mi'i nang na gnas gyur cig/ nam 'dren khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang tshul
43a8(dkon brtsegs): la bar 'gyu ba/ de dag zhing dung dasong mi 'byung ste//  pa mi 'byung chen dang malan mod/ rgyas bdadag macan ni kun du bangag// dang brgyal ma ngad bskal la nga shung bgyur// mar byab brgya
43b1(dkon brtsegs): / gtan pan tho na pa ga bajugs// mag tan pa byang das 'dzin mnyam bzhag pa//  dam sa mnyam pa 'dan mdza 'gyur// skyeb ba dul ma dkrung dpage/ 'dus pa rgyal
43b2(dkon brtsegs): ba brgyad chu gyur// dem skyab pa dus dang tha rnams kyi// sh-in tusams dul byeb brgyad du 'brub/ 'dzin pa de dag 'gro ba ring 'apa' phyir// chom kyi la'ir lo ba tu skor bar 'gyur// mi dag ltar 'di rnams
43b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ma// mdab pa'angs lus su gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon che 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dka' thub drag po tshogs can byu// stong phrag brgyad dru drug cing ba ste// dka' thub spyod de
43b4(dkon brtsegs): phun sub bcal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyi// dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhag de dag nags 'dab tu// tshe zad shi 'phos gyur te lus
43b5(dkon brtsegs): mkha' phreng mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis du 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pa pargyal ba'i bstan la dang // nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems kyang 'byur// nang ma 'jir rung brtad pa'i
43b6(dkon brtsegs): le'u drug pa/ ma po 'azhi ga/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcurtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po de dag sa nam mkha'i ldeng gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa la
43b7(dkon brtsegs): tho na ma mchog tu dga' ba chen po lhas te/ de dag dga' ma gu ye nga pa sa rab tu dga' kyi/ dga' ba dang med bye bsgru nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pakyi bying yod par gyur to// de dag ni sa
43b8(dkon brtsegs): lnga bdun gyi gdugs bai DU r+ya'i dre ba lnga lding bkyeb mu tig dmar po'i drabs bskang ba/ gsar kyi yul can/ baiDUr+ya'i klu ma brgya stong bkye ba/ rin po ci'i rgyan po sbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu
44a1(dkon brtsegs): trA~M/ na gro/ dag pa gau/  nga nas/ 'a ston pa'-i byung ba/ spyad sngon pam brgyan pa/  rgya ba rgyas 'grubs pa/ gya khrag dgu btun drug mngon
44a2(dkon brtsegs): nong du skar mdag ge bla re khor lor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu yod la/ des 'khor de dag bams cad log pa cig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul te// de la rin pa che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi
44a3(dkon brtsegs): mig tu mdzes pa bkren mug 'bye ba brag dku cu cu drug thos pa mngon par sprul to// bla de'i khor khor lug su na pa ci bdun gyi dril bug par ka 'a dra ba mngon par sprul te bram so// de nis
44a4(dkon brtsegs): dud rtsi khru bakhrung rkang dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo pi la spyan bye ba phrag dgu bcurtsa drug mngon par sprul to// den pa klu'i bus de dag tu ldan po de dag la zhon nas rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs
44a5(dkon brtsegs): gi bar snang la bres te/ na' gakha'i las 'dod zhing rol mo'i bye ba phrag dku 'acun drug pa de dag dkrol cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsus skor 'byed la lha'i tsan dan gyi phyib dag kya
44a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha'i a ga ru dang / ta ma la'i lam dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tag sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor// me tog yu t+pal dang / tsam pa ka'i phreng ba
44a7(dkon brtsegs): 'thor// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dag kyang 'thor// spos sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dag kyang 'bul te/ lha ma yin gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchod pa skye zer byas so// de nas
44a8(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi sa rol lo sil ldan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras spyod gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rim mamo//  pas
44b1(dkon brtsegs): yad kyang bu med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la myong ma ldog par byung gnang nad/  du rjid da rjo 'gyu gas su thug dag gas spyod
44b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na rol mo so la snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dpral ba de lta bur skad la de ltar bu yi du 'or dang mnyid na 'de pa bla zung bar gyur to// skadas kya stong gsus kyi stong chen po'i
44b3(dkon brtsegs): khams rgyas par gyur to// sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sku de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sa phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu po de dag gi
44b4(dkon brtsegs): me tog nas pa dang tshogs kyi char dang / spos canam pa lnga tshogs kyi char mngon par bab pa dgyur te/ me tog gi char dbab pa'i tshe spos kyi drizhi ma po dadapung / 'gro zhing ldog go// spos chu'i char de
44b5(dkon brtsegs): dper bya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug du dpag chad drug tu cha chad thos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos kyi dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen por jig rten gyi/ rims rgyas par gang bar gyur to/ 
44b6(dkon brtsegs): sems cad gang gis spos kyi phreng tshor bar gyur pa de dag rnams cad kyang blan mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byi mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bus de dag gis gan bye phrag dku'
44b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / dbye ba phrag dku btun drug dang / rol me sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug pod dag gis 'amam ldan 'das la mchod pa byas dam rkyen thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gnam mkha' la 'a
44b8(dkon brtsegs): bas la bgo bos bya la nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod
45a1(dkon brtsegs): chags su pa 'dan rgyam thakhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis su// byang chub ni 'tshal ni shAm thub la de mimasong pa cher babya/ 
45a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyin gyis legs pargyar ba dgu bcu drugu gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bde bar gshegs pa mched cing de dul ba'i yid kyi gas dang bral//  kyil leg sa pargyad kya d+hA
45a3(dkon brtsegs): pushig d+ha rnams mngon sal te//  dog sde nang rkyen yang tsA pa'i rtal rgya mi mtshan sngon lo brgyan// de dag thams cad par snang deb das thub la tu yis mchod pa byed// klu'i bu mo de dag dang ba'i yang
45a4(dkon brtsegs): la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i don du gru yi gnas nas kA yim la rgyad kyis// mchad pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAcu zhub la der ni mchod pa byas// so la snyan de dag bde bar gshe
45a5(dkon brtsegs): mamachong pa'i snyed kham pa gsus zag/ sgra thos pa'i sem pa can khrag khrig da ni byang chub yang dag zugs// de dag rnams kyis dang ska mkha' la thaM chen po gcig gyur// phyogs 'du'i pa
45a6(dkon brtsegs): gra shA rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khabs pa ga gan tsu can napa 'i mdun go shin brji phyogs su 'bang shing gsal// kA ye buM bo dga' nas 'gro ba'i don du rgyal la mchod byar// 1
45a7(dkon brtsegs): meng pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhi pa tshol byed cing // 'jig rten dor byed bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas pa gru per shog/ de ltar stobs bcu mnga' ro khyod ni sems can sdug bsnga
45a8(dkon brtsegs): / chos kyang ban can mos krug pa sngas bsgribapa pa thagazhog kya//  ba lca wi tul na du sa chu la//  rgyam chog pa'i du nga
45b1(dkon brtsegs): / 9 dang gi gzugs parnyad 'dras pa grib mams cad brtag pa nas n-i// 'gro ba dgas kyi ba nin yang dag nyid bsnyad pa ba coM// snum bgo pa / bur ma mche pa bdun pa phyis 'cho
45b2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ skye bo mi mkham de bzhin pa 'angs bdag pa drang rab bgyid la// byis pa tshangs 'gyid kyang dbas sdig med khyod kyis de lta ba legs par gzigs// de dag ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can
45b3(dkon brtsegs): mas la bstar// ji skar mchen 'di la snyid la khrigs kyung na 'i ltar gda' ba yang // yang dag tu na ji ltang nga bo nyid kyis de la gdang sa mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad dang bzhin pa mchis dbang po
45b4(dkon brtsegs): ra babyed// shes pas brtags nas skye tshogakhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchi sa// yang dag rngar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhen pa mchis khyod ldan pa pa// des na 'dre pa rgyal la khyod pa skye sa
45b5(dkon brtsegs): mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyi las rnams chos kyis tshim nas rnga ba la bram pa 'dra// 'di ni byis pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni spa byir 'phrang // de lta lashes pas sdig med yang dag ston
45b6(dkon brtsegs): byabs dang dbangag nyer gnas dang / na dpa mig khyod la skyabs sub chi// gzhal yas byang chubade bcal slang rnam par 'drar pa khyod lamachod// saras rgyas ste da te/  la
45b7(dkon brtsegs): daM rnams bgyid par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisaklu bu po de dag gi ldag pa'i phams pathugs su spyad nas 'dzamang mdza dang // de nas tshe dang ldan pa phrul byas bcom ldan 'ad thags su
45b8(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ 'jig rten da 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'din mchog khyod 'dam pa dang // dpal sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la dum mtshas pa bdag gi 'asor/ 
46a1(dkon brtsegs): mngad pa'i rgyu yang dag gsungs// de thos lha mi lha ma na tshogs dang klu'i bu lag pa dpag// dri ba rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur/ ga
46a2(dkon brtsegs): dag 'dzin dan nam 'dren byed kyi rtun ma pa rnams par mgyun// rgyam pa mcho ga gang d+ha rnam papam khyen par ma gyur long mar cig// de lta ba bde gshegs rgyal pa khyod kyipa ste ga
46a3(dkon brtsegs): gsungs// dazos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rangs dgas pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yi
46a4(dkon brtsegs): btu ni bar 'gyur// kun teg dbang du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod can 'gyur// bde gshegs khyod kyi 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyob
46a5(dkon brtsegs): das pa dzu mthong the tshem 'tshal gyur te// sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi 'di ning chos la som nyi nga 'tshal ba// de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgul du gsol/ drang srong
46a6(dkon brtsegs): gang srud 'dzum bstad myur du bka' stsal gyi tshim khus// rgyal ba gang gis de reng yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul// mu shig yid rab ches nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bkyi
46a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni mu'i mthu lag sa ston pa 'gro ba'i mdun du 'di bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yi dang mo mchog tu dga' ba stes nas pade bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa 'gro ba bdi dag pa chom
46a8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum chu dga' bskyed pa bka' stsor thul le tshom bsal du gsol// des thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba 'i gsung smra yang dag tham nas de dag yad dga' 'byug
46b1(dkon brtsegs): ba ldan 'das thas/ ma nga ldan pa mas canas sul dang blang bas bsngam pa/ dasum la lagam ma rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dus pa 'din legs par dris// yul bumams cad nga 'dzin rten pan kya sa
46b2(dkon brtsegs): dzul ba bstan// de yi 'bras bu bstan gyis yid gnyis tha ba spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang gi don du ngas ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga yi tshig la nyon// klu yi bu mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub la
46b3(dkon brtsegs): dgazugs// 'greb thams cad spong bar rnam pa shig blo ldan dgas med leg pa par gnas// 'din byed med tshong med gang zag med cing kye 'ab yang med// tshe la rnam pa 'di dag bdun ning smig tu btsung
46b4(dkon brtsegs): song gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo grol yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong ning bdag po med mthang legs// mcho nga da dbyen le
46b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang bgod pa 'di dag snyam 'dra// byang chub gzhal las gang du smon lam btab pa de yang 'di 'drang stong// nga la gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa dang 'gro ba stong shes pas// klu las shi 'pho das ni
46b6(dkon brtsegs): gnal ba tu byin gnas su 'gro bar 'thar// sum du rtsagasum song ste lha yi nang du dga' bar mardzogs nas// ma smad grags dang ldan pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gri bar 'gyur// 'thab pa
46b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gnas te lha'i gnas su lA yi dga' ba spyod// lhar gyur ba de gshegs pas rnams den tshe yi ched du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal ba'i bral rnams 'thab pal dga' ba sdud nas cha ched zad pa dang / 
46b8(dkon brtsegs): dka' ldan gnas bu lha ye grong khyer lha dang brtul zhug pa 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag den lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga' ba spyod// pad+ma mus ma chags pa 'azhin du bde gshegs mi gan blon nag
47a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad dbyung bar rtogs dag blam sa nyams par yod pa 'gyur/ skyob pa rnams kyi dran padom banos pa 'dren du yod mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas dang dngas
47a2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba spyod nas ni// cha chad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bdeg shegs ma smad grags ldan der yang lha mo'i chags kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gras ldan pa
47a3(dkon brtsegs): ratu gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa chos kyi mthar ni phyin gyur nas// 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags
47a4(dkon brtsegs): meng yi ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// tsha ba dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lha 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de na gnas shing lha yi dga' bskyed par 'gyur// bden shegs pa
47a5(dkon brtsegs): / mongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshad gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan mnyam nyid ni bar rtogs// bsam gtan pasam pas tshangs gnas ma smad grags dang ldan pa

47b1(dkon brtsegs): dgesas tshan nyid 'gyung// rad pa gshegs dngabacom ldan mas pa byang chub rang satshal ba/ rgyangs pa'i ying lda la ga tad don byed de dag tshang ma gnas den gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan pa
47b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub don gyi phyir// rang 'byung dgongs pa khams gsu ma lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas 'gro ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang 'byung

47b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas klu'i bus de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos/ yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga'
47b8(dkon brtsegs): pa nA bye ba phrag dgu bcud ma cher thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can thams cad gyi bsas pa mkhyen cing thecom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa

48a7(dkon brtsegs): kyizhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri tsher bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
48a8(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong byed chen po thams cad kyang dpag chad drug tu rgyun chad mu tig dmar pos bus mo nub tsam du rgyas par gang bar byas so// 
48b1(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' ba yang ngan thang mdapa' nor bu rin po ches chal par bkad / kwa'i me tog gas 'dun la gyu dpa' tshad da na la dang / rjen pa che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan pa dag mngon par sprul to// 
48b2(dkon brtsegs): bu'i ros po sim stan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngan par sprul te sa byung ba// klu'o ma tog gi 'dun yang de la yangs teg rnam pa snga ra byas kyi sde lde bye ba phrag ku bdu thos so// rin po che sna dun gyi
48b3(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang be dUr+ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to// 'dun khang de'i gzha yang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches log par byas par gyur to// 'dun khang de'i gzhan 'jam pa bslar du rung ba ste/ 'di sa ste/ 
48b4(dkon brtsegs): dper na sum curtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa kha dog bai dUr+ya ltar 'dug pa/ ka tsa la na de ka ltar reg 'ang de ba/ nyams dga' ba/ sems can mthong ba rnams kyi ga
48b5(dkon brtsegs): ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba/ mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du'ong ba lta bu'o// nor bu rin ches tshogs de dag ge nang nas nor bu la las rim 'brang / lal lam che chu 'brang ba sha stag ste/ 
48b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyakha dog ldan po 'brang / la la las ni chu kha dog ser por 'byung / la la las ni tshwa kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog dkar po 'thung / 2pa las mam dogs tshogs 'byung ngo // 
48b7(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i drung 'byung / nor bu la la lngas ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dgra bsam pa bzhin du 'byung / la la ne snam gyi bya ba byed/ la la ne me long gi bya ba byed nga 'khor da
48b8(dkon brtsegs): nor bu rin po che de'i nang ngadu srung bar gyur to// ser sna'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig chu ba de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams dang dang
49a1(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par stsal pa'i cho ba 'phrul de dag rna' par sbal ba mdzad pa/ nyan nas kying ga 'dan dang bcas pa yang nor bu rin po chen dag gi nang na bzlams pa
49a2(dkon brtsegs): mthong bar gyur to// 'dun bang gig ni de'i 'og nus kyang klu'i mthus gdug sa rnam pa sna tshugs mngon par 'thon par gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bdan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / 
49a3(dkon brtsegs): metog gi lnga lnga rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lnga lce rnam pa sna chags dang / rin po che'i lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mu tog gi phreng ba rnam pasna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs pa'i lnga ldi rnam pas
49a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnam pas tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' la sogs pa klu bya ba phrag dgu bcus te
49a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon du bri ste rkang gis ding nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum ba sgyur de byas te/ nor bu rin po cheg ca len dka ltar ga na bde bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor mngon par gtor/ mngon
49a6(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu gtor to// 'dun bang gi gzhed nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams rgyud kyang / bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du ba'ang
49a7(dkon brtsegs): klur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum pa
49a8(dkon brtsegs): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo thos phyag 'tshal nas thil mo sbyar to/ cang mi zer 'ang bcom ldan 'das rnam pas rjes su dran par byed cing mig mi 'dzums par ltam/ 'di
49b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir lhag pa'i 'asam pas byang nar du yang dag pa zhugs par gyur to// de nas de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi sba bar bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes
49b2(dkon brtsegs): dran par byas nas so so nas blags phrag pa gcig du gazla te/ pus mig pas pa lhangs la btsun sa nas/ bcomaldan 'das gal ba de legs su thal mo shar ba btud de/ bcom ldan
49b3(dkon brtsegs): pa yan la ga lus phyag 'tshal nas tshogs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// mtshan brgya rdzogs pa partul dugs legs spyad pa// drag 'thub gyes pa dri med thugs ma// rin chen
49b4(dkon brtsegs): gnas bcas pa'o sa spangs te// bde gshegs khyod ni grog khyer mngon par byed // lo drug bar du dka' zlab dka' mdzad// rgyal po khyod kyis pa du ba brnyes kyang // bde gshegs kya
49b5(dkon brtsegs): bral mgrur// thub pa khyod rjes byang chub thugs kyis spyad// ji ltar 'dren pa lha ma'i bla ma khyod// 'phral phan zhed dka' thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal btang gyur pa/ 
49b6(dkon brtsegs): sebs kyang bdag cag yad me dga'// thub pa dpu dang spyan ni btang ba dang // byang chub sems de de ltar 'aslab mdzadag sngag shegs kyi dka' srung chos gyur na// dgos pas kyang bdag cag bde
49b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal pas bzod sla ba'i// zhabs dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcad rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'/ 
49b8(dkon brtsegs): ngan skabs su batshis pa ma gtang ste// gang cha 'drar kyad mangs ni mi srung ba// khyim pa'id rjes sa kyang mi ba 'o// bde gshegs byang chu'i myong ba sdug bsngal che// bdag ca mi 'tsha
50b1(dkon brtsegs): la duH// bad ni rdum grwang tho tshom 'tshal ning mchig/ mkhas pargya chom rnam par gas la dugs la// la rterna mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thug/  rings nig yid ni yongs su dga'// gang gis bdu ca
50b2(dkon brtsegs): te// rmongs par bgyis nas yid mi dga' bar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dran pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs pa mchod pa dbapa
50b3(dkon brtsegs): shAHsa~M ge bka' stsol te tshom khum// sor bcu thal me sbar rab makor bzhag cing // 'gro ba 'ang dag thub pa'i zhal du la// tshogs kyi slob dpan the tshom bsal du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzub pa mdzad
50b4(dkon brtsegs): de gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar gyur te// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde ba gshegs pa'i 'khor rnams tshim bgyis na// gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas par
50b5(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa ta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// thub ma pas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob pan gyis// tshangs 'dra yan lagi brgyad ldan gsung brjod byin/ 
50b6(dkon brtsegs): na med sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de mnyan par gyis// kwa'i bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas mchod pa byas// skye bo bde'ang yang basmin bya ba'i phyir/ 
50b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni yongs su tshol// snying rje chen pos rnam 'dren med pa yi// 'gro ba bltas nas sdug bsngal cis mi bsten// 'gro bas byang chub rgya chen thob bya la// bden pa dag ni sgo
50b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum/ ni gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stabs// mtshan med stong pa de bzhin sgron med pa// rnam thar sgra gsum yongs su bsgoms nas su// shin du yongs dag yad can bde bar 'gra/ 
51a1(dkon brtsegs): // mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang na rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thog// 'grel snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas/ 
51a2(dkon brtsegs): brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag 'gro 'di mtshungs bsgral nas// de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med kyi
51a3(dkon brtsegs): ni nyan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyud la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob// de na bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gzigs snyeng rje ldan pa yi/ 
51a4(dkon brtsegs): la ba de dag 'gro ba kun mos byed// bad gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams thams cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// sred par bde gshegs rnams kyi skad spyod
51a5(dkon brtsegs): cing // rab bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs med thob pa bde bar myur du yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob las 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// 
51a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang gzugs kyi mchog dang ldan// 'gro ba thams cad 'di gshegs de dag gi// dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin ming dag/ rang byung dgongs
51a7(dkon brtsegs): byad mi 'gyur// de dag kun du chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med 'thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni// bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur
51a8(dkon brtsegs): bdag shegs pa dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gri ba 'chi med yang dag thub par 'gyu pan de cha 'gro bas rgyal pa'i dgangs lags rtogs// na pa dang nen dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan ste sngags 'das
51b1(dkon brtsegs): las yongs su brel// tshig de thos nas da na da pa sum rgyal bsam pan kyi sa dgas// sangs su su na ltar dag na pa la / gzhal las byang chub thabam/ tha rnams kyi// ya na
51b2(dkon brtsegs): gyur de skad sras la bstan// klu rnams lung bstan yid du 'ong ba yi// rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yid ni rab tu mi gyur nas// dga' ba'i yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song // 
51b3(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bum rnams dang / klu rnams kyi mchod pa yang mthong / lung
51b4(dkon brtsegs): sman pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs de rab tu dga' ning dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skye nas ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' cher po mnga' ning / 
51b5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dgongs te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba 'am dma'
51b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mnga' zhing yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'o de shes yangs pa mnga' bsam
51b7(dkon brtsegs): lta bu dag pa zhes kyang mtho ba 'am dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing ngo mtshar du mi dgongs pa ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam ma// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid
51b8(dkon brtsegs): chang bas bcom ldan 'das la mched pa 'byar rin pa rba sdu bdun kya b+ha ba bzag pa bca mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi srung ba'i bla nga/ dngul gyi snang pa'i bla la
52a1(dkon brtsegs): b+hu re dang / shel gyi zla dang / mu tig dmar po'i nA dang / sdug gi zla dang / rdo'i sring po bshA na stag go/ na po che'i bu dag la lang me tog sna tshogs kyi phre ba'i lnga
52a2(dkon brtsegs): bar stsal te/ gser gyi sdud pa'i blar rnams la ni dngul gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ dngul gyi smad pa'i bla de rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lA lI hrIH/ baid+yAd+yA'i bla re rabs lan
52a3(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi me tog gi phreng po'i sA lji ba kye/ shel gyi bla rnams la ni baidUr+ya'i me tig gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi ba Te/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me teg gi phrang za'i lnga lnga bkye/ sdug gi
52a4(dkon brtsegs): de rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkrab/ bldan
52a5(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang gser nas rnga'i snying po'i bar du shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgyad pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai d+haH
52a6(dkon brtsegs): btsan dang / shel gyi grub can bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad mngon par sprul to// gdugs de dag la yang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi sna ldi mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gre la
52a7(dkon brtsegs): gagi lnga lnga dang / shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lA ldi dang / klu'i nor bu'i me tog gi lnga ldi sha stag go// mu tig
52a8(dkon brtsegs): na par sprul te/ de dag gis gdugs de dag dang / me tog gi phreng bar dag gi gzungs byas so// grul bum gyi rol mo'i sil snyan dag kyang mngon par stsal to// 
52b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag ri ner yang tha re de dag re de rjes su 'brang bar gyur ro// de nas grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta de dag la zhon te/ rin po rje sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla re dang / ma tog de dag
52b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te mchod pabyed cing / bcom ldan 'das la steng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bskor nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na
52b3(dkon brtsegs): lnga mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs cig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mnga' dbang can// thub pa chen po mi
52b4(dkon brtsegs): pi dma' ste// ri yi rgyal po ldan po'i ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag bzhes su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang / tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mnga'// 'dren pa khyod kyis ti
52b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin ni bsgrubs pas// shos rab ldan la dregs pa yang mi mnga'// rgyal bakhyod kyis 'gro ba smra 'drang mkhyen// rang bzhin stong hU~M bral mi dpa' 'dra dang // chu bla na ma ma kha'i smyig d+hAs khrir ni// da
52b6(dkon brtsegs): bas 'gro ba 'di de ga gzigs// dri ba'i bring byer ji ltar sdang sgrar kyang // grong byed dan phyogs bcu kunan med// gzhan du grong khyer drin mong tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshegs pa sa 'gro 'dig rigs la
52b7(dkon brtsegs): papa 'di kun brag ca ji bzhin te// shing rta gdugs dang bla re sa la snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa// brag ca ji bzhin de dag da ltar gda'// 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang
52b8(dkon brtsegs): yangs rgyas nang gnyis mtshan du byar 'thur nog/ rmilam 'dra bar ba'akrab ba bag cag gis// rtogs kyis rgyal pa gyid bzhin pasnyen par tso// na dang mgos ringam su gces gyu yi/ ma
53a1(dkon brtsegs): nas bdag cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub sngar thob na shi med pa'i nanas// gang thos tshal 'gyur 'grol bstan par gyi// bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas/ 
53a2(dkon brtsegs): can Ta stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'thugs med ches rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis grul bum de ldags
53a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mngadad// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa tu med 'drem pa mi mdzad de// rnam 'dren
53a4(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas la mtshar mi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsol nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa mdzad mthong nas// 'gro
53a5(dkon brtsegs): dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum// mi yi dbang po 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi
53a6(dkon brtsegs): yang mthong // ded sras sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis// mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal/ ka/ de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes gyur nas// gang gis 'du byed gyung pa'i
53a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yog nas// nam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom// thub pa ston pa de
53a8(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par bgyis// 'dren pa sa zhig de ring gting byed gyur// tha mam mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dus mdad de yi na na mnyan pad du// me bdun kyang thal mo sbyar tsong gnas/ 
53b1(dkon brtsegs): na pa thatsham 'tshal ba'i ma tshom sol// rkang gnyis dam pas lung nana'ache dang ldan pa ta rdul chags su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rna
53b2(dkon brtsegs): legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'ang yongs su dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par gyur// de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis// grul bum chags kyis ngal mchod pas te/ 
53b3(dkon brtsegs): chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ma gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring mchod de// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par bting /
