53b4(dkon brtsegs): ro skye bo rnams la snying ban+de zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyod// snying rje bas nang la mchod pa byas// rab tu lam sbyor rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las de
53b5(dkon brtsegs): grol bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzang // brgya byin lnga yi drung du 'dod par 'gar// thugs rje blams don mdzad skyob drang du'ang 'dod// de ci cung zad yang dang yang bstan te// phyir ni
53b6(dkon brtsegs): med par 'ag // de dag bskal ba ga gA'i bye ste dang // nanas ni rnam par na byed ci // bdag nyid chen ba'i chos la mtshad pa byed// cha chen po dang dra bcom yi kyis/ 
53b7(dkon brtsegs): ra 'jig rten khams// khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par spod par 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'dren 'gyur te// ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag ni rnams dang
53b8(dkon brtsegs): thobs rgyal ba 'ang bar shes// de dag thabs kyis ma 'angs dus dgas// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed // rgyal ba ngo mtshar med pa bzhed skyong zhig/ rdzogs pa
54a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag chos ba la yang mi gnas te/ 'di ljar bu med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum durgyal bas lung bstan cing // bde'ang gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsal te// thul du
54a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i 'bras bu nges thos nas// 'grob 'i tsam bsal te dga' bar 'gyur// rdul bu ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas de'i tshe bri ba bye bragasum cucu drug gis lha ma yin nam
54a3(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' lding rnams dang // klu'i bu mo rnams dang / rlung lha rnams dang / grul bum rnams kyis mchod pa yang mthong lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim ning mgul yi rang nas rab tu dga' zhing dag
54a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yid bde ba skyes ngo mtshar thob pa gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med par yang yang dag par bka' stsal/ bya ba rnams kyang yang dag par bstan te/ dge ba'i rdzu
54a5(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba yang bstan la/ chos gang la yang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do snyam nas de dag gis chos de lta bu khong du chud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro pa
54a6(dkon brtsegs): chen po skyes nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mos par gyu / rab tu dga' ba'i yi dang ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal
54a7(dkon brtsegs): srung gi 'a bye thugasum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re shing mgo bo bye ba phrag sum rtse rtsa drug drugasago bor zhing so bye ba phragasum cu rtsa drug drug/ se re re la yang rdzing bub
54a8(dkon brtsegs): drin ribab zhing ya ba ma bdun 'da'i bdas rishi 'a dpes bye ba zag ste steng/ 'dang sa gang yang pa'i bu ma bdun 'dun/ lha'i dri mo rishing yang 'khor rgyan thams ca kyis
54b1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i 'dug sum thogs pa bdun bdun zhing bdamam ma ma'i mtha' mtha' na 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po chas srung gi bu de dag gi mgo ba sel yang da po A bdun rgyag
54b2(dkon brtsegs): napo che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag gis gzungs byas pa dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug mngon par sprul to// snying po che'i mabo thams cad la yang lha'i smras
54b3(dkon brtsegs): dasna tshogs rin po che sna tshogs kyi lnga ldi bris pa sha stag mngon par sprul te/ de nas dri na de dag glang po ches srung ga bu byedab phrag sum cu rtsa drul pod dag la zhen// 'dol mo se la phran len cing na ma
54b4(dkon brtsegs): ga ste/ com ldan 'das pa la n+d+he sum nu na drug tu bstod pa byis lha'i can na mi bya mas bcom ldan 'das la gtom mngon pa go ma mngon par ra gta to stsol ma ga su phyi mdapa
54b5(dkon brtsegs): los dang / ud ba la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog mun dA ra ba dang / sAsngan dA ra ba chen po dang / man du Sha ka dang / man du Shag chen po dang pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru shag chen po dang / mdog / 
54b6(dkon brtsegs): mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gser dang / dbul dang / be dUr+ya dang / shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i ma
54b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang / sprul ba'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// spos kyi bla de dag las thos kyi dad 'brang ste 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chun
54b8(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po khor khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos rngub tu
55a1(dkon brtsegs): / te/ spos chu'i rnga ba de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi rnams thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dring tshor bar gyur pa dang / ril po cim
55a2(dkon brtsegs): snyan de dag gi sgra thos par zhur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu ba las phyir mi ldog pa bgyu to// de ltar jibar nges kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir phung po ches
55a3(dkon brtsegs): srung gi bu mgo bye ba brag sum cu rtsa drug la lha'i bu mo klu len pa dang / gar byed pa 'khod pa dag gis mchod de skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul skya bal la ni
55a4(dkon brtsegs): tsan dan dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo mra'i phye ma 'thong/ la la nI lA ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi byem 'thod/ la la ni me tog mun dAng ba dang / man dA rab chen ponas/ 
55a5(dkon brtsegs): dazla bo dang / s+ya sngar bkra chen gyi bar gyi me tog dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la na gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pa
55a6(dkon brtsegs): nges te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ la la ni ni bza' dag 'thor/ la la ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rags dang / gser gyi phreng ba rin po ches smras pa'i bar dga'abul lo// la la ni gse
55a7(dkon brtsegs): drab dag 'dzin/ la la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i bdan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la ya ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi
55a8(dkon brtsegs): mos tshogs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas dri zad dag glang po che'i rgyal pos srung gi bu de dag la non nas/ bcom ldan 'das pa
55b1(dkon brtsegs): dbyed byed pa las glang ba ches srang gi bu dadagams rabs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bas phyag 'tshal te thal mo sbyar nas phyogs cig tu 'khod de/ bcom
55b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan pade gshegs srid pa mthar 'byin pa// srid pa'i bcings las 'gro ba rnam grol ma dang // khyod 'dra srad gsum gang na'ang ma mchis
55b3(dkon brtsegs): khwa mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchod mngal/ mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di sted du// grags pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur ba kyang chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge
55b4(dkon brtsegs): 'chags la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid/  brjed pa tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'degs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde gshegs khyod ni
55b5(dkon brtsegs): / grob spyod// bde bar gshegs pas sdong med 'od med dang // gnas med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang // chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstar// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos
55b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gtso bos bya ba'ang yongs su bstan// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la// bcom ldan 'das kyi bgyi ba kun kyang bskrun// shing d+ha'i yan lag da
55b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs dag/ bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi sems kyang // shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongs su skal gyi
55b8(dkon brtsegs): kyid// chos ni chos la dran par bgyid ma mchis// chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te// chos rnams gang yang ma skyes 'tshe ba mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzo'i/ 
56a1(dkon brtsegs): / yang de nam mchis te// gro ba 'dakun kun rdoba'i /  rjes// tshogs kyi slob pon khyod kyis yongs dag gsungs// mig gi rang bzhin gdan 'ang ma mchis la// bde bdag shegs pas
56a2(dkon brtsegs): bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin du po mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te// nor pa'i 'gro ba blo gros
56a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams// chos kyis chos kyi tshul la gzung ba gyis te// zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par dgyi// rnam par 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa/ 
56a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa phan bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod
56a5(dkon brtsegs): papa'i yon tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgyad ldan yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa mying 'gyur la// 
56a6(dkon brtsegs): me nags pas zin ci mu ma mthong // yongs 'tho ma spre'u stang rgod pa yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bdeg shegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba ma mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lha tshogs yos
56a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis log gyur cig// bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chud gzon dkrol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa
56a8(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa rta ngul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dum pa mdzad// 'dren pa rgya ma mchis par mi 'dumad// @
56b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs 'dzum pa'i tuni myur du gsungs// neb nu gnod gung rnams kyi the chom sol// bde gshegs kyong rkyen la gyi 'dra' ma'ong nas naskye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed par 'gyur/ 'dzum pa'i don ni dag
56b2(dkon brtsegs): lda 'tshal// ba chena'i gro ba'i ma chom pas ladug sol// bad ba gshegs kyi bstan lasra nu gzugs//  chom thal nad som zhi bas la ba sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen/ 
56b3(dkon brtsegs): / me yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa tshul bzhin gnas par gyur// gang gis blo gros dran rtogs blo mkhyen nas// bdeg sa
56b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i rlung du 'dzum pa mdzang // 'gro ba 'di dag blogan yongs pa / de gshegs 'dum ngon nal nas byos par dga'// sor bcu thal spyar mgrol bzhag bgyis shing // dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i/ 
56b5(dkon brtsegs): / dulta// nyon mongs brel zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jog rten mig/ 'gro ba'i yid gnyis som nyi bas la du gsol// rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ 
56b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta sbrul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba// 'gro ba'i don du 'jam pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyi 'don dris 'thun zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bas
56b7(dkon brtsegs): byas// skye bo'i tshogs chen den de de ring 'brel// 'dzum ma dang rgyud rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dzin pas 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// de ni ma log par yangangs bstan gyis// bstan pa de la dga'
56b8(dkon brtsegs): kyis nyon// dris 'di rnams chos kyi rjes stegs shing // bde ba da gshegs la mchod pa 'di dag byas// chos nyi dbyung bar gyur ba med pa ste// chos nyid mad par 'gyur pa'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog tu
57a1(dkon brtsegs): sa bur gnas// rtog par 'i byed do 'du // gas tsham gnyis su brje byab// nga dutang spong zhes pad gshegs gas sa// de sa pang gdadams
57a2(dkon brtsegs): med glang po mchog gas mchod pa byas// byang chub na med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor pa'i 'grel snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di
57a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas paso// dri za'i das por dga' ba'i yid gyur to// / sras bzang rnams lha gnas lha yul ba// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni 'as par 'gyur// de dag sa ngas rgyas bdag shes
57a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mngal mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rjes su chu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde gsheg spyod pa yongs su sbyor// de dag zhar yang rtag par
57a5(dkon brtsegs): dag 'gyung // rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'grob 'di dag dang bzhin stong dgadas// bde ga shegs 'grob dpa' smon par 'azha// byal ba 'a
57a6(dkon brtsegs): khyed ci kun gzegs pa// rdul med bsgral pa khrag sdig 'azhugs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' las rtogs pa ste// sangs rgyas ring zag khrig phrag mang ba'o// bsal pa dmas su med
57a7(dkon brtsegs): dang bar 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston// rgyal bzla pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar de tshedrings mtshang lung bsan// rtathul gyis ni 'dzub pa 'don thos pa/ 
57a8(dkon brtsegs): ba sha pa la nga// dri phung bstan mid du 'thad 'gyur ba// de thos nas ni 'thogrob thams cad dga'// deng ni bde bar gshegs rtse gsung thos nas// shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs spo
57b1(dkon brtsegs): b.lung bstan pa'i la'u sna bcu pa'o// 'phags pa yang dang sras 'dal ba zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i ma// / bam pa ldag// da rangs gnod sun bya ba phrag pargya bcus snyam ldan rnams nas
57b2(dkon brtsegs): ngade dag gi mchod pa yang ma'ang // lung bstan pa lang thos nas tshim ning mgul yi ngas te/ rab tu dga' zhi dga' ba dang / yid 'de ba skyes nas bcom ldan 'das kyi shes ran ma pa la rim gyi chen pa
57b3(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la 'jug pa yang thos pas ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes skyes pa gyur to// de dag gi bcom ldan 'das blo zad mi shes pa zhes bya bar rig nas
57b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das
57b5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs ni kun du mtha' yas te// rgya mtsho chu 'dzin pas ma 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten phan mdzad pa// mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bskyed// ri ba nga
57b6(dkon brtsegs): la gzhal bar nus kyang gda'// gzi brjid chen po nam mkha' gzhal dung gda'// shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs// cha ga rung dpag pa rnas pa yong ma mchis// grob ku pa bsar pa
57b7(dkon brtsegs): mchud// skye bo drang du mi rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// dbas mtshungs med kun du mthar yang yas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la bsten pa dang // de dag sems rgyun ci'adang 'thung ba
57b8(dkon brtsegs): mos paca 'dram lus ma khyer// de bas mtshungs med kun du mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin zhe sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin ma byen// phrag dog dam pa'adi de bzhin mkhyen brnye
58a1(dkon brtsegs): med kun du mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag lam d+hu dgang 'byams pa// de dag mtshungs med rtsod kyis rang tu ba byed// de la ye shes kun tu rab 'byung bas// debs mtshungs med kun tu mthang / 
58a2(dkon brtsegs): ya yas// bde ba dag shegs pas 'grothun rab tu gzigs// chud pa'i lam chud gdang 'thams su cig/ rnams pa'i stobs las bturnams gyu pa// de dag me lus khyod kyis rab tugacigs// 'grogs
58a3(dkon brtsegs): de sgyid dus gnas shing // tsai dri'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyung dang // lus kyi rnam pa dra rab rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// maM yi se shes lta bcu 'a dang// gdA ga sdug bsngal
58a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'athob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing las rnams pa pyid 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la ba tung
58a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bsnyen bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i ni ba 'job 'gyur khyod kyis ma byed// byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pal// rab tu kyang shing 'jig rten mkhas pa yis// bstan parang pra'i ba zlog gyur ba// de dag
58a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas// dmyal ba chen por ji srid gnas pa dang // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong gyur pa// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas ra tu
58a7(dkon brtsegs): / gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dad bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing // chos kun stong pa nyid du rab brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig bgyis shi // 'tshogro rgyud kun du
58a8(dkon brtsegs): smyon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di sgyum 'dra ba nga ba brtags nas// phung po brag cha 'dra bar rtogs gung ste// byang chub sems ldan de dag ra'atu gzigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa de bsod na mas marung / 
58b1(dkon brtsegs): med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud ba// de yis bla mad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog// 'grob cu byung rang bang thob kyu cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i chaganod ni/ dbye ba phrag brgyad du ba dug gi smag pa ba ma
58b2(dkon brtsegs): bzugs su chud nas 'dzum pa ma da do// de nas chedang ldan pa nagal kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bab de gsol pa/ mi yi seng shes 'phru ba 'di mngang pa// oM m-i thA ba rang m+b+ha blang ba ni// rgyum mchis par
58b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mi mdzad nas// 'dzum pa de yin+da ni 'aka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i nal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// mgon pos de dag the tshom bsal dugasol// 'jig
58b4(dkon brtsegs): na 'di dag dga' ba'i yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa skyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gi sems ni mi sbrul gnas par gyur// de dag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol// de ri 'tshor
58b5(dkon brtsegs): yas the tsho mche 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal par zhal dru zhing sbed//  nas the tshom ma mchid kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tshom 'asal du gsol// de ring 'di dag gi ma 'phrul legs// gang gis
58b6(dkon brtsegs): con 'grus pazang po 'dir bstan lags// gang zhig byed dang 'di mngal don mchis gyung // de ni legs par 'grel bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba 'gro ba dgal phan bzhed pa// the tso mo'i tshal ba'i yid gnyis
58b7(dkon brtsegs): legs bsal gsol// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu bdag kyang 'thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
58b8(dkon brtsegs): garta thul khyod kyis drib legs par dris// de ring 'gro bdag gi don chen byas// rang byung 'dum ma cu gi drim pas na// ston pa'i dgongs par bakhyod kyis legs par mthong// de dgasung bstan ma lus bskrun par/ 
59a1(dkon brtsegs): bya// byas// gnad sun rdzogs kyi yid ni gzigs gyur nas// 'grol 'an pa'i don du 'du ba mdzad pa// dad pa'i yid kyis rtabul mnyan par gyis/ rgyal ba'i byang chub ni bshes gyur nas// 
59a2(dkon brtsegs): na chags kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas// rang byung dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang // chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma thams
59a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'gro ba kun du smon pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnam pashig cing // kun rjeb tsam du rig nas mi chags te/ 
59a4(dkon brtsegs): bkun du tshul bad mo bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang btang // de dag srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba/ stong bar bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub ste// b+ha
59a5(dkon brtsegs): ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dang rga shi yong gis stong pa ste// de ni rgyal ba'i bla med byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// zhib bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// 
59a6(dkon brtsegs): dra bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin dben ning stong pa nyid// gang spyod de yang rang bzhin spyod pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyi byis pas min// ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// 
59a7(dkon brtsegs): / bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas// shes pa po dang 'dra bar rtogs gyur na// byang chub lam la de dag skyed ces bya// stong pa'i rang bzhin stong par shes par bya// mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis ste/ 
59a8(dkon brtsegs): smad pa med pa'ang rang bzhin stong pa ste// de ltar spyod na bzhin min spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jis rten rnams// dga' gyi de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur zhwar dpung chos la de dag yid ches te/ 
59b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas shes byang chub yid ldan gyur// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams der mos yi dgur te// 'di ltang la mdzod par ba byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'jom blo chen rnams// mtharas dong ning yun ring dga'
59b2(dkon brtsegs): bar ma/  dag sa yos su du sa kyis/ gli da sad cig gcin la lapa/ ca de dag rgyal ba phyob 'tsho// dedag pa khyed rgyu ga gas+hon// de dag 'dig rten byags
59b3(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod 'gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'dra shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de ltar brtan pas rgyal ba ba mchod nas// byang chub ba med
59b4(dkon brtsegs): dayang thob bzung te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur ba sems can mtha' las pa dag rnam par 'grel// langs rgyas mkhyen pa motha yos grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas shes bya/ 
59b5(dkon brtsegs): paba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi// tshe tshad bskal pa stod ni tshang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni// rgyal sras mang po sbyar ma'i cho gas snyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'ji
59b6(dkon brtsegs): rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// des thos nas ltung ba sa 'jig rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur ras btsun 'grus brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtso
59b7(dkon brtsegs): 'grus spobs kyis brtan padagyur// gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste/ bcugacig pa'o// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal ba sngon pa la sogs pa mi 'am chi bye ba drug brgyad kyis lham yin gyi mchod pa de dag
59b8(dkon brtsegs): dang // gdod sbyir gyis mchod pa'i 'a ngag kyang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos ras shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ khyod 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmyigs la srog dang / skye bo dang / shid las skyes dang / zhe
60a1(dkon brtsegs): bu dang / gang zag dang / 'dag dang / bdag gi yang gang yang med la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can nas gdags pa'i phung me dang / khams dang / skye ched
60a2(dkon brtsegs): kya med migs las gang yangad pas rnam par smin pa gdags par dbya ba'i las de yang mi dmyigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs// sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs
60a3(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan pa mdzad pa 'di na ngo mtshar med do// mi nag las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su
60a4(dkon brtsegs): sa lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te byang chub sems dpas yang dag par ba ba ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chab nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / ming gi bkod pa dang / daskye
60a5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing nas shing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal papa'i snyed cig gis sa
60a6(dkon brtsegs): su 'byur zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nga/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis nyan thos 'das
60a7(dkon brtsegs): tu'agyur ro zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas yang bstan pa ma / 
60a8(dkon brtsegs): rnapas nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'das par lag kyigs bcom ldam nas kyis gangs pa sa da sams/ gas ma'am kyi rnam pa dzu pa len pa
60b1(dkon brtsegs): gas pa sogs sungs so rgya / bcom ldan 'das tshagasas na pa'i byangs kyil na bcus pa/ rgyal ba'igs rdzo tha sa// gas kyim da/ nas skyes/ 
60b2(dkon brtsegs): dpung bstan pa// bde gshegs padag gis de ma 'tshal// gsung ba'i zlab chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin me gsung ji lta bu// mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog/ skye 'angam
60b3(dkon brtsegs): ches byang chub tu// sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu// skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal pa'o// ldes po dag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po ji ltar na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // drini yang
60b4(dkon brtsegs): / lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum// sgyu ma 'dral lhar skye zhes// gsungs pa de ni ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // shAkya seng ge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma
60b5(dkon brtsegs): / lags la// dge ba shes bsten gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu kyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal// g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// rkang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu// sde
60b6(dkon brtsegs): / poragasungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgra bas la bcom ldan pa dag ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes mgon gsung ji ku bu// the tshom rnam pa 'di 'dra skyes// shes rab dpe med pang
60b7(dkon brtsegs): la'achal// ni ba yod ces bka' stsal ba// chos kun ni gsungs rik+ta Ta// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i ldem pa dag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// sku mdzes ra tsho chos kyi rnams// nam mal
60b8(dkon brtsegs): drang gsungs de lta bu// chos ni rab du spang bgyis na// ma mkhas dmyal ltung ji lta bu// brtan pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la/ 
61a1(dkon brtsegs): / mas can gsungs de lta bu// bka' stsal tshul 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi don padag ma 'tshal// mgon po del bdag dogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the chom sol// dge
61a2(dkon brtsegs): sa kyang sachis la// byang chub la dag bsgrub pa grus sa// dge sbyong byal ba'i gsung sa tshul/ de na bka' stsal bdashA 'tshas// tsha nams 'dang me gsungam sa// ljong byed la ni
61a3(dkon brtsegs): zad bstan pa// tshad med b+h+yom par 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mthu' yang bka' stsal la// mnor smin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab ba bral ba yi// spyan mngar
61a4(dkon brtsegs): ke spangs bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gzhan gyis bdag gi the tshoma'ang // sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das
61a5(dkon brtsegs): sa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa 'di dag gsan nas de la lan gdab pa'i phyir mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bdag gis
61a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'atshal ces smras pa// grel te 'ga' zhig mi spyod na// rgyal bas de lung bstan mi gsung // ci phyi ba der 'di lta bu// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel med
61a7(dkon brtsegs): 'bring ba med// me long shin du yongs dag la// ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yi// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gur med na// mchod pa'i pha
61a8(dkon brtsegs): rtswa bcu ga zhes// yan lag rnams la brtag byos pa// ldan pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod// tshe mi dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur mang skye'o mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnams ni 'di la 'phrul/ 
61b1(dkon brtsegs): spangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba'angam mchis sems kyang bsred// de ni ma 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs ban mnga' ba'i ldem po dag/ gzhan du/ sems mnyan par gyes// byis pa la
61b2(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i rnams// 'khor byar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// logs pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur// de dag sngon cad mthos pa'i// sems med chos
61b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas ba shud na// byis pa'i blo dang ldan pa rnams// 'di la kun du mongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub phan yon thos gyur nas// zil gyis mnon rang byung
61b4(dkon brtsegs): chen de ni thos par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pheb// de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems mnyan par gyis// gang dag
61b5(dkon brtsegs): / 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur zer zug med// dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par ston// snum 'dral lhar skye ba// ji lta bu zhes dgos gyur pa// mthar phyi
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur slob pa dang // skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad// gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge ba shes bsten ces gang smras pa// kaunas dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir// gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes
61b7(dkon brtsegs): bsten// g.yong ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pam 'tshal nes smras pa// shing rta'i lan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba gzhan du rtogs// mi gang bdag yod khas led cing // bya ba'ang bdag gis byas
61b8(dkon brtsegs): pa// dadag lan byas dang / g.yong med par bdeg shegs pa gad // rang bzhin stong ste steng pa yang // rtogs shes pa yis gang smras pa khyim pa log pa'i sngon rnams// nga bzhin myong bar mi shes pa// de dgam
62a1(dkon brtsegs): su rdzun phye/ ra stong zhes bdeg de stod/ rtag pa'i rtogs pas pang dgas pa rtog pas bang ka/ zhib 'od ci chos kun kya / 
62a2(dkon brtsegs): nes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis// du rgyon las sreng ste// nom ngas ji ltar sgeg rgyu'o// kur du rtog pas sgom bskye// mi mkhas des de rtog pa'i rgya// yod pa min la log par
62a3(dkon brtsegs): brtags// chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rgyal ni du med do// de bzhin yongs su rtog pas bkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// 
62a4(dkon brtsegs): drug med smig rgya chu bzhin te// skrag rgyal ni du med do// de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa ma yin na// byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtog pas bcings par gyur/ 
62a5(dkon brtsegs): / mas nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong ba dmyal lca shes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ra gyur pa// sa mkhas rnams ni ga par 'gyur// rang bzhin rdo ba nyid stong na// bdag shin dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong
62a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes thos gyur na// bdag med 'gyu' zhes skrag pa skye// de dag bdag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdud bor nas// stong pa kya dom spong byed de// mi mkhas sems dmyal chen por ltung // mtho ris 'dzi
62a7(dkon brtsegs): dam partad nga // skye 'i gro gzhan dag dang // las cang man bstan byas te// byed papon dab cwa ba / yang dag kho dag/ ni 'ad bshad par shes par gyis// skyi la ma gang la dngos pa med/ 
62a8(dkon brtsegs): log pa rje pa na//  sa sems kyi rna pa pa lanam bye phyogs thu mas na meng // shi rnams gis bzlam pa las// me bru 'argya bang bzhid do// ba
62b1(dkon brtsegs): dang shing la sems pa med// 'od kyang min 'ablang ba ltar// las bye na no// bsod rnams ma'am ba zin pa// byang chub yang dan pasgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul
62b2(dkon brtsegs): dkamarkun par byos// mal che ched lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyim lol phung po su sa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshus// rang 'i med pa gangasas dang // las rad ces nings smras pa/ 
62b3(dkon brtsegs): stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med// tha skad tshul du bad bar bstan// khang dge mtha' ni ngas bshad ga/ phyin ci po ga de 'ang yang dag mtha'as/ log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi shes so// 
62b4(dkon brtsegs): tshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis 'jug pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams la
62b5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' las ngas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan/ 
62b6(dkon brtsegs): rnas thams cad 'gag med pa// a yis chos la 'jug par bstan/ am yi sgo gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyisas/ chos rnams rnam par rtog med pa// de yang chos la'ajug par gsung
62b7(dkon brtsegs): chochos kun 'gyur ba med pa yang // a ni chos kun sgo mo bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag/ ljon pa 'di skang shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zad sbas pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba
62b8(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis// mi zad sgo yigazungs su ltar// chas rnams kun la sgomed de// de dag med pas sgom 'thung sa 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo len te// al brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kun bams kyi
63a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa// 'di lang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// ma brtan // tsha mas 'ang ba med pa ste// med pas de dge 'ongs pa'ang med// 'di yang gzungs kyi no pan// mal brte pa jug par bya/ sa
63a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzung
63a3(dkon brtsegs): sgoyin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzungs kyi sgo mong las nyon// chos kun yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// mang phyir chos dun
63a4(dkon brtsegs): pa med ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs
63a5(dkon brtsegs): sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams
63a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma lus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// al brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes ma byung ba// de dag mthong med bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // ded
63a7(dkon brtsegs): mas kyang med phyir no// chos kun mnam med de pas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan ga ni med// nam mkha' dang ni 'drang ste// chos kun med pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag mod chad pa med// mnyam pa nag
63b1(dkon brtsegs): med cing gtas su med// gdung phrad bsil med chab dang med// blta ba'i lam min meng phyir do// drang po ma yin yon po min// sun pa ma yin sdang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzungs su na
63b2(dkon brtsegs): // gapa du pa'i med pa ste// chos rnams ga med ga yo bsted/ jug ma kyi thob sed// sa pa'i byed ste ste// skyel ba me gnas kyad med// gro me ldog sed ma
63b3(dkon brtsegs): med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med parade shes par gyis// mig can ma yin 'ong ba yin// lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min// sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa min// dul ba ma yin ma dul min// nod
63b4(dkon brtsegs): nani 'dzin// 'khor rin byang ngan 'das pa min// bden min pa rdzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba spyod drul shes par gyis// 'dag rten gdul nga'i don phyir gyi// 'di la the tshom gang yang med// gang gcang byab
63b5(dkon brtsegs): dad pa'i don du byur ba med// de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa lung bstan pa dang / gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phying
63b6(dkon brtsegs): dashAr te/ khang pa brtsegs pa sing la rten pa dang / padamal rten pa dang / ri la rten pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lnga rdzis mdzes par byas pa/ rgyal
63b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang rdza ldis brgyan pa bye ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas ri spos kyi dang ldang las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes
63b8(dkon brtsegs): sa rgyas sa nasas pa dge mags ga tshogs sa 'i shems 'dus
64a1(dkon brtsegs): pa byas te/ thang las skyes pa dang / chu bas skye 'i ton de dag gis co ldan das pa gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas khang nga brtseg de da/ 
64a2(dkon brtsegs): ma ngas te na dngas dang ngas btsa ldan 'das la lan gsul bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi nangs la mgo dur phyid 'tshal nas thal mo sbya te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dubs pa
64a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par dbyed cing phyogs cig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs
64a4(dkon brtsegs): das 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rgyal gyis bcom ldan 'das mtshigs su pa cad de gsol ba/ bde ga shegs bra la spyan mnga' ba// rje ma mchis par 'dzub mi mjed// lha mis mchod pa yang da
64a5(dkon brtsegs): / 'dzum mdzad chu de bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mang pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// rlab chos ma yi bzhin du// sba ba'i zla ba'i nal du lta// bde ga shegs mdzes pade
64a6(dkon brtsegs): shig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol// bde gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thob nas bcom ldan 'das// 
64a7(dkon brtsegs): / dum pa mdzad par gyur// skra mchog bdag gi them ma khum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tshom ma mchis som nyi chad// ji ltar bstan bzhin ga
64a8(dkon brtsegs): // de ltar rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'gro la thugs brtse mngadape dang // the tshom bcad srang sngon pa dang // mi cims kyi lung bstan gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la
64b1(dkon brtsegs): gas su ba cad de blang bka' stsal pa/ skye'i tshogs chen du/  rted 'byung ba// rjod pa'i lung bstan ga dris pa// rta thal khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthu
64b2(dkon brtsegs): pa// bde gshegs ye shes ngo mtshar cad// de khyod dang pa'i yid byos pa// skyo mang yod kyis nga lazhod// 'jig rten pa ni dang bde ba'i phyim// ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas// bcom
64b3(dkon brtsegs): las nyon// sngon pa la sogs mi'am ci// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lhags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di ngas shi 'phos mtho ras 'dod// bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dar// lha ma nang dul 'ong bar 'grub
64b4(dkon brtsegs): yang shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang skar dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi se ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas shi phrag khrag khrigs// sbrul brtse ni lha gnas na// bsam ga tu dga' ba'i bde ba stog/ khan
64b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bye du brgyar yang // de dag lha mir 'khor 'khor nas// nga rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su// byang chub rnam par 'tshad rgyar 'gyur// rtag tu snang ba'i bskal ba la// mi yi seng ge 'jig rten mgon// chags seM/ 
64b6(dkon brtsegs): zhe da galas/ bas pa 'i dus pa'ams kyus ga shi sems da // khongs sus sbyi na thos dag pas gang sa/ khan sa mi
64b7(dkon brtsegs): de der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtsob
64b8(dkon brtsegs): zhes// de 'dra'i bsams pas rab tu rdzogs// sems can rnabs chen de dag ni// snod las rgya chad yun ring btag// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// @
65a1(dkon brtsegs): gi shing gi bkod pa gsung te/ dag ldan gnas kyi sangs stod dums// ngan song kun kyang yongs sa dag/ de dag ni dang / makun du// ma 'om gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// shing rnams ca
65a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// me ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstun de thos 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang yin ngas par gyur// ming
65a3(dkon brtsegs): tsi lung bstan pa'i lenga'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / dngas lha phreng ldan grang po can brgyad khris lA ma yin rnams nas me'amachi'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mdzad// lung bstan pa lang thos nas tsham 'angs
65a4(dkon brtsegs): la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer
65a5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi khar lug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog mAn dA ra bas pus nub tsam du gang bar byas so// de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bca par
65a6(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa/ zhi ba'i dbang po 'jam pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thugs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po ma yi stag/ sangs rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 
65a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dga' ldan pa// thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zlan pa'i tshe// mi rnams rtsub phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs
65a8(dkon brtsegs): rabs kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi nal dus// dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpa g.yas ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brji dang g.yas phung po car// blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal
65b1(dkon brtsegs): mang ni rnab pasdug pa// bden pa ni me nangs dri gsums la// rgyal ba'i cwa brgyad ces dang ldan// de mami mnga' zla ba'i mchog can gnyis patshan ma na pa pe byed bzang
65b2(dkon brtsegs): da// dbang po'i rgyal mtshar mtshungs med zhugs// bde gshegs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims stobs kyi mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzin stobs gnas mi bskyod pa// le gas tsho can// 
65b3(dkon brtsegs): / 'dud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags// ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser snam mangs nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis skyed mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu med
65b4(dkon brtsegs): ge de gshegs khyod// gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang skyabs bcu yi// chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhi
65b5(dkon brtsegs): de rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang / lha ming bcas pa'i 'gro dang gyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtser nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mchod dbyid pa// srid pa'i rgyud las bsgral ba sa kyi nga
65b6(dkon brtsegs): can lhung bces 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal rgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha phreng ldan glang po can rnams ba
65b7(dkon brtsegs): pazhags su mang nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po// d+har mchis par 'dzam mi mdzad/ 
65b8(dkon brtsegs): sa par byud ri 'dzam mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bkyis byung mthong nas// 'khor kun thamam mtsha yar te/ 'dzus par
66a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan par 'jal// do chen 'dzum pa mdza pa'i don// bka' stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa'i mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the mom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gas
66a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu ba mnyes par bces// gang gis deng mchog tha med kyis// sa nig nga ga ba sgrapa/ de ga shegs bdug gi rgyam thus// de gang gis bdu gyiganas// dkrugs g.yengs su dulacwa
66a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ying ldan par bgyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i the tshom myung du khur// de thos pade gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun
66a4(dkon brtsegs): yid dga' 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal ba// phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pas// des na 'gro ba ma
66a5(dkon brtsegs): / don chen shin du deng byas 'gyur// stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal ya nus// phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis// 
66a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dang mchod pas// bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pham byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// 'thun par mi yi nang skyes te// rgyal babye ba dang ga med
66a7(dkon brtsegs): tog mchog gis mchod par 'gyur// kun du bde bar gshegs kyi sems// skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur// rang byung mi yis dge la// tshigs su bcad pas bsrung par 'gyur// ma
66a8(dkon brtsegs): na'adi kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod ce // man
66b1(dkon brtsegs): nas// rab tu dga' ba'i bskal ba la// rnam par dren par 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa ma smad nags rgyu ba// brgyad kyi po rnams dag kun// bska/ sa pa gcags padag shags 'gyur// me tog rgyal
66b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan ces bya// de na dmyal dang da 'gro nga / gang na so ga zhin rje'i 'jig tan myed// sbyin nis yin med/  khom thams cad gyub tsam// phre ldan kyang mo can sa ma// longs skyed sus cu rgya gsum
66b3(dkon brtsegs): ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag/ mi dge byad pa smos ci dgos// de na rnam 'dren mchog rnams kyi// skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags phye
66b4(dkon brtsegs): brag khrig phrag/ gang gA'i bye ma rab mar snyed// grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma smad de dag go// ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag na
66b5(dkon brtsegs): ring bsrel la'ang // rgya lo ba'i snga mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsgyel tshe 'phrul sna mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems brjid
66b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// phreng ldar glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'khor kun kyang // de tsha sems ni rab tu dga'// phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste ba
66b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// // de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bsten pa yang thos nas tshim cing mgu la ya
66b8(dkon brtsegs): du dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par bye ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i klul zhon pa'i mi zhig tshu'i dbus su phyin
67a1(dkon brtsegs): chag tu 'ong nas tshu ro langs par po bar bya ba ba kyi smos bdag po skyed skye du byed pa ni dis ci dag ba dadag kyang 'angs rgyas ma banyid la dubartse das/ 
67a2(dkon brtsegs): sa sa bzag pa skyes par kA nas de dag pa sa chos chog da bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ dadag ni da
67a3(dkon brtsegs): bya pa la la sa pa nga kyi to/  'ayo nga/ ra mdog dang / bai dang / gas dang / rdo'i nga 'dzi canag ga
67a4(dkon brtsegs): mos snyad dbu tre yang mngon par sprul te/ de dag nor bu rin po ches gas kyi re dag khri po de dag thogs nas rol mo sil snyan dgu khri bo de dag byed cing steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bco
67a5(dkon brtsegs): lanagasum skor ba byed kying me tog man dar ba dang / man d+ha rab chen po dang / man dun ga dang / mar 'du shaka chen po dang / b.ru shaka dang / ba du shaka chen po dang / spel ba'i me tog rnas
67a6(dkon brtsegs): ldana'adas la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gas ma bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcang ba dag gis mngon par
67a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa// dral ba'i yon tad mthong ba yi// lha ni dgu khri tham pa dag/ 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan sngan// thal mo rab tu sbya nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis
67a8(dkon brtsegs): / ma dang bachar pa ma dzes pa// rkang gnyis mchog la dag kyang 'tshal// khyod de srid pa'i spyad rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred pa nga pa / 
67b1(dkon brtsegs): byed kyis bkal// byad de gag zung ba ste// rwal 'dug pa khyad kyis spangs// khyod de mkhyen pa zhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi rnams soso// khyod kyis ta mongs thams cad grangs/ 
67b2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni thams cad bcad// sgyu ku dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das/ rgyal bad kyi skyed rgyamani// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med// bcom snad khyod la sdod pa yang // rnam pa par gyi
67b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis sred pa drungs nas phyi// marig pas ni thugs kyang phyung // rnam pa bzhi po'i byin ci log/ rnam pa kun du yongs su spangs// gang du 'jig rten mi chud de// ri dgas rngon pas de bzhin du// 'jigs shing / 
67b4(dkon brtsegs): ga par 'gyur ba yin// yang dag mtha' ni khyod ces gzigs// sems can 'jig tshogs ltar srung ste// stong pa nyid de ma 'tshal bas// ma rig pa'i mu pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i bachen ra dga' bar
67b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyid// khyod pas yang dadang bzhin du// 'gro de 'ad pa stong 'drar gzigs// gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs
67b6(dkon brtsegs): dug lega'adubyung // ma rnams da/ bdag myed sod pa da 'a bar badzi/ dod ni ba dgang gis// chos ga ma ngan par brjod ba kyi ba// tshas chos des sbyong ba
67b7(dkon brtsegs): 'khyor mas song par bstan// se ma'i ma'ang ngos med pa la//  bo chags chen mngon su pan// de bas can gdags ma mchis// thog dang gang zag ma mchis pa/ de bzhin du
67b8(dkon brtsegs): chad kyang // yang dgas rin du mnas// skyes bu dam pas ba stan pa ma nga // ji ltar rim mkhar zhig gis// bud med gzugs // mnyam pa dang
68a1(dkon brtsegs): ba/ dang // lci dang yang ba bstan brgyas kyang // byis pa'i rig ni bslus pa ste// de la ma mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs// gang
68a2(dkon brtsegs): sa khyo kyi sa yul// legs parlabs rmongs par mi gyu sa// lags sa spyan pa med du// de kun ma khyen po skyes pa sa// shes pa chen po rgyad kyi // ye shes rno ma dus / 
68a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi'akhor lo rab bskyor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cig myur du ni// bla med byang chub ni thob ste// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
68a4(dkon brtsegs): pador ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mur bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen
68a5(dkon brtsegs): zhe'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// d+ha ma mchis
68a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dre pa 'dum pa yi mang dan// 'dum pa ma dad pa'i 'dzum gyen// dpa' ba chen pos lung bstan gsol// skyes bu dam pa 'khor ba dag/ bde gshegs de bgad mthong nas mi/ yi
68a7(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// de ring du yis bdud pam bgyes// nem nur gang gis bcad par gyur// mu zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol/ 
68a8(dkon brtsegs): khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem nur 'tshal gyung sa// rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// de ltar gang gnyis mcho khyod kyis// lung bstan 'did/ 
68b1(dkon brtsegs): kur na// 'gro 'i chom 'chad 'gyung ba// 'dren pas de ltar lung bsan gsol// canas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa rnams// myung du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan du
68b2(dkon brtsegs): sol// de bras bcom ldan 'das sum mod nga ldan pa te thal la tshigs su 'a sbyang ba da 'phrul la/ 'gro ba rnams la ngan pa'i sa/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyam mgon po'o// 'dum pa'i rnams ni b+ha des// 
68b3(dkon brtsegs): rta thul khyod kyis dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byos mnyan par gyis// dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/ 
68b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dang ba'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni ngas parnyed// nga yi bstun par
68b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas// sngon pang sangs rgyas bye bzug// brgyad na dgal 'di dag mchod/ ma 'ongs dus na 'das sa rgyas ni// bye mtha' las mchod par 'gyur// 'dre po de dag de srid du// sangs rgyas byabs mtshon na/ 
68b6(dkon brtsegs): bskyed bkur byas par mgyur pa// de srid byang chub 'chang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyi ba na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od cir 'chang ba ste// 'dag rten kun ma khyen thub par 'grum/ 'jig rten
68b7(dkon brtsegs): sa de dag gi// zhan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni// blo yi mchog du ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyad du 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib med gzigs pa de dag gi mi rnams de yi dus kyi
68b8(dkon brtsegs): theg gi dbang po gnas par 'akrum/ shes rab mtha' las de dag gi/ nyen thos 'dod chags bral ba nams// lus kyi tham 'dzin pa dag / bye ba ca med 'brur bar 'gyur// sems can rnams ma thugs kyi mam
69a1(dkon brtsegs): rten mnan tho la ldan nams/ mya na sa pa nga bzhes la / shi su byu bar gyur/ ming ba sa dusasu bya nas/ rnam par 'dred pa dpa sa ldan pa/ la pa'i
69a2(dkon brtsegs): rten rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas ni rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po spyor rnams kyis / mchod ca de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod
69a3(dkon brtsegs): byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das nas kyang // de dag dam chos gnas 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag breg grag/ brgya cu chang par gnas par du
69a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis// bzong zhing yongs su bsrungs par gnas// 'jig rten thugs brtse ma dad pa dang // shAkya yongs su smin mdzad phyir// rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la// 'dig rjer sgron
69a5(dkon brtsegs): lung baspyan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun// kun du dka' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen ba ni'i res lung bstan pa'i le'u se
69a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi pa'o// // bam po drug pa/ de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad nus lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag dang
69a7(dkon brtsegs): grul bu ma dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sku dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas sangs
69a8(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams la chem zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas yang byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po ba rgya phyin la sogs pa 'cho
69b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i snying brtson pa ra te/ da dan garin po che'i khang pa bzag bstan sdug ga/ rin ma cha sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i phreng bdang / bai dUr+ya'i phreng bas brtan pa/ gas
69b2(dkon brtsegs): phreng ba sna tshog pa dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgyad dang / bag ma dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis btsun pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / 
69b3(dkon brtsegs): dan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo 'tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sil snyan sgra rab tu la
69b4(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rta ca shes kyis drang ba'i shing rta lha rdzas kyi rnam par legs par brgyan pa/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshal dang / bdan dag gis mdzes par byas pa bye ba phrag
69b5(dkon brtsegs): nuyang mngon par sprul to// ser spyi'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor khor lug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad me tog man dra ra ba dang / lha'i mchod pa de dag gis rgyas par gang bar bya
69b6(dkon brtsegs): glang po ches srung ki buM bye ba phrag brgyad cu yang mngon par stsal te/ glang po ches srung gi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cu/ glang po ches srung gi bur mgo de dag re re shing yang
69b7(dkon brtsegs): gso de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad ma stong phrag bdun bdun/ pad ma de dag re re zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri brgyad khri/ 'dab pa re re zhing yang lha'i bu ma
69b8(dkon brtsegs): 'dun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas rin po che'i khang pa de dag mdun du byas te/ dbung
70a1(dkon brtsegs): po ches sang gi bu dag bcud nas kyi bzhin shing rtad ltar ba rnams pa dedag brtsonas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byams// ring po che'i 'ang ba dadag las kyang lha'i can dan dang / aka
70a2(dkon brtsegs): su pa la dang / tam la'i la po'i phyim dang / gas bya'i char mngon par babapar gyur to// lha'i matog mnang rab dang/ man du ngab chen po dang / man dun ga dang / man du nag chen po dang / bdugaka dang / bdun
70a3(dkon brtsegs): / chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai dUr+ya dang / shel dang / mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / 
70a4(dkon brtsegs): bo dang/ rin po mam bdun gyi ma tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyu to// lha'i chu bod dag las la la ni gu la n-i/ la la dig dbyed/ la la ri rol mi byed/ la la ne lus kyi tshul smra ning lha ma yin gyi tshe
70a5(dkon brtsegs): / lta bu dang / glang po che sa srung gi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khabang rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu de cang shes kyis drang ba'i shing da bya ba phrag brgyad rdul zhen te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsu
70a6(dkon brtsegs): 'byas nas lnga'i yo byang rnam pa sna tshogs mang pa yang phul par gyur to// lnga'i rol mo sim snyan bya brag brgyang rdu la bar sngang las sna byed par gyur to// zing dbye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la yang lha'i bu
70a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan bye ba phrag brgyad du mngon par sprul te/ lha'i bu mo dag kyang la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la rnarol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta bu bzhin du
70a8(dkon brtsegs): nas su yang byagasus ngas gyil byeb khrig brgyad rjeb dang/ 'das ya semasate/ deka sbal ba'i lha'i tha pa 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mtshang ba pyid pa las na chos thams cad kyang stsal ba dang 'drag/ 
70b1(dkon brtsegs): led de lajo snyam nas nga dag 'disam du ches 'di dag thams cad na de ltar nga bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul ba dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur cing de dag gis chos thams cangs
70b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra' shes pas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar tshetshem med cing rim nur med par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo sa
70b3(dkon brtsegs): phyaphyag 'tshal nas phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang
70b4(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bsten pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dge par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad skal pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas the tshom med
70b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa kur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang ba dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis dang // skal pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang // lha rnams kyis
70b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mched byas pa// de ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa gang lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di dag thams cad sprul pa
70b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lha tshogs dadag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// sto pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 'di la bdag
70b8(dkon brtsegs): chom ma mchis so// rgyal bsam pa'i skye ba rnapas mkhyen nas ni byis pa'i sa thob tha skad gang btags pa/ de dgi gun kyang sprul pa je bzhin te// bde gshegs 'tho ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob
71a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang gang dag ma sla ba dang // bcom yan tan thas dral pa'as thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sbrul dang 'aH// bcom ldan bstan la tha chom ma mchis so// com rna
71a2(dkon brtsegs): nams mi s+tha lgang len cing // bse na khrag nyis sa nyon mongs sangs// de ga rnams kyang skupa 'dabacom ldan 'das// dag shegs bstan la 'amam mamachis so// gang rnams 'grob nal
71a3(dkon brtsegs): na phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub spyad spyod pag yod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' bde gshegs sras dag kyang // byed par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshegs rang byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog stobs
71a4(dkon brtsegs): bdu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobs 'phags 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ sprul pa'i di 'du de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med ni bsil
71a5(dkon brtsegs): / nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal ni byed mthar thug grangs med pa// de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// 
71a6(dkon brtsegs): gang tshe gau ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom thams cad spangs// sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs
71a7(dkon brtsegs): slo yul 'di la spyod pa'i rnams// the tshom ma mchis rang gyur 'dran par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa zla
71a8(dkon brtsegs): surbud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid cad// bde gshegs rnams ni
71b1(dkon brtsegs): med 'dzul mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas 'di ni 'dzum ma dngan// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshigs gsungs thochom lum// rang byung ba dag shegs nas nas 'dzum pa 'di/ byung bar riganas 'jig rten po chom
71b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// 'gro ba'i the tshom thub pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the tsom ma mchis mdzod// lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu yid dag 'das// rgyal ba bstod de ltangs rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs dengs
71b3(dkon brtsegs): don du 'dzum pa mdzang // rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' stsal gsol// zla ltar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi// ce nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro ba thams cad dang / 'a
71b4(dkon brtsegs): bar// rgyal ba lha tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsal// bde gshegs lha tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sbal pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur nas// stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsostsal
71b5(dkon brtsegs): / rab rib bral ba lha yis bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'de dag the tshos bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rjem 'gyur// rab tu dpa' ba 'khor 'dis thos ku po// dgongs pa'i ga nas rgya tshon
71b6(dkon brtsegs): pra par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de skar bka' stsal pa/ lha tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i tshig/ smras pa
71b7(dkon brtsegs): ni dus la bab pa ste// 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa de dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum ma dzad pa yi rgyu de ngas bstan gyis// dga' zhing dad pa
71b8(dkon brtsegs): sesems kyis ngal nyon// lnga tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por
72a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ srid pa'i tung na sngon yang 'a'ar bayis/  mi mi gatshab gang na skye snyed mdzad// srang dran na 'ad dag thub pas sa/ sa nam sasas pa tu khungs mdzes/ 'dag
72a2(dkon brtsegs): chog 'di byas pas// chos rnams stsal pa 'bar mdon du mthong// bdag shegs bstan pa 'das byas pa sa// rgyas thos mi 'gyur bar cad yong mi 'gyur//  tshogs 'di las sa mchod byas te// yo mas
72a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad sprul pa 'drad shes pas// bskal pa pad ma zhes bya byung ba'i tshe// sla ba'i zla ba mi yi mchog tu 'gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog
72a4(dkon brtsegs): sa rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drang ston cing // 'gro ba khrag khrag dpag med 'brel par 'gyur// bde ga shegs dedag bstan la bal yod pa// chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// ni gnas dalang
72a5(dkon brtsegs): napag yod pa// myur du / med byang chub mchog ni 'thob// sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u sre bcwa lnga pa'o// de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas
72a6(dkon brtsegs): gsum ris kyi lha'i ba di dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang zhes nam chem ning mgul yengs te/ rab tu dag 'a zhi dga' ba dang me ba ba rtses nas bcom ldan 'das kya lung bstar pas
72a7(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' bar shes shing sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob rnam shes pa'am/ ma mthong ba lal/ martogs pa'am/ mngon du sa byas pa'am/ skye ba'am/ 'gag pa'am yas pas
72a8(dkon brtsegs): khyen pa ga sa me byasas sas batshos 'amasas 'ad pa byed do//  nga canan gshegs pa 'an na pa dang na dpa paganas thu sa su ru / shes par byab yang dran pa
72b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di zad do// da yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid rab tu gzigs rab tu mkhyen/ legs par marjod du mdzad papar 'byung thams cad mkhyen pa nas bya'o// dgun rngab na 'jig rten gyi spyad par nga lanan gshegs
72b2(dkon brtsegs): pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin paden brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mthos
72b3(dkon brtsegs): papa la byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam pa ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma brtags pa/ 'dzin du ma bcug pa/ rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa/ ga bar ma bsnyen pa/ mabor ba/ ma pa
72b4(dkon brtsegs): / ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa/ rab tu ni ba med pa/ ma smad pa/ ma bstod pa/ thob pa ma yin pa/ mthob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/ sman pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa
72b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ grangs med pa/ bzang ba med pa/ 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'jo ba mi
72b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ mgayos pa/ ma bsams pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma ming
72b7(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs/ mig dang / rnab dang / sna dang / ste dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang rodang / 
72b8(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ miga'i rnam par shes pa dang / na ba dang / snga dang lnga dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan mid dmigs pa/ mig ge 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang /  dang / lce dang / lum dang
73a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di kyi 'dus te rig pa'i mtshan ma ming dmigs pa/ mig ni 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba tshor pa'i bar kyi mtshanams
73a2(dkon brtsegs): ga/ gzugs kyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan la mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa 'i
73a3(dkon brtsegs): la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rang dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma
73a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma ma dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de dag dang / de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa
73a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de lta sems dga' ba yin na de byis pa so se skye zas pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos na 'jigs shid dang ba dang / skrag par 'gyur te/ des 'jigs par gyur pa sa
73a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das byon pa ye shes las nyams par 'gru he/ de dag na lta nga bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis skyeng nang brab ste/ 'khor ba yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to nas te/ de dag gipa 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
73a7(dkon brtsegs): la 'dod pa bskyed nas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par 'phags pas bcom ldan la
73a8(dkon brtsegs): la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu lakhod nas 'thab bral gyi lnga de dge zhi
73b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bca padag gis bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang bye mtshad rnams kyang de bzhin te// dbang po grong na mtshan mas dben pa dag / kun kyang thub pa
73b2(dkon brtsegs): zhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa gnyis yin te// khyod kyis gzhan las mags na rang gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden pa gsum pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis
73b3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs la 'gro ba rnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don srad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// sems can tshogs kyi 'gro drug gang bstan pa// sems can dmal
73b4(dkon brtsegs): da 'phro yi dgas dang // lha min ris pa mi dang lha yi rnams// mi yi seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad// rigs dma' de bzhin mtho ba'i ribras rnams dang // phug po'i khyim dang dbul po'i khyim dag dang // 
73b5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin g.yog ge tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ning dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji sed gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chu
73b6(dkon brtsegs): / rig rten pa pas mi la de bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na// 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang mtho ba sman dang mi snyan dang // bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo// thob pa rnye
73b7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa skyed// ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par 'gyur// gang gzhan ma bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya// nad rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gcod par 'gyur// kun rdzob nga la don dam su smra ba// de dang nod pa'i
73b8(dkon brtsegs): she bar bya// mi sdug sdug dang sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu sra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de la dga' ste mtshar mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gdegs pa
74a1(dkon brtsegs): zas byung na// 'jigs theng ji bzhi mi rtogs spong bar 'gyur// de dag bde gshegs gsung na spangs gyur pas// sems can dmyal bar sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // de dag tshul min bde ba
74a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyid kya // sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'di ga rten pan pa'i bstan pa su ni ga zhes// la sa thos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi grags pa rnyed snang rab spangs te// srid pa
74a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das nasa'i bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshanas med pa don dam zhes// gang gis thos nas dga' ba bskyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur// ji ltar 'di
74a4(dkon brtsegs): shegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tsho mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol// byang chub blo can rnam dag bro can rnams// skyes bu
74a5(dkon brtsegs): sa dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman srad du// blan med pa'i bya rtsub thong par 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'thab pral ris kyi la bye ba phrag pazhi bcu po dgage ldag pas
74a6(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi
74a7(dkon brtsegs): the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i chu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na// 'khor 'di shin du dga' zhing mgu ba
74a8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan sdod // 'gro ba 'di rnams
74b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad skad du// snyan pa'i gsung na lags par brjod du gsal// sangs rgyas pan tan mthudag thos gyur na skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan danas na// mkhas pa
74b2(dkon brtsegs): nams mi tshul ba men rtsom par 'gyur// mi ye dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir// the tshom 'tshal ba'i rnam thur lags par sol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdong // lha rnams lung bstan pa'i
74b3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te// khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan/ 'jig rten phan phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom
74b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshegs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pan byer mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur/ 
74b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs chen rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blosan cing // 'dod chags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang / che rabs brgyad ni rtsod pa'i bla can dang // gti mug blo can dga' ba skyer mi 'gyur/ 
74b6(dkon brtsegs): gagang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon dris dang // gang rnams snying rje che dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis 'gro ba gdon rin mthong
74b7(dkon brtsegs): kur te// me yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos nas// ud pa la phreng bzhin mgo le khyer bar 'gyur/ nga yi 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur ba// sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur
74b8(dkon brtsegs): gyus te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'den me tog phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs dam sa
75a1(dkon brtsegs): / sangs rgyas blo ldan 'gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med bro ldan// rgyal ba me yi seng se gang bA yi// b+he snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkung byas// byang chub blan med par smin byed cing // dge ba mtha'
75a2(dkon brtsegs): las 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'das phyir rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying spyad// de dag mi mchog sems can pan ma ngang la// chos tshu la mtha' yas yongs su
75a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren 'akur ba// rnam 'dren ches la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi yi nyon mongs spyod por ba mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad// rnam 'dren skyes bu dam
75a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa snying pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag dul ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro ba thams cad spong par rab tu rtogs// ces stong zhe na mtshan pa'i rnam pas spyod// rang bzhin med
75a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshad ma med pa sra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar zhes sbyar nas// kun kyang sangs rgyas yon tan nams la gnas// de dag la mchod ba rgya chen byas// bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas/ 1
75a6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa'i bsal bdam pa la// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur// bde ga shegs mnyam pa med pa bye 'phragaki shu ti shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro/ 
75a7(dkon brtsegs): na bsam yas yongs su myong bar 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang bcas par
75a8(dkon brtsegs): dag la// 'thab bral ba srung bstan pa'i sedu sa bcu drug pa'o// de nas dag 'a phran des kyi sa byed brag brgyad dus sum yi rnams nas 'thab thal gyi des kyi lha'i ba de dag gi mchod pa yang yob las
75b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yang thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig ci gzugs sa ma/ 'om tshong ba'ab/ 'on tu 'du shes sapa/ 
75b2(dkon brtsegs): 'om 'du byed ngam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa nig bcom ldan 'das kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan snyam nasade dag 'disam du sems te/ gzugs ni bcom
75b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
75b4(dkon brtsegs): / ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang chu bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
75b5(dkon brtsegs): pa skyes pa byang chub kyang ma skyes pa na de la ji ltar mi skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyal bya/ gzugs kyang 'gag pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pas/ 
75b6(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub kyang 'gag pa meng pa/ gzugs kyang smos pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang gnyis su med pa/ byung
75b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.ya ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa// 
75b8(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa rnam par shes pa'i bar lang dmigs su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa na ji ltar 'gag pa med
76a1(dkon brtsegs): / zlos pa med pa dag gnyis su med pa dang / g.yab mang pa dang dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang / dmigs su med pa'i bar du ma ngan par rdzogs parang cang rgyabar bya/ de ltar chas thams
76a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs na 'di la sangs rgyas ni gang / byang chub sems dpa' ni gang / byang chub ni gang / lung bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes
76a3(dkon brtsegs): bas stong / sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas myong bo nyid kyis stong/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi bad kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngob
76a4(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong pa la gzugs shes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam
76a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jachas/ kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i micha'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhi gnyal ba'i rmilam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan cid
76a6(dkon brtsegs): rtse rtse ba las de nyal ba las sangan/ 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran par mi rnyed cing de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du 'gar ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang
76a7(dkon brtsegs): ba zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrang bar mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing ro ma myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rmi lam la
76a8(dkon brtsegs): no ba ste/ chos de dag gi dang ni rnam pa gzhan la so so len pa de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zer te// chos de dag ni de lta zhes par bya ba yin na de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub
76b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sen/ gang nas byang chub yam/ gang zheg sungs na yin/ de chos thams cad da migs su med de/ sa sa'i sgo po yang dmigs su mad/ sa so'i skye chos kyang dmigs su med / kan thos kyang ras gas/ 
76b2(dkon brtsegs): su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang
76b3(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa yang dmigs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag ca
76b4(dkon brtsegs): ma ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas dka' ldan ras kyilha'i bud de dag chos de dag la the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur
76b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'thab bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas
76b6(dkon brtsegs): / phyogs cig tu 'khod do// phyogs cig tu la bad nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa// de dag 'jug pa de bzhin gshegs pas
76b7(dkon brtsegs): ram thar sgo gsum po ni rnyed gyur pas// mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te// sems dang bsam pa de bzhin ma mches pa// chags med blo mnga' rnam
76b8(dkon brtsegs): spyodayul lags// mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi// byang chub sems kyang rnam yang 'brang ma mchis// phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la
