77a1(dkon brtsegs): // nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub sman pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems la'ang dag 'arjod de// dga' dang zhum par 'gyur ba ma mchis par// bde gshegs sras rnams sru btu
77a2(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam pa dag zigs// dal rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams// yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing // mkhas pa de dag 'dag rten 'di ni spyod/ 
77a3(dkon brtsegs): kye mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing rngamatshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab sangs te// sred pa gsum la de dag yod mi smon// dngo bstod par smon lom de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtags/ 
77a4(dkon brtsegs): zlar cing // lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la// byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// de dag
77a5(dkon brtsegs): na dang bde gshegs ma skyes te// me yi seng ge de ltar gang 'chal ba// de ni khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang
77a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan pa// bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dge 'gag ma mches// 'gro ba thams ca
77a7(dkon brtsegs): 'amag med thor gyur na// de 'dra' blo ldan byang chub rnyed me dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal brgyal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gi 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag tu la
77a8(dkon brtsegs): 'di 'dzin pa lags// phung ba sems mad bzhin skye mchad dang // khams dang byang chub rgyal brgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pas mchis pras// glang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal
77b1(dkon brtsegs): sngag/  thung rung ba das nyid stong bste// khams dang se mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bzhin tum sras rnams nang banyid kyis stong par gang spyod dang // phung ba sgras 'drad pa nan khams rnams dang
77b2(dkon brtsegs): skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan smos pa med par gang spyad cing // de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// gnas pa ma mchis mi gama' ma lags te// mchis pa la lags ma mchis
77b3(dkon brtsegs): sa lags// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rgyal dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'chal gyur na// de ltar bgyis nagapa
77b4(dkon brtsegs): gas chog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags// rnam par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // ji snyed 'jig rten phan mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge ba de yis 'gro ba rang 'thung ba// 
77b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mchog ldan pa grub par shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzub pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan pa
77b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'dren pa rgya yi stabs ni gang zhig gis// stobs bcu brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'jig rten 'di dag dga' bar 'gyur/ 
77b7(dkon brtsegs): kyathub pa'i nal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dis mthong the tshom 'chal 'gyur te// rgan par 'tshal ni ba gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i nal du lta// 'di ltar dper nan pa nang stsos
77b8(dkon brtsegs): bsgob bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing // nad gnyis dbang po bdag shegs gal duste// 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs 'dzin la
78a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dang ldan// rgyal bas rlung dag zas 'tshal// kun kyang ba gshegs sa la du// wang byung // de rgyal bas thugs rjen bskyed cing // mas 'apar 'ang rab tu ga
78a2(dkon brtsegs): dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar// ye shes stobs kyis the tshom gcad du gsol/  m-i yi bya mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshos bsal du gsol sa
78a3(dkon brtsegs): a sar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshogs kyi sngon gni gdugasol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la chags su bcad de slar 'ga' stsal pa/ rta thul spyod kyis 'jig rten
78a4(dkon brtsegs): namadzad la// 'dzus pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'gro ba'i nga yi don chen byas// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di
78a5(dkon brtsegs): dag shes gyur te// nga la mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos nyid 'dres par thub
78a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad rmongs byung ba'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs// sngon ste rgyal ba rnams la lhag tu byas// bsam pa gcig gis zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong cing legs par bsams
78a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon chad byas pa ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing // skyes bu mchog dang 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa bstod byas byas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen ba
78a8(dkon brtsegs): dbus// 'grob thams cad ste med de bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung bstan dang / gang dag ni ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chom nyid 'di 'drag
78b1(dkon brtsegs): shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes// lha rnams gang yang de la the tshom med// byang chub sems kyis rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du// lha tshegs 'di dag rtogs pa'i tshe
78b2(dkon brtsegs): te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas na// de phyir 'di dag rgyal ba rang byang 'gyur// gnas pa med pa la ni ngas gyur nas// g.yo ba med pa de la nemanur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// de la'
78b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams the tshom yod med do// chos rnams dpa nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// de la'ang su rnams the tshom rnam par dag / blo mchog
78b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te// de pyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'// rang 'byung nyid ni myur du thob par 'gyur// 'dren pas skar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'grob
78b5(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas rnam par 'grol bar 'thur // rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni// rang byung chos la rnam das rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bas dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa sakhyen te 'gro la bstan mdzan pa// 
78b6(dkon brtsegs): zos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // ye rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob par 'gyur// dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phral dga'
78b7(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag bdun nus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
78b8(dkon brtsegs): nas yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas shing de bzhin nyid la the tshom med par gyur nas stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyikyi zhapas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo
79a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na chos thams cad na yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sgrib pa
79a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i shA sa mapa mas pa'imapams chagags pa'i la sa pa sa las ma mas pa'i na mamamachis pa'o// mas ldan lam las na pa'i sa las
79a3(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshang ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// de pa nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa
79a4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// rog cig pa'i slad du mi gnyis pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom
79a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di
79a6(dkon brtsegs): dge pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis pa ni byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o// tha ma mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub bo// de ci'i srang
79a7(dkon brtsegs): zhen/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom
79a8(dkon brtsegs): 'das phung po ma lus par myangan las 'das pa'i dbyengs ni rang bsam ma mchis pa sed mtshams med pa sems kyad de'i 'ang bzhin no// de ci'i sred dus na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phreng
79b1(dkon brtsegs): lus pa'i myangan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang srang ga yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'tshal bar dag na gnad par 'gyur ba'i chos nan
79b2(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhen/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni mya ngan las 'da' ba yang btsal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' lan 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis na de mya ngan las 'das pa ci ni
79b3(dkon brtsegs): tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag som nyi ma mchis the tshom ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos la
79b4(dkon brtsegs): la nem nur dang the tshom ma mchis na de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba
79b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa/ 'phrul dga'adis kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu po de dag rang gis rang lung bstan pa gsan nas 'gro ba thams cad ra
79b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten par bar bzhed pas 'dzum pa yang // 'dzum pa'i dun
79b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis ma bstan te// rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas// khyod kyi rgal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pa// mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten gyi tshom 'tshal// 'dum pa
79b8(dkon brtsegs): regang lags rang byung gsungs// the tshom 'chal pa'i the tshom bsal du gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na// 'khor 'di thams cad ngo mtshar thob par 'gyur// byang chub mchog ni yongs
80a1(dkon brtsegs): bslab skad du// de dag la ma mchog zhan du rnam dag 'gyur// tha tsham 'tshal pa dag na nam du yang // byang chub yid bzhin padabar ma 'grub ste// tha tshams mag pas la nas mkhas pa
80a2(dkon brtsegs): mas gyu ma/ [ऽ] grus sa mas ga sa sa//  sa la smra sa mngos
80a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa ta rnal la tshogs sa pa pad de snang bka' stsal la// ngasan 'jig rten pan phyir 'dus pa sa dang// thum sto kyus mas te// sang brtan ni khyo lam lus byas// bstan pa sa byas
80a4(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen par bdag cag lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyis bsam pa zil ma nan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgra
80a5(dkon brtsegs): gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung bltar// de ltar the chos med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni skyobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nu bgur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba myur du 'cha
80a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po tshul thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skad tshogs dbus na rnapa gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal ba'i mas
80a7(dkon brtsegs): rdul thab dag/ bdag cag thams cad ma khyen du 'gyur bar shes// de ltar nyi ma nub par gyung ba'i ga/ nam ma mthong sems can dag shes// de banan pade gshegs sas pa tshul shes pa/ le shes
80b1(dkon brtsegs): ngathob par 'gyur du shas// chu lung de ltar gsol bar 'bab 'gyung zhing // rgya mtshar 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin pa de gshegs sras po tshul des pa// byang chub rgya chen thob par 'gyur ba ma
80b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gnam du 'ad ba 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du 'i chom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten mkhas par myur 'gyur ye shes 'dug/ gang thos nas ni the tshom med 'gyur zhing
80b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyi chos nyid rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye bdag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bskur bar cha
80b4(dkon brtsegs): sa byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos nyed rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog che nus// de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan brjod byed ba// de'i na co/ 
80b5(dkon brtsegs): la mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzod// de ltar sna tshogs 'di dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jogs mngon shes shing // de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sprul// 'jig rten mkhas
80b6(dkon brtsegs): sa su li rang mdzad// rtathul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnams// bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'o// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkhas la bsten par bya// gang dag tshul la
80b7(dkon brtsegs): drug pa rab mthong ning // mkhas pa gang dag dge ba shes bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad// shaTha
80b8(dkon brtsegs): lags sa le khya thas/ yang me nas 'as kyi sa/  mags pa kru sa mim/ 'das pa byung gang rnams byung ba dang/ ma'amasems can canapa sa nga / 
81a1(dkon brtsegs): // dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul byas padapar gshegs pa thog// rang 'phrul tshogs grub pa'i tshul zhes pa// 'di dag la mchod pa mchog byas gad // 'dren pa thams na
81a2(dkon brtsegs): bkur rab byas sa// tshul gyis su ni rang 'byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang yin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang blang gnas pa'i rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul lo// tshul thos
81a3(dkon brtsegs): kyis mngon bsnyen myur du 'thob// de la ta la sangs rgyas sras rnams ni// sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nes du med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams rtse ba// rdul zhes bdag ston pa'i lam la spyod/ 
81a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul la dad pa'i yid byas te// brtsam par bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba shes mkhas pa bsten byas na// bla meng byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thosas
81a5(dkon brtsegs): ni// 'khor kun rgyal pa'i byang chub yi rangs te// rjes su yi dang 'i chom med gyur nas// mthar byin po thos la ni zhugs par gyur// 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcwo brgyad pa'o// bram po bdu
81a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang skur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lce bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad nus lhas yin rnams nas 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag gis mchod pa yang mthong / lungs
81a7(dkon brtsegs): bayang thos nas chem 'ang mgul yi ngas te/ rab tu dga' 'ad dga' ba dang / yid pade bsgres nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis yang dag
81a8(dkon brtsegs): tha shes gang sbas pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa yang mi dmigs na de'i mtha' lnga spos kyang ci 'tshal/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na namaH
81b1(dkon brtsegs): pang des dmigs par 'gyur te ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu na theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bungadang/ rigs kyi bu ma rnams kyi spyad yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang lal men gnyis su
81b2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyis su med de nas mi spyod pa mos na de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang/ de ni lam log par zhugs pa
81b3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal bar bkye ba'o// de ci'i slad du nen/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bkyi ba'i chol de gang yangs
81b4(dkon brtsegs): chis so// de ci'i slad du zhen bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ 
81b5(dkon brtsegs): rabyung nga ma lags/ 'dus byas ma lags/ 'dus ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par thos par bgyi ba ma lag sa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spag
81b6(dkon brtsegs): rabagyi bam lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so bcom ldan 'das byang chub rjes bgyi ba de yang chos gang gi gnyen po yang ma lags la chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen
81b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun ras nyon mongs pas lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs lag
81b8(dkon brtsegs): byebye byor gyur ba'i chos gsan de gang yang dang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par shes par bgyi bas pa
82a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su shes par rgyab ma lags// spang bar btsu ma lags/ bsgom par brgyab ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs na gzugs kyi mtshan mang
82a2(dkon brtsegs): bral ba'o// tshe dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas rnam pa'i shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de la
82a3(dkon brtsegs): mamatshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de yang 'gag pa'i mtshon ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / sa
82a4(dkon brtsegs): byung ba yang 'das pa dang // ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus sa byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// com
82a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/ skye ba dang / 'gag pas brdung ba lam/ 'das pas bzung ba 'am/ sa'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung
82a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/ de ltar mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba la lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma
82a7(dkon brtsegs): lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang da
82a8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa zhes bkye'o// de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par
82b1(dkon brtsegs): pastod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa mthar 'phyen legs par gsungs// 'dren pas sred pa'i snying po ma panas na// skye bo mo langs dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod byed rab tu zhugs// phung po rnams nas
82b2(dkon brtsegs): dumi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba nes mtshan pas spong ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos pog pa// yongs shes bya dang srang
82b3(dkon brtsegs): sgoms mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang du rang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngas med rang byung gsung // byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// 
82b4(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar me dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan mas rtogs mi 'gyur// me mkhas gang dag mtshan mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'chang rgyar sems bskyed kyang // mtshan
82b5(dkon brtsegs): rospyod cing spyod yul log pa ste// blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshan de ba ni no mtshan mamed sna
82b6(dkon brtsegs): / stong dang mo stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa da dag byang chub las la spyod// de dag byang chub dam pano ba 'thob// pos kyi rgol bkun gyi spyod yul min// gnas dekan thos rnams kyis bsgod
82b7(dkon brtsegs): men// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam grol sems ldan zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang // de bzhin rang rgyal slob par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la
82b8(dkon brtsegs): srung yul med / gos bangs den mthar ma spyod pa dang / nyi tshe'i stong bzhid la slom pa dang / gang rnams stong pas spong zhes snang sgra dang / chos kun dang bani ni yang smras 'tha mi bus/ mas
83a1(dkon brtsegs): ma sung rnams kyi bslab pa la// sra ba dang rngam thal slob pa slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// skyon pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed lags/ 
83a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso bo bstod bskur// bdag cag bsod nams mi chu dgang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub dam pa 'tshang rtsi ri // me shes s+ho mdzad sangs rgyas 'gru'i par go// de nas
83a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang skar la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas skye bo bal
83a4(dkon brtsegs): tshede dag gi dge ba'i rdzab bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su gcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lce yi bas
83a5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtsob kyang kyis 'dzum mdzad la// thub pas 'dzum pa'i/  ma gsungs na// rgyal ba 'dzub pa'i rgyuni bstan du gsol// dren pa lha med 'dzum pa mi mdzo ces// 
83a6(dkon brtsegs): nas chog dam pas de skad gsungs// 'jig rten don slad 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// 'dren pas bka' stsol the tshom pasal du gsol// drang srong chen po'i nal nas 'dzum rig nas// thub can
83a7(dkon brtsegs): 'khor rnams the tshom 'tshal// gau tam rgyal ba 'dren pas de dag la// 
83a8(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis thal sbyar sdod// 'khor 'di yangs pa'i sems ldan the tshom 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' sem nyi bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis te// phyir
83b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dang bskyed rim gro tsher bgyid de// the tshom mi 'tshal sems ni grol 'gyur bar// rgyaya legs par rung // bde gshegs bstan pa 'di dag bder gnas shing // gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gces
83b2(dkon brtsegs): kur ba// lam de nas ni the tshoms mchis mche// de bas skye bo'i the tshom bcad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dbral la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo tshogs chen non dbang / 
83b3(dkon brtsegs): na byas nas// tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras shing // 'dzul ba'i don gyi rgya ni yongs zhus pa// khyod kyis tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dri ba de yi don dras pas// skye bo tshogs ched 'di yi na byas zla// 
83b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen dag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pangs mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i bstan pa'i
83b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas// don du gnyer ba de dag de bzhin 'dod// gang gis 'gro 'di dag mtshan med par// smyig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong // byis pa'i rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pa
83b6(dkon brtsegs): bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes srang byir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan mngon dga' 'jig 'gyur zhing // mtshan pa'i 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dod/ mtshan ma med pa byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i
83b7(dkon brtsegs): tog ldan mtshan mar rnam brtags nas// ji kur brtags nas de ltar 'ching ba yin// mtshan ma stong par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi bdag ni brags padam pa thob// 'du shes mtshan can mes nyam
83b8(dkon brtsegs): yas rgyud ces// sdig pa brgyad dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun du sdug bsngal mi chung myong // de lta mi mkhas mtshan ma brtag pa byas// mtshan mar 'du shes pa ni phung po dang // sangs rgyas
84a1(dkon brtsegs): / byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na// byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mangs 'phel// ma
84a2(dkon brtsegs): ma med pa kun du sbyor ba stong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun du spyod ba de nyid mtshan med yin// kad rnams byang chub thob par bya rtag pa// rtog pa ni mi mkhas par chad yin/ 
84a3(dkon brtsegs): mangs pa longs spyod nam pathob byed na// longs spyod de nyid mtshanam med par gror// chos rnams gang yang darang bzhin da kyis med// rnam par tsug pas rgyas bla kun kyang stong // rtog pa
84a4(dkon brtsegs): bas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal bas gsungs pa de dag thos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tshom bsal/ dper na tsam pa'i
84a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul tshe
84a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang migs nas// 'dzi rnam par rjen pa kun sa 'as// gzhan 'dul bar byed pa yang bstan pa sa ste cu kubas+ho// den sa ris kyis zlag dug nas
84a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed des kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa yang mthong / lung bstan pa yang thos nas che ma zhed mgul ya rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas sngon
84a8(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang / sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan lam 'dod pa skyes shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i
84b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di la ni ldang ba thob ste/ chos zab po la bzod pa thob par gyur nas de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa yang ma yin/ ma byas pa yang ma yin nas bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes pa yang ma yin// / 
84b2(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa yang ma yin/ byung ba yang ma yin/ mabyung ba yang ma yin/ grub pa yang ma yin/ ma grub pa yang ma yin/ 'gags pa yang ma yin/ ma 'gags pa yang ma yin/ gnas pa yang ma yin/ mi gnas pa yang ma mi/ 
84b3(dkon brtsegs): na nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba yang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa yang ma yin/ khong khro ba yang ma yin/ rmongs pa yang ma yin/ ma rmongs pa yang ma yin/ shes pa po yang ma yin/ shes pa po med/ 
84b4(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin/ mthong ba po yang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa yang ma yin/ tshor ba po yang ma yin/ tshor ba po med pa yang ma yin/ ston pa po yang ma yin/ ston pa po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ med
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ba yang ma yin/ dngos po yang ma yin/ dngos po med pa yang ma yin/ dmigs pa yang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa yang ma yin/ 'gro ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ song ba yang ma yin/ 'ong ba yang ma yin/ 
84b6(dkon brtsegs): nga ba yang sa yin/ mi stong pa yang ma yin/ mtshan sa yod pa yang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa yang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa yang ma yin/ sngon pa med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag
84b7(dkon brtsegs): ltar chos thams cad la yod mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la yang mi gnas/ tha snyad la yang mi gnas/ brjod pa la yang mi gnas/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin brjod du med pa'i 'du/ 
84b8(dkon brtsegs): shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ ma so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes car yang ma yin no/ 
85a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sa sa 'askyab ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i 'du shes ma
85a2(dkon brtsegs): yang ma yin// nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin// kan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'ang shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes car yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes
85a3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma
85a4(dkon brtsegs): yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma
85a5(dkon brtsegs): yid/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes
85a6(dkon brtsegs): can gang yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams/ 
85a7(dkon brtsegs): cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas de rnams dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir de'i tshe de dag zhi bas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad bdag gis ma
85a8(dkon brtsegs): rabastod pa/ zhil zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha rol byon/ zhi ba bsten par mdzad cing 'gro la zhib bsten pa rjes su ston/ zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrugs
85b1(dkon brtsegs): mchis/ khyod kyis 'tshe med zhi ba 'gro chud thams cad zad pa myur du brnyes zhing thob par bgyid pa'i ni ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs klong rnams zhi badzad 'gro ba
85b2(dkon brtsegs): gtod// sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten pa'i byang chub gnal yas ne pa de la 'god// de bsnyen sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i gro khyer na par deng shes gsung // 'dren pa de ltar 'grob 'di 'argyal bas bsnyen pa'i
85b3(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa bstan// gal te bsra pa pa de slo ba 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob// bslobs nas ni ning yid len pa'i lam dong dbang po ni bdag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba ni byed mthu chen zhi ba shes
85b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi pabyed gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa dam par rtog gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod
85b5(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// nyon mongs zhe zhing mtshan ma kun spangs ni ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad gi shing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid byang na 'das// thub pa gang dag gi las de 'dod sems pa de dag nyon mongs rgyas
85b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba spyod kyi byang chub dang de 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'das las rgal ba de la bdag cag dogs sa mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub ni tshal de la zhe bar rtogs// phung po
85b7(dkon brtsegs): regs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dka' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gris ldan pa'i tshal de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs / kham
85b8(dkon brtsegs): dam byer bas zhi dang mi che ma'i 'ching ba 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kur du mchan me rnyed// de dag shA kya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag pa tshan med dga'// de dag byang / 
86a1(dkon brtsegs): // chub spyan bral ni 'amakhas pa'i spyod chu 'thob par 'dus na 'du byarjod las rgyal nas non mo rgyan pa 'ams/ nam 'dun na' mang dul bstad pas bdag can
86a2(dkon brtsegs): nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' ba par gshegs pas 'di tsam nas ni mkhyen blar ba/ das ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// ni byed ni sa
86a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang bablang sdig med shog/ de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas tshangs pa rnams dang // lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas bdag nyid kyi ma tshul dang 'dra
86a4(dkon brtsegs): sru cad padag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa// mi bang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed chud pa sted 'dra zhing // stan gyi sbyin 'dra mig 'phrul 'dra bar ma khyed// rgyal
86a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa'i yon tan med par mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhig rmi lam bkres gyur pas// kha zas rob rgya thos kyang ma 'drangs pa// de la bkres med zad med sems can med// rmi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cadag kyi
86a6(dkon brtsegs): thom pa'i mi zhig zhal ba'i rmi lam na// chub si la dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms med cha bzhi bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyi mchos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'dil byed med mor se
86a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu spong bar 'gyur ba de med ces pa 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tshom yod ma mngar// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig sman// dga' bar 'gyur la
86a8(dkon brtsegs): la 'ayong da // ches nyid med de dag 'gyung ngos pang med// de mabyed la sa che yong ma me 'a zha'i ba slan nam nyanan dang san te// sla zhin sa ya ma sa med/ de sa ma sa
86b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di gnags na// phung po'i nga bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mngang// nor bu rin chen bzhi na gsal dag pa// gos kyi rlung bzhag snga tshogs chen du 'grur// de ltar rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams kyang / 
86b2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa gags pa lta tham/ na me bya myal bral pa/ sa na da gzhudus gyu dag nga bzhin po das / ba ba shes pa rnam pa bas
86b3(dkon brtsegs): ltar me yis drang gi sgra thos te// sgra 'drig las byung na btan byas kyang // rang bzhin gyis steng dngas pa de mi dmigs/  mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi na pasang
86b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khazas la// yan lag srog pan ji ltar 'gyur brtags na// dngos med yan lag srog kyang de bzhin te// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs/ ji ltar mi zhig rnam mkha'i 'ja' mthong na// yan lag
86b5(dkon brtsegs): thigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong // nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stod// drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhigs na// grong khyer
86b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin de bzhin med mi dmigs// grong byer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // me dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bu dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang ba se
86b7(dkon brtsegs): snong// ji ltar sgra bzhin de sbyar yan lag stong // mad pang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzegs// skyes bus ji ltar rngad de brdungs pa'i cho ga sma ni phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs sude badzin 'gag pa
86b8(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyed kyis de bzhin chom san gzigs sa sul busa'i khyang rjed 'ardungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing ldan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag nga sbrad dang 'dra// med bar khyad kyis
87a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus de ltar rnga brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de 'jig rten dga' byarang rtog pa med// de ltar sna bzhin khyod kyi yan lagastong// mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun / 
87a2(dkon brtsegs): sbyar gzigs// skyes bu de ltar rje brdungs pa'i tshe// g.yos med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// de ltar nga bzhin khyod / yan lag steng // mi ba bakhyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes byas
87a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar rnga brdungs pa'i / sgra de yan lags byung rung da'ang min// de ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan laka stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs sa kyi
87a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / me minged kyi bdag pa tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar bstad pas 'khor de yang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur pa gzigs
87a5(dkon brtsegs): sade'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzub mdzad dri med dag mthong nas/ snyang la cas klu dang gan b+h+yaH
87a6(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun subye ba'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'tha ba the tshom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzang sa de la lta zhing thos par dga' te stod// rgyal pa 'dzums dang legs par bka' stsal/ 
87a7(dkon brtsegs): chom dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thab mchog gnas khyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams// nu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang srad 'dzung mas/ 
87a8(dkon brtsegs): tshom rgya gsungs// rgyal ba 'dum mdzad na thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur / la khor 'di the tshom 'tshal nas thal ma sbyar ste khyod la sems// bde gshegs grub pa'i gsung mchog
87b1(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa nyan 'tshal sa// rnam 'dren thub pa 'jam mdzad su de dag rnams la gsungs// thos nas 'grob dga' zhed mchom ma mchis 'phel ku // 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog me sa das rgyas
87b2(dkon brtsegs): tshal// ston pa khyo kyi zhal mdzes pa pa mangs pa 'bral ste// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dra ba'i gsung ba slags gsol// de thos la nga rnams
87b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas pa'i gsang mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das riganas// skye dga' ringamagu pa'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas ches// de dag dog bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub// btsun
87b4(dkon brtsegs): bas chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan rtsom par bgyid// de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa phan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// rkang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mig kho thos nas de yis ni// dge
87b5(dkon brtsegs): thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu ganga'abu 'thob kun la phan pa legs par dgongs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa tabul la tshigs su bca spang sa la
87b6(dkon brtsegs): sprul ba// thal yis pan byed 'jus pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa la nges pa de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bas gas pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/ 
87b7(dkon brtsegs): yin dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus tsam// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' seng chos rnams la ni the tsham med// bskal pa lag khrig gang gA'i phye ma gad du dge ba legs par gyur/ 
87b8(dkon brtsegs): ba du rnam par dag la pa chags yang gar 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'chad rgya sems ma bskyed// 'di dag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gzhal
88a1(dkon brtsegs): ba// gang gA'i byem snyed na dul bas la thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs laganas// de dag kyi nas 'ad bar gshegs pa che san sangs rgya cig// srid pa sal cing 'grub stong par na
88a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// stob pa de dag de ltar spyod pa sa tsho'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyu// bde gshegs mtha' las grags ldan 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'thal cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi
88a3(dkon brtsegs): ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyis bskal pa khrag khrig nas padu yar ni kha sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsungs kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus// de tshe de dag ye shes
88a4(dkon brtsegs): khas ldan zhes bya'i rgyal par 'thun par 'gyur// g.yob med cing sems med mi gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag gi mchog rnams su sgrib pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam sbyangs pa yi/ sems can
88a5(dkon brtsegs): cig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de la pha la cher mya ngan 'da'/ de dgan ni de che 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// me rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa thams cad yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i
88a6(dkon brtsegs): ga bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo 'thun 'gyur ning sde ba'i lam la myur par 'gyus// den mi rnams dag gi sgra slad dang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// maM skrag mi rtag de bzhin
88a7(dkon brtsegs): da dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stod zhing mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub ni// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rnal gnas par 'gyur// sgra gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba
88a8(dkon brtsegs): grol gnas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sbe de zhing dam brtsig pa dag dang gangan 'ang yong la 'asrur// blag pa med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams na med// de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis
88b1(dkon brtsegs): na kwa brgya dang ldan pa / dbyangs 'thar// cha 'dres pa'i nyes pa mad cing 'dod chags dang nig sdang dag/ gnyisug dgags ga 'a dzan tu// 'grob rtsams cad 'a
88b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing myang na 'das 'gror 'gyur// de che zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang par 'gyur// skyes budam par dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub pa cen byas nas// drang srong chen po dag ldan lam gyis nes
88b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di bsdams te// zhing mchog den sems can tshogs gang yod pa de kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa tu chen ni ba 'grobs mthong gyur na// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa
88b4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs kyis bstan gyung pa// de la bslabs nas 'gro ba thams cad thugs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston// de lta bsam rdul kun 'dug la mkhas pa'i
88b5(dkon brtsegs): da pa bsten par gyis// tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu ba'o// de nas 'od gsal gyi lta bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung
88b6(dkon brtsegs): na pa yang thos nas chem zhing mgul ye ngas te/ rab tu dag zhing dga' ba dang yid bang ba skyes nas stan las langs te/ blags phrag pa gcig du bzhos nas bra me g.yas pa'i lhangs tshugs te/ 
88b7(dkon brtsegs): na 'das gal bang logs su thal mo sbyar ba brgyad rnas bcom ldan 'das la 'disad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas nam la 'dag pa'i skang du gangs bsrabs das chom 'a
88b8(dkon brtsegs): ba 'byung ba'i ting 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba nas pagyib ma ches te/ des tshas thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas pas 'i gyes mi thab pa 'i sos pa
89a1(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'i spobs pa dang / byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i sdebs pa dang / 
89a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa'i skabs par/ zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mongs ma yin pa'i stobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// 
89a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad snang pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par
89a4(dkon brtsegs): pathams cad yid la mi bgyid de// de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba ste/ chos gang yang rnam pa
89a5(dkon brtsegs): ba dus pa ma mchis te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la'i ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par
89a6(dkon brtsegs): drug pa'i stobs pa rab tu thob cid / de dag a'i sgrol zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a shes bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/ kun du mtha' yas pa/ ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus
89a7(dkon brtsegs): bas pa/ yongs su ma grub pa dngos po la mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ migasog/ 'dubs mchis pa/ 'thob ma mchis pa/ rtog pa ma gcas pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pal bsgrubs pa/ 
89a8(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa ma mchis pa/ mi brtags pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa/ ma mthadag pasam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par mtsha
89b1(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma sbas pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ sadapa ma mchis pa/ 'angs pas mchis pa/ zhab sa lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma brtags pa/ gdags pas
89b2(dkon brtsegs): chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'phob ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag du ma mchis pa mi za ga gnyis su ma mchis pa/ 
89b3(dkon brtsegs): da ba/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa sho 'i ma lags pa ma skyes pa ma 'gags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa/ mtshan mas ma bskyong
89b4(dkon brtsegs): ma bzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtad du ma mchis pa/ yongs su gtad du ma mchis pa ma btang ba/ yongs su ma btang ba ste/ a zhes brtse ba ni su
89b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po yang ma lags so// a ni la skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags sa// a ne ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni
89b6(dkon brtsegs): ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i chur 'gyur ba ma lags so// a ni sa 'gags pa yang ma lags ste/ chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// ya ni gnas pa yang ma lags meg
89b7(dkon brtsegs): pangam lags/ a ni btags pa yang ma lags/ ma btags pa yang ma lags/ a ni spangs pa yang ma lags/ ma spangs pa yang ma lags/ a ni shes pa yang ma lags/ mi shes pa yang ma lags/ 
89b8(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa yang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa yang ma lags/ a ni sdod pa yang ma lags/ mi stod pa yang ma lags/ a'i dmigs su mchis pa yang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa yang
90a1(dkon brtsegs): / a ni batshan ma yang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa yang ma lags khas de smon pa yang ma lags/ smod pa pa mchis pa yang yu lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar nachos
90a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni tshul gcig pa ste la'i tshul lo// chos thams can ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste/  ba'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'dug pa gcig pa ste ma la 'dun
90a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// chos thams cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste gas gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyed gcig bsnga la'i bskad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste as brjod pa'o// bcom ldan 'ang
90a4(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos yang 'byung ba de dag ri dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang mgrub pa de dag/ 
90a5(dkon brtsegs): mgrub pa'i rdul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyi sa rtogs par ba gyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dus ma bgyis yang dag ni/ 
90a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs pas kya/  chos mas ca pa rjem lo// bcom nal sa rgyas gas snreb ga ga ra rigs par bstanan/ sa ste/ dben la
90a7(dkon brtsegs): sa 'gyu de bzhin du chos thams cad bstsu bar bgyi'o//  ci'i slang du na/ bcom ldan 'das rmil ma gyi bya ba nem skyes ga/ mthung sa/ dngos pas mchis pa ste/ gyon kyang de ga la~M gdags pang gsu
90a8(dkon brtsegs): da kyi skye pa tshal pasacog/  ma ma 'das / ben she la tha tshas pa ba ma thams sa shes lang kya gakhang gyis ma na
90b1(dkon brtsegs): la gags pamams cad can duchos tham byar phya gdags pag yo// mam ldan 'as ga //  dpe cig tu sa rab tu gdanas pa'i thaskad mas pa bzhin du chos thams cad kyim skad pa sgrub bkyigs / 
90b2(dkon brtsegs): das 'dis ste/ dpe me lang gi dkyil 'bod sa zung med cig nas sag ste bu'i gzus kyi thaska sa des ngo bzhi du sa thams cad sa ba ya ba tu bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dag pa
90b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba'i slad du rmilam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi'i rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du mig yong dang / smig tu da / brag ci'i bya ba dag kyang tha skad du
90b4(dkon brtsegs): ga ca la bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'drid chos thams cad srung ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces
90b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol nas 'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad padag gis mngon par bstod pa// bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs/ 
90b6(dkon brtsegs): rnamakhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// de la 'jig rten po med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis 'on me chud// bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis mi 'grob stong// sbru mags
90b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra rgyam mchis la chab kyi 'du gas can// byis pa da ga blo log de bzhin laphrul ta bdag tu stor bamam byed// de nas yang dgam 'tshal ma masas gnas min ngos pa rten kyang 'tshal//  na gyis
90b8(dkon brtsegs): sreg tu 'dra ba'i phung po 'od ma 'cha la zha'akhor bar dga'as thug dru drug cid sdug bsngal de yas bang po'angs// gangal mi mkhas nges par sdug bsngal myong ba la dngas ma mchin gang mi na
91a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngas rnamasas bde bar 'du shes do la// tan pong 'jigs pa co na gsus rnams ma su thon nga// 'ad gas nas gte sags chen tan dus mtshus da
91a2(dkon brtsegs): rlu nga dag sdug bsngal gang shes sdug bsngal gyung ba'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnamapa de dag su nga byis pa semakhas gnod pa'i bu yang bya ba/  dag rgyal ba'i tshul na thang pa bgying bskyod pa'adi thos nas/ skye
91a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa zhan de dge bstan dag bde ba nyid kyis 'jigs// bdi gshegs khyod kyis a yis yig tshul chen sgogacig de ltar bstan// de la yang dag blo canas las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba da / 
91a4(dkon brtsegs): dang bcas btul byang chub zhi ba mngon 'tshang rgya// yan lag brgyad pa'i klu bcas skyebo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs bcad mkhyen nges pa rnams na tshul gyi dam pa ngas// myur du nyon mongs dug bsal/ 
91a5(dkon brtsegs): chub dpag yas zhi ba 'thob 'gyur zhing // grol nas drug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas// pha rol mur phyid drug med bde zhing 'dug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad// bde gshegs thams
91a6(dkon brtsegs): cad stod yang bdag tu rtog rnams tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min bslabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la chags med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos// de yi tshul mthong / 
91a7(dkon brtsegs): rdol la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'tshed dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa ches rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang mnor de bzhin nyid ni mi 'dag nyon me mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med
91a8(dkon brtsegs): srid med la nyoran pongs rnams kyang med// gang gis tshul chen ngas pa 'di mthong de dag thams cad ma khyer du byung// grol zhing dgrol mdzad ni pa'i chos can gi mdzad ngo mchar 'gyur mi mngal// bcom ldan ltar 'as
91b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten dbyes sag tu nan dul bral pas/ na gad nan ga 'i rtse ma nos gro u cwa sa bcog kyi me pa mas kyis semam kyang // nga sa nga dus nga nga kyo gang tu de
91b2(dkon brtsegs): degashegs pa lta nga sa rgyas rnams kyi spyod dul tshul ni bdag cad pal/ des na ltar bad gshegs ni rjegs pa pe dang nges pa// dge ba'i blosang bdag ga cang dri med chos kyis rang tu mchod par 'ashur / ngas rgyas rab
91b3(dkon brtsegs): phags pa'i na rgya pastod pas bsod rnams gang byung ba// de snyed dpal sdug na gnyis gcogs rnam ldan yongs su mkhyen kyang 'o// bdag cag da de yis 'gro ba di kun 'das kyid nyid rdzo go// bsod dngas
91b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro kun gyi don bsngo kun kyang rgyal bar shog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od gsal gyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i ngasam pa yongs su dag pa dang // tshul gyi rjes su bgro ba'i spobs paphun sum chod pa pa yang thugs su chud pa
91b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gis kyang kyang par tho par 'chung ba sa byed nas de'i tshe 'dzun pa mad do// de nas tsho ldan pa tu thul gyis bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten don ma ral par 'dre ma cho ga kun ma khyen
91b6(dkon brtsegs): dbral gnon pa// bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyam mchis par ba'ang mdzad ni// rgyal ba dpal sul da gnyis gagi pa 'jig rten thugs bcas bka' stsal gsol// 'jig rten 'dang spang
91b7(dkon brtsegs): yang na bdag cag rnams la gsung sa// gtso ba thos 'grob mtha' dag yid ni bta 'a da// rnam par 'dred pa sa bya las dang 'bras cu gnal las brtsod par 'gyur// des ni
91b8(dkon brtsegs): dkor bar drug sngal nyam thag // 'dags la ma yan lag brgyad brtan thaM dang rgyas tsha napa rnal ba lung//  chen po'i gsu ga na lag btu
92a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dgel brtson shi dga' bar 'gyur//  tsam bral gAng dam dag med kyis con 'grus drag ci rdzo sa bskyed ci // de bdag zhogs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bkyi myong sa na / 
92a2(dkon brtsegs): sras su yur// 'bod rnams brten pa gzhan ma mchis par 'dren bakhyod kyi nas du lta// 'gro ba'i rtsal gton pa yin gnyis pas pa 'ad bka'i chung byal du gsol su bcom ldan 'jig rten 'did/ khyod chen ma na
92a3(dkon brtsegs): kun pa shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung dab legs brjod bdu rtsi'i rgyar ngob gang dun rnam pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// dren pa chen pa kyad byi ba song di ga tsang sangs rgyas yon ta 'tshal// de du song ba'i mal bu lnga bzhin du/ 
92a4(dkon brtsegs): da kyigal dulta// bde gshegs lha rnams srung bstan bka' byol bzangad pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyeb pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'ji ga rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa de ring su zhig dge badzim
92a5(dkon brtsegs): dgrags pa don duganyer// su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nya na 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa dedag thos shing dgar gyur nas// tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobasas
92a6(dkon brtsegs): shes rab la yang sprom par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta rdul la tshogs su bcad de skar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyi spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pashin du lags// bde ga shegs
92a7(dkon brtsegs): dam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'byur zhing // stobs pa rje 'byung da pyir gang dang gang dag kyad kyis dris srung ba// de dag lung bstan ba shad kun kya dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis// 'odags pa
92a8(dkon brtsegs): rnams tho ni sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'dog sbyin sgron med pa ca 'di da mthang nas byang chub yang dgazugs// byang chu 'anges 'byung lam mched yang dag rgyal bas kyang spyad pa// byang chub gro 'dod gang kyi ston
92b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ston ba thug tshul kya ba pazhin du ma na ma na// ngas rgyas yo dodagan sa de tsaldan man ba cud/ de dag stom sa kyis tshul dang rdul yin pa 'a sha rna
92b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di nges 'byung //  skyes sa bzhin dga' bas byung chub mchog da dag ston la ba ta// 'odags la stan pas 'ag bya chub ngal bya sgri bstan te// ban la pa khrag khrag 'arjod med pa byama'i tshul 'ad ba stan byas
92b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can sa dang 'brangs pas ches mang bdag byang chub dga' byis te/ de 'og tu dag rternam ngas par byung na bral bu ma khyen 'grur/  ga zhi mchog brjod du med pa ni rnams bye ba brgya 'grangs pag/ yangs shing gi
92b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis btsun pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khos long ma 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thugs brjes sems can thams cad dang 'byung mdza par gyur// zhing rnams
92b5(dkon brtsegs): / dgag nga na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang 'byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'grogs pa med par 'gyur// de na dang 'byung sangs rgyas nyid ston ma dang pa 'jig rten khangs rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni
92b6(dkon brtsegs): bye ba rgyang grangs gang gA'i bye snyad 'gyur// bul 'jig rten phrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan bzlas pa pas// gang yang skyes pa'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byang na// bsod nams de ba sdamasas
92b7(dkon brtsegs): sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'thung ba rnyed sla min// de ni u du mag ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas
92b8(dkon brtsegs): byal zhems gsas// pyi ba sa bya ba mi yang yo pa pas/  bste sa semasasapa sa bya/  shegs ces pa don kyi sa
93a1(dkon brtsegs): thor nas// 'khor rnams thams cad de na stso d+ha dga' ning bang dag dga' bar 'grupa// khrag breg sa rnams rnam papar mad nam gos skyegs 'a mo 'dod par byod// dka' ras sa su
93a2(dkon brtsegs): phrug kyod la phyag 'tshal la zhes su yang phrang // de ba zhugs kyi skye ma nyon mangs rgod pas na kyur zhi ba mang nga// bdu dug gsum na pa dang sems can drug ni bsdug tugasol// b+h+yod kyi pa
93a3(dkon brtsegs): nas skye ku'i dug med 'gyur zhing dgra mar 'gyud// sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren las tshul thos mi bzad srid pa'i rgyud las grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste ny-i shu rtsa gcig pa'o// 
93a4(dkon brtsegs): ba/ denas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis lham yin rnams nas 'od gsapa pa'i lha'i ba dag gi mchod pa yang mthong // lung bstan pa yang ces nas ci ma ning mgul ye ras te/ rab tu
93a5(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par gyur ba yang brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i
93a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad par pa'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngam
93a7(dkon brtsegs): skyed ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nyes
93a8(dkon brtsegs): pa lus pa la ngas kyang pa drug nangs sa ga/ na pa ma snal gan pang sdug pas bya ba'i 'du nas ba gas pa gzung ba dang/ thas ga shes sathas sa/ 
93b1(dkon brtsegs): / lcag gis gnas kya de ba'i 'a shes nye gnas pa rgyang sa dang / tsanangs gragagag cag sngams kyi thog gags/ yod sasan bya bar rje
93b2(dkon brtsegs): sa/ dugs kyi snod ltang bdugs sam/ bur ma shing brdungs bltar brdus sapa/ 'das
93b3(dkon brtsegs): shes nye ba gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i nang du bang gi/ se ga'i bar bsgrub mas pa/ sdug gi la bstabasas pa/ skam 'i 'bya ba sa jil tag/ byi ba'i che pa dus pa cad das/ shes sgrub ba gas pa ltar bsngags sa / 
93b4(dkon brtsegs): ka rdug Na tsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye bcoM balngar bcos sam/ glang po mi rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'drar ba dang / mig byung dam/ gas pa ning gi rdzi mi la ba na// gam// gas ba'i gnas/ 
93b5(dkon brtsegs): dade rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba yang ma lags/ mi bde ba yang ma lags pa'i 'ang shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar rgya
93b6(dkon brtsegs): mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la kha zas byin pa de dag nye bar nye ba'i bdeng thob par gyud cig// gang gis bdag la skom bla pa dang / gang
93b7(dkon brtsegs): se bdag la rim go byas pa dang / bkur ste byas pa dang / bsdu stang byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar ni bar bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi de bar byed pa dang / 
93b8(dkon brtsegs): / mchod kyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams cad kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshar dub
94a1(dkon brtsegs): ces smon lam padab ste/ da yangs bya ba de dag dang san ning dang lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i sgro lam dang ldan pas sems canathams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i ba ba'i 'du shes pa snyed cing se la rlom na /

94b1(dkon brtsegs): seMchis// de dag mangs pas mchod pa'i thangs rgyas donam khyen 'bor ba na la gyu pa// thub pa mi yi 'dren pa'i rdul ma khas rtul ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod/ 'din dang bzhin des pa'i grub chos gnas pa gad 'dam mchis te/

94b3(dkon brtsegs): dasems can sro zhi dang shed bu gsuM gang zabrang mchis te// mi mchog khyod kyis 'du zhes rnam par bzhig cing stong bar nam gnag sa// rkang gnyis ngam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom pa'ang mdzas/

99a8(dkon brtsegs): dang ba dag me'i khams dang pa dang / rlung gi las sa nang ba ni rang ba zhim sa mchis mthu chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pade ni yongs su sagrub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i mig gi skyem med de ni 'das pa zhes na
99b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a 'das/ pa'ongs pa dang / dastang thung shes padag pa pa na dukyi ba ma mchis pa'o//

99b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang sngal zhes gang gas par bkri ba'i tsheb dgang pa dang migs pa ma mchis ta ming ba bci du brjod dupa mchim so// nabadab sna dang lde dang lam dang / yi dang / gzugs dang / spadang / dri dang / rodang/ reg bya dang / 
99b5(dkon brtsegs): sa bzhin te/ de'i drad du se mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thog gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo// del ba pa 'i la 'jug pas gnas 'thob pa ni mig ni cig gi sa ma mchis pa/ khams ni lams
99b6(dkon brtsegs): dece'i sbed dugan/ sa namagag pang bzhin dang bral ba// khams khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral babaslad dung / chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni la
99b7(dkon brtsegs): gsangs su thu pa'i na kyi ma mchims// gang ngam mchis bdal 'gag pa ma mchis so//  ma skye sa 'gags pa de ni ring dang / shAs ma nga/ bdatsa dang / kun rdzob byud/ 
99b8(dkon brtsegs): btsam ma gtogs par 'angs pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi bar ma lags so// ming de yang meng gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de yang brjod pas
100a1(dkon brtsegs): bse/  gang sa rang bzhin pa thams pa med ngas ngom ma chis pa'o// gang la po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub ba ste/ yongs su mgrub pa'i slad bye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang
100a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bkye ma lags so// gang dus gzu mdu
100a3(dkon brtsegs): par bkye ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha sad ma mchis pa/ pad ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dres pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 
100a4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags paN dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas/ 
100a5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ rten lags pa/ thob pa ma lags pa/ tho bar bkyi bam lags pa/ rtogs pa ma lags pa/ rtogs par ba kyib ma lagasas mdod du bgyis pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bkyi bam lags pa
100a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bo'i sa ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyis ma lags pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa ste/ sa yang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa yang ma
100a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni de bzhin nyid dang / mno pa de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / shi bdang / mtshan nyid ma mchis pa ste/ tha skad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha skad du de bzhin gshegs pa shes pakyi stong
100a8(dkon brtsegs): ra ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang bde bzhin gshegs pa zhes bkyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par shezhes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / 
100b1(dkon brtsegs): ga yid zinam par shes pa'i khasu pa ba dang rgya cha ga thams thams cad kyis la gyi ldings 'ang thug 'a gyi'o// tsham ldan 'das chos kyi gying sa ni phung po btugs chos kyi ngas nyid mi 'dog 'am
100b2(dkon brtsegs): mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byu bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid kyi 'dod/ chom kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags cang de dade sa chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dod / 
100b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dab 'di lta ste/ dper nasa'i sems ni ming ga dang gang gis tha ste du bgyis kyang deng nges sa'i khams nyid mi 'dong // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha skad dub ci bdeng de cos kyi
100b4(dkon brtsegs): da mi 'dor// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na tshwa'i khams dang / me'i 'ams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nang ma sa le mas ni ming grang dang gang gis tha sa du bkyi bded des chu dang / med/ rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams
100b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba deng denges chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar nam mkha' la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs
100b6(dkon brtsegs): bas spobs pa 'thob go// com ldan 'das de la dbang pol 'dug pas chos kyi byi la 'jug pa nid pa bo nyi bu gnyis te/ 'dis ste/ cig ge dbang po dang / na ba'id yod pa/ sgra'i dbang pod/ kwa'i nga
100b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbang po dang / yid ci dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dag/ po'i dbang po dang / thog gi dbang po dang / med pa'i dbang po dag sdug / bsngal gyi dbang po dang / yidabang ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi me pa'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms
100b8(dkon brtsegs): dang / dad pa dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po sa

101a2(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa'o// gang la dngas pa ma mchis pa den yongs su ma grub par// gang yos su ma thub pa de mi n+d+heH/ gang ma rgyu na'i 'gagag/ gangs rgyas ni 'gag bden 'das pazlas gdags par bgyi pa ma lags/ 
101a3(dkon brtsegs): 'o nga/ kun byung ba shes gang gas par bgyib ma lags so// gang du gsum pyi dmigs padzin min ma lags dbang pom lags so// gang rtsegam lags dbang po ma lags pa de'i zas ji ltar 'tshal
101a4(dkon brtsegs): / 'di lta ste/ dper na chad pa stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags pa rabs kyi/ dod dam par ni stong pa yang mi migs/ chad pa yang mi dmigs // de bzhin du
101a5(dkon brtsegs): dang gang po yang chad pa stong pa sta sa ma nyid pa mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa te/ gsog gsas log pa/ sgrub chos can/ byas pa rji pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar meng du gdags pa
101a6(dkon brtsegs): byab kyi/ dod ma par nomog kyang ma ma gsung ba nga yang mi dmigs de bcom ldan das kyis thamasacad ma khyen pa'i ye shes skyes nus dri la du na ldog lpagags pa'i sems can nams 'a dang

101a8(dkon brtsegs): gasruba'i ches can/ byis pa 'dri pa/ glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa/ rang bzhin da bral ba ste/ de ni mi skye ma 'gag go// gang sa skyes ma 'gags pa deni 'das pa shes gdags par bgyi bam lags/ ma 'ongs pa

101b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ shes par bkye ba ma lags pa/ rnam pam zhes pa/ rnam par shes parab kyi 'am lags ga ma thos pa/ thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnam par ma rigag/ rnam par rig par bgyi 'am lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs

101b4(dkon brtsegs): 'diHste/ dper na me nig ni lam nanod pa dang / dka' bdang / ces pa dang / dga' mgur spyang bdag nyal nyal ba lasas rjes spya ngan la de dran pade par myi 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i srud ste/ na/ rmi
101b5(dkon brtsegs): laman yang me des nod pa dang / dga' ba dang / ces pa dang / dka' mgung spyad pa de dag ma thi brnyenan/ nyal ba las sadapa' tshal pos kyang 'tshal // thob pa dang / rnyed parabagyi bde'i gnas ma mchis /

101b7(dkon brtsegs): srab mchis pacwo/ de dag ni 'das ba zhes gdags par bkyi ba ma lags/ ma'ongs pa dang / dalta byung ba zhes gdags par bgyib ma lags so// gang dus gsu mdu dmigs su ma mchis de gni 'arjod du ma mchis ba zhes

102a1(dkon brtsegs): / de ltar na bden pal 'jugru pas chos kyi dbyis la 'dug par bgyi zhen/ bzhi po 'di dag ni bde pa ste/ sdug bsngal dag kun 'byung dang / 'gog pa dag / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang

102a3(dkon brtsegs): mang byen/ gan 'brang ba sa chis pa la sa bami mchis pa'i mang du'o// bcos nga da 'grog pam mchis bya'i nga dul bam mchis pa rig par bkyi'o//  da shes gang spo ba mi brjod pa
