104b1(dkon brtsegs): ma ma rgya'o//  ma na 'ad du na na du bzhin gshegs pa ldan chom la mtshan dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon pa zhen pa'o// de ci'i da du nam
104b2(dkon brtsegs): ni gshegs pa ni zlog pa'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las bzlas so zhes mchin de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i
104b3(dkon brtsegs): papa la mngon par zhan pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcod ldan 'das chos thams cad de sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
104b4(dkon brtsegs): shegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes mchen de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos gang la yang phan pa'am/ gnod pa'o// 
104b5(dkon brtsegs): dab bar nye bar gnas pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gangalal zhige 'dig dung bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'dubyed 'donas mtshan dedag thams cad ni ba'i rnamangal mngon par zhen pa'o// de'i sred den/ bam
104b6(dkon brtsegs): na 'das chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba'am/ len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang lang zhag 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'du nga re skyengs bu yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes
104b7(dkon brtsegs): chen/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi byings ni la bar ba'am/ yong sas mya ngan las 'dab ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das ganga' la zhig 'di lta bu'i
104b8(dkon brtsegs): ngo langs par gyur de gsapa yang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir me geb ste/ bcom ldan 'damam kyi kyi ma ni 'thu ba ma mchis kyang gda'i/ rigs kyi bulal// rigs kyi bu ma de dag ni ldan me
105a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon pa rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'ang mi gyur ba mi gda'o// / bam pod kyang/ den pa zab rtse ba'i sa bye ba drag brgyad 'argyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga chos nyidapa// 
105a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro brjod pa pa tshaldan las kyigapas la sag sa byug 'tshal rtse/ bcom ldan 'as palanags pa mo babyu mthal ma / phyogs gci tu nas tshe ma na la tshigs / 
105a3(dkon brtsegs): can bdag gis mngon par bstod pa// bdeg shegs sa thu chen 'dren batshul da tshul mini sa rkyen phyag 'tshal lo// 'grib kun 'jugs rje thub pa yang ngas rje bzhin ston dzas// 'dren pa rgya la mabyas khyod
105a4(dkon brtsegs): la ni yang dag nyid du yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon 'amar phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyis byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis bya
105a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa gsal yas zhi bshis pa mi g.yo ba rnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa// mtha' yis yon tan mnga'i zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// zung
105a6(dkon brtsegs): dpas ni nga bo nyid stong shin tu bu po rnams dang bral// byis tshangs byed rnams rnye sa thal bar byed kyis yongs su brtags// gas mi ldan skye tho nga la chen 'di cis rlo la sre thogs pa dzin// grol ba
105a7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dod// khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun du stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na thag ca rnam pa kun du shin tu sma dang bral ba 'dra// des ni rim pas skye sa
105a8(dkon brtsegs): na// de bzhin mi shes mang po bcings// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skyemached nga ma nyid kyis rtag tu s+ho zhes thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag ma lag
105b1(dkon brtsegs): yun sbya/  pa ga /  ma ba//  pa dang 'di dang zhid kyi na rgya/ 
105b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du khyod// rims skyab pa dadag ma 'tshal mang ba / de gas// bud bamam nying srog chags dag ni rgya la grags pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems na tham
105b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzung // rna pa sems na chom rgyas brnags rlob bzhin du gaN+DI sa// semapas skyo pa dgang bzhin tshal mang ba 5/  la dag rtogs rnams da sas
105b4(dkon brtsegs): byabazhin thol/ rtenam tshocanams de dag srid ci pa stog shi mig mchis/ kyil mdaga' ba bzhi da ngo gardzangangs pagyis byis pa mongs papad pa na mini sa rtog pa'i mang nges pa 'i mengs sri mi bamamo// 
105b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin rdol// thub pas chos nyid bas mangs de bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhib myang ngan 'das pa dri bzhin chos kun mtshan pa
105b6(dkon brtsegs): thal/ thub pa khams gsum mi tshigs pa nang chos kun gnas sa ma mchi te// de skad tshul gcig 'di 'tshal thud na 'gros na bde ba gshegs par 'gyur// grub pa bdag dang gzhan du min rjes
105b7(dkon brtsegs): bzed// tha pa'i segs rgyal ba'i bstan pa bezhin gyis ngan bas ma mi byag// thub byas pa'i spyod sul ma lags ji bzhin cis sun brtags pa la dpa/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi da 'didir thags de na
105b8(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi// mimams gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhalasas pa rtse shes pa bdang // gang dudag tum brda 'khor lo ma pa gagal la mchog bskor sgrub dang // gang dag pa de gshegs skyeb pas sgog chags
106a1(dkon brtsegs): / theg sa nga sras thAb// de dag mas cad pa dag pa 'tshal lta bathabs pa yongs sud cig// gang dag pa par gshegs pas tshe kyad gtang ba chubu pa dang // gang dag spobs bcu 'gro 'dom
106a2(dkon brtsegs): sa mya ngan 'das smrab// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chags bdud kyi le gtu mches// chos rjes de shi nyid pa 'tshal te 'dren sa maskyen pazhin 'tshal bar brtse// gang dag tshul dang rgyal min 'di lam ba
106a3(dkon brtsegs): 2//  ge dang gnyis co la shA di gyen byags pam rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid sa sa na nyi lags// de ma sa tshal rtsa gas tshu pa ma la
106a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur ba// ston pa'i spyan snga brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de snang bstan byas nas// kha cig pa rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du bdag thong sa
106a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dresras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par snar// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'bras bu che ba'i snyi de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun su mtshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par thugs sa chu na
106a6(dkon brtsegs): nanams kyi dge ba rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir de'i tshe 'dum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa te thul gyis bcom ldan 'das 'tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// dang la snag 'dren pa rnams ni mu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pang / 
106a7(dkon brtsegs): lags te// nA med me da poka'i stsal bdag gis gshegs mngon sa de da rtse// 'di ltar dren pa rgyad kyis ni bdeb pasil ba'i ma mdzad// tshul ba sna mi g+hasmin thas 'dzugyu pa mdza pa'i sgodog ngas/ 
106a8(dkon brtsegs): // lum na gnas kya kyi ya // cho ga na kyi du da byung na
106b1(dkon brtsegs): drang sa ma ba ga na dan kya mam tshang 'azham/ 'dred padam pa chag gang ga dang / 'angal lu stan pa/ de ga zhi da mo mtha ba can dang 'phrul ba gzungs// mi cho gtsangs pa'i gsung kya
106b2(dkon brtsegs): chom bas la du gsol// de tsas stsa pa'i 'angor 'di btungs 'dings hrugs pa yo// 'de dashegs rgya la mtsha da pa dang ga thams ca gzhan du 'i sems par// 'dren nga sras dang byang chub gzhal las nas
106b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sems shing mchis// thub ba 'dren mchog na 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom bum// des ni leshes stobs ldan tshus dang tshul min mangs kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis ga po'i yan lag 'chang lnga
106b4(dkon brtsegs): /  na y-i/  pa 'phru / das na gas na pa ga'o// 
106b5(dkon brtsegs): yangs byin par 'tha// dzin che po nga dag gi can gyi spyod kyis tha ra// rgyal ba'i gsung cos thu gas panag pa'i rdzogs ni nga bdaga' ste// tshul lagags ni tshul lar la rdza tu
106b6(dkon brtsegs): gas/ grob bcwa thal mang bzhin ya gzhan yang 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ldan pa tu rmil tshogs su da tha la/ 'phrul // tshogs rnams kyi me rtso
106b7(dkon brtsegs): mas// la kyis dus pa cu gas mnges pa legs gakyang 'ing 'a byeb mad 'di ba ste ma ci// byed baman ces kya dang 'dzub cigacig kyis nya/ thang pade bye da
106b8(dkon brtsegs): tharnamapa ga ma gags dang// rnalas ga shes sa nang gnyis dpa dang la sdug rnams de 'dus yang //  nga ci gzhan thos 'thu nas byang napas 'gas sa// 'a me ram 'dun 'das
107a1(dkon brtsegs): ses ca byang chu da phyugs su// ga bdag shi 'dzin rten yon la sa ro/ sas//  ga ga pam khas pa wA na// 'a rgyal na mdzan
107a2(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya// 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdod par rig par bya// 'dzum mchogangs gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'dri gsum 'dzun pa
107a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chung gsangs te// kha cig zang pa'i'adon gnyer lam gsu mdugs pa'i 'jig rten 'dis sbyin nas// des na 'jig rten mkhas padam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdang // tAthA de la nyan thos don du 'dzum ma
107a4(dkon brtsegs): ngogadub par 'gyur// rang rgyal don du 'dzun pa gang mdzad su mi dbus su nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu rub par 'gyu// de ltar ta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam gsam she
107a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis// rgyal ba mchog rnams don dugang 'dzum de kun sa gtsug tu nug// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzu mangs bstan shes par kyis// 'dren pa rnams kyi 'dzum pa gang yin de ku rnam gsum yang bshad kyis/ 
107a6(dkon brtsegs): ra rtse gcig cing byos de ning las legs par mnyan par gyes// dang pe 'don du 'dren pa 'dzu pa sa mdzad myur du thog mar rug/ 'bring gdodan na du chod drung bang bsdad cing byinas nub par 'gyur// rtso mchog ldan gyi
107a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu de du gnas// ta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de theg pa'i dbang gis mdzod// gzhan yang 'dzum tu nam gsum bshad ces ta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal 'phra rtse
107a8(dkon brtsegs): la dror babyed pa na// de dgang la spyod par bskor nas myung du shin du mkhas par 'gyur// 'bring na phyir nisra bcing che la ngas kyis spong babyed par 'gyur// dal kyis galas phyogs paskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyu
107b1(dkon brtsegs): 'a nu ngar 'gyung// gang dag gas brgyan tur dkar snang ba zhag 'dra ba'abade gshegs ma zang gyur na// de ni rkang gnas dam pa thub pa'i phru kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad ma khyen pas 'dzum pastan 'di ni zhing shing ba
107b2(dkon brtsegs): bya/ gang tshe gdugs 'dre mtha' las mig ldan pas ni 'dren de 'gabs pa dang // gang tshe me tog 'dra' 'dren pa'i snying gi mkha' la ldong ba dang // ga che rlo mo 'odra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa// de ni 'jig rten la
107b3(dkon brtsegs): tshang rabang du 'dzub mdzad shes par bya// nga degashegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad dun rnam gsum de tsam bstar// tardzal pyod kyis 'dzum mad chu rnams gsum po de dag shes par gyis// deban 'jig rten dan bstan pa
107b4(dkon brtsegs): 'a'ajig rten gam 'dren 'dzem pa mdzad// de thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tshom med par gyis// 'bras bu che ris lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu rnam pa 'di dag ni// zhid rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba
107b5(dkon brtsegs): 'thur// mabs pade dag pag med kyi ldan bskal pa mang po gnas par 'gyur// skye se bad gshegs pas badzu pa rgya chen mchog gir ba bstan// de dag tsun gyi bsngal ba sum cu drug / gi rgyal ba rnams ca mdzad/ @
107b6(dkon brtsegs): btsumacu phun tu thams cad pakhyen pa bsnyed bcu byung ba spyod// dadung tshul sa khas 'dred bsko'o grangs med dum cu cu drug tu// ga pag chen pa 'dadas rgyal ba rgyamachog mchod 'byed ci gnas// thams cad dur zhun su
107b7(dkon brtsegs): la togs rgyal ba'i chog med byed// da gshosag pa ma ched byang chu shis ngos su ma la bya nas//  pa'i ga la dug gzhes dmi bskyes cog/ len san chen yon tan du
107b8(dkon brtsegs): patshan bskal la 'gyung // rgyal ba de dag bla chog sa zhid na gnas shing rang rangab zhing sbyangs te// sems can dam
108a1(dkon brtsegs): da sa can sa par 'gyur ba da dag ni// gas te bskal pa thag cig dag tu bas bcum nyan thathad 'ams kyag/ legs sa rnams kyi nyan pas 'dus pa dag nams byed 'thang
108a2(dkon brtsegs): 'ju/ su da ga mams dpangs men 'din ci ba/ dems zhes gyur shAng chu ba na / gas par 'grug// de rgyal ba zugs kyi rgyal mas cad pabyen pa nyid pa sa// de ga thams
108a3(dkon brtsegs): gshe 'a rgyas par 'gyu// bdag shes da / rlod pa gas da / rnams kyi da dgug 'dreg rten ma la dag byang 'das par gyur sa dam pa la// de la kyis ga nang bskal kyis
108a4(dkon brtsegs): da tu gnas par 'gyur// zhe sa 'das nas stod pa'i gsung ba des byang chub sems bskyed pa/ gang 'i bung gi khyim pas kyang zhen tu mang ba 'byung bar 'grub// de ga 'das nas stod pa slob pa rnams kyi gsung ba
108a5(dkon brtsegs): sa ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpa ga yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing / 
108a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de 'i gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dad gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// tham
108a7(dkon brtsegs): dag 'das rgyal ba'i dbas la phyag 'chal ste bo sa ldadaga'// bde ba gshegs la dga' ba gnas las bskyed nas chos kyis bsnyen pa bur byus// de ga bas na dga' bar gas la mgo' 'bar bzhin
108a8(dkon brtsegs): ste/ rtag tu shes 'bapa ba byin da dge ba'i bshes gnyen brten byos la/ ba ga sang ba'i spyad pa dge ba 'dis pa du bsten myo te// dge bong kyad cag nang gtas gca pa 'jig rten byas pa la
108b1(dkon brtsegs): // 'bras che du bstan pa'i'i khyer te brdzugasam pal// de na pa gnas samam pa sa kyi lha rnams kyis tha sems can rag tu me sa byang chub tu ma dag par zugs par da ngas sa
108b2(dkon brtsegs): chom med par gyur par riganas tshi ma ning mgul la rengs te rab tu dga' zhi dga' ba dang mede bde bskyes nas bcom ldan 'das ma tshul dang 'drad 'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis zos nas pa par bstod/ dal
108b3(dkon brtsegs): na la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ni srog phangs btang // rgyal srid btangang par ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i 'a tshul khrims la mes pa
108b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa// rnam pa kun du bsnyengs mi mnga'// shin du bslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khri bas ma par byin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu 'bod pa la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis pa'o
108b5(dkon brtsegs): rten mdzad pas// yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor skyed lug ma lags te// brjod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/ brtson pa ma btang brtson 'gru / 
108b6(dkon brtsegs): kham chen brtson 'grus ldan gyur pas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog pa rnyes pa// brtson mthar phyin la phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bubasam gtan la mos pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis bsam gtan pa ser ba nga
108b7(dkon brtsegs): dal 'jig rten gting mi rnyeng // dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ba rnas pa// bsam gtan mthar phyi phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i zug 'i brjid dang ldan pas gsol pa/ dpa' thos shes rab pa rol phyir// yang dang yang
108b8(dkon brtsegs): na// thams cad ma khyer pa nyid parnyes pa/ shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu khams kyi bro gros kyis gsol pa/ sbyin pa dag dang gsan dang // don lung 'a.urd pa do dgags/ 'deg ted de
109a1(dkon brtsegs): / kyis ga/ dzin pa kyad byug kyang 'tshal// lce'i bu ge ba'irnanas kyis gso srog bya ma chen thags ched pod / bu mi runas parnams par de// sems can pag pas mangs su
109a2(dkon brtsegs): do 'dzin ltag kyang 'tshal// 'i zadag pa'i sems kyis gas pa ga/ zhan mo ma med pa'i na /  thams mang 'angs// 'dul mams cad dul yang dang// la la
109a3(dkon brtsegs): drim med kyis gsol pa/ sems dag mnyen pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems dul dbang po ni mang ga// sems can tshud kyi sems mkhyen pa// sems mkhyen khyod la phrag kyang 'tshal// lcen bu gros na
109a4(dkon brtsegs): dgapas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo gros can// blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gas sa phun sum tshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ 
109a5(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rnam par sbyangs// sangs rgyas ning yang nam dag mdzad// sems can tho yang nam sbyangs pa// kun dga' spyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'i thumam pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa samapa se ma 'ag
109a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi ya / da kyi tshigs thams da kya //  gang+gAg ba smra/  byed pa mi gsol gtsud kyis chos rnams sbya ba mkhyen// sems canag yang rnam 'a gyus/ 
109a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ltad / bcos da/ srung ma du sdug kyang 'tshal// kwa'i rtson 'grus bta sa gsol pa/ pa kun yongs su thal gyur pa// chub sa te zag pasnangs// paras byi cing 'angs bzhugs/ 
109a8(dkon brtsegs): 'brus brtan la phyag kyang 'chal// lha'i baspyad lamadang ldan pas gsal pa/ 'ad chan pa spangs zhing she sdang spang ga nagati drug sungs pa rag med pa/ sbyin gnas bsod na pas ning thu pa// 'dig rten 'tshad 'os bya/ 
109b1(dkon brtsegs): sa// 'a ban rtan pasu gsol pa/ yod kyi batshag thabata//  'dag rtenagapa ma du mchod// gcig thad pas bde ba brnyes// dbyang byod la phrag kyang 'tshal//  bum 'khrugs pas gsol pa
109b2(dkon brtsegs): kun sngagagacig gyur pa'i yi// rang gis bstod par mi nus te// de bzhin pad dang da pa'i sa// bde gshegs paskyod par mi rus so// lha'i dumagam pa nyid thobabs gso la/ pa 'batshan po nga ci gam// mtshanas
109b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis can// shes rab zab mablo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ sku chen khyod la sna mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs// yang dag mtha' yas rab tu so
109b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod mchung ba gang zag yod ma mchis// lde'i bu bo thos da bas gsol pa/ gnyis bu med pas yang dag ston// dpa' bod pa'abs rnam par gnod// gang dag za' la zhum ma mchis// de dag tu chos 'o phyir// lha'e ba
109b5(dkon brtsegs): dga' bas gsol ba/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyi slob la bslabs pa'i rnams// bral rnams lpags pa ning 'dor bzhid// sred pa gsum po 'di dag 'dod// lha'i bu nye ba'i yid gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar ma
109b6(dkon brtsegs): thad cing // snying po bdapas zhir 'gyur bzhin// khyod kyis bstan pa skar pos nas// shes rab chen ba myang na 'dag/ wA 'i ni gnas pa nas pas gsol pa/ gang gis kun ma khyen khyod mamang ba'i// se rnams 'dod
109b7(dkon brtsegs): sa pa yang // shas kyim mkhas pad// 'dod tshigs gags pa / gags mang / solapa/ zhi ba'i sems pang 'gas s+hong/ chog/ da la pa // nyon pa
109b8(dkon brtsegs): da zhi gyur pa// dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhiganas 'jig med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi shiganas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dgo/ zhi gnas nyid kyis 'byung 'gyur zhing // 
110a1(dkon brtsegs): de ba shegs las gyu//  she sapas kyis gsomag chos nas can cen me/ pa khyod kyi 'ams// nas canamam tshal // ded de zhin pashegs par grug/ 
110a2(dkon brtsegs): tu rnam par lhubs gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// ye shes mchog gis mnyam bzhag cing // byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsolag
110a3(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin gyur pa// rgya chen khyod pas gang slob pa// ded 'jig rten snang mdzad // sgrib pa med pa gzigs par 'gyur// lha'i tshud byed kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma pyod kyis gsungs// be shes rgya mtsho pos
110a4(dkon brtsegs): nas// de da dri med pa de ba 'phogasabasam gyis mi bya ba 'od kyang 'byung // lha'i bu drim med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad nam mi rtog/ rdzangs pa mkhas pas de dag gsungs// de 'dra yi shes ston pa gyi dang / ded
110a5(dkon brtsegs): ga gas chog tu krub// lham chu ba tu mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing tha ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems pan chis// bdag dang gzhan gyenam 'gyur ba// dag spyod kyis de zhi khyen/ 
110a6(dkon brtsegs): gan med tho gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sems canarnams la bstan mdzad// lha'i bum rten tho gras kyis gsol pa
110a7(dkon brtsegs): rnapas thams sa can ya tshigag sems can ma mchis pa can yin/  lags rmi la sku ru bzhag bzhin// ya ba na ji bzhin kyad kyis bstan// 'i thub sna chubs gsosopa/  gshegs kyad kyis chos kyi rnams/ 
110a8(dkon brtsegs): khra te// khyes panan pa med pa ga/ shesapa 'i na canas mi gna'i bu 'a pa lan yog/ rkyed kyis thab na pan// ma kyang na kyi na// dang 'di mam nas/ 
110b1(dkon brtsegs): dang tsal ba med pa ga shes// bra'i bu gros rnam par tharnams kyis gso pa// tha ma rdzogs migs gyis pa// rdzu ba mang dpos bkun gyu da// dbarje' lags dpazha ga nga/ khrur pa dang mnyam ma mchis// 
110b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dapa'i deng tshul gyis gsol pa/ gzugs brnyan ji ltar me long la// gdang yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mngang // lu'i bu pid gnyis rnam par 'jig gis gsor
110b3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan khu ste// de dasangs rgyas chos kyirnams// de bzhin khyod kyis 'dun pa mdzad// de 'grob kun kyang mapyad// 'a bu rlobs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni lang rdza hA// thA
110b4(dkon brtsegs): b.rab tu 'byung 'gyur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyas pas na// de skad khyod ni stobs pa ldan// rtswa'i bu chags med tho gros kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi chas 'ang thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid pa mchis pag/ yang dga'i bshin ra
110b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab rib bsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bral gyis gsolapa/ kha ngar med cing nyer len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun du nyod pa so'o / de dga' bzhin khyod kyis mabyed/  ba
110b6(dkon brtsegs): na su mtshags pas gsal pa/ chos rnams yang dag pa lags te// 'grod 'ong ba la mchis pa// de dag byed kyis yang dgas byin// de bzhin rab tu bstan par ma da//  bu 'gras mchog gis gsol pa/ nga
110b7(dkon brtsegs): / nga med pa// rmongs pa med cing shes pa med// chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid pa// khyod kyis rang bshin thugs sa chad// lha'i bu sgrib med pob kyis gsol pa/ snang ba ma mchis mun ma mchis// gzugs med ma lags galags can
110b8(dkon brtsegs): 'gyes da kyi bzhin thugs pa rlung //  mem ma 'dzum pas nasal pa/ yul cu can meganas pa// pa ga med pa ma lags papa// tshal 'das rje bzhi nga// de
111a1(dkon brtsegs): na gagag/  kyis gapa lan kya dmas slom la// markye pa ma gags gnas ma gnas pam mchis ga ga zhan kya kyi gshegs// kwa'i ma na
111a2(dkon brtsegs): pa gso pa ga lag sems canamanachis pa// mchis shadapa ma ches pa/ bstan pa'i slad brjod pa kyi ba/ dedag rang bzhir byeng kyi garigs//  bram panas med pal gnas pas gsal pa gang gis tham
111a3(dkon brtsegs): dgas pa'i// mtshan pade dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis par// rnam par 'dzin pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ de ltar mtshan ma skyod gyur cing // sno sa
111a4(dkon brtsegs): mchis dang // su la smon lam mchis gyur pa// de yang de lta'i tshul du mkhyen// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol ga rnam thar sgrol brten bgyis shing // gang zhig grol 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kunan
111a5(dkon brtsegs): yong pa ga/ de dka rang bzhin byed kyis gzigs/ lha'i bum smad pas gsol pa/ khyod ni sdig pa kun spangs shing // bsod nams thams cad pasags gyur te// bde gshegs byed la smad mi mang ba// bu spyod dag ma bas par
111a6(dkon brtsegs): bu klog gi sprin gyis gsol ba/ ji ltar glog pacu sbyin gyi tshogs// char gyisas chen ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis// 'jig rten rnams na ngoms par mdzad// lha'i 'ubasam pa dan yod kyi
111a7(dkon brtsegs): / sol pa/ thub byed gsung na don mchis te/ chos kyi lakhar lo rab tu bskor// shin tu brtags te mngad pas na// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i 'ablo gros phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba/ chos rnams thams ca
111a8(dkon brtsegs): dang pa nyid ces// ma skyes 'gag pa sa lags te// de ga deg shegs kyid kyisas khyen// gaganas ba zhi rtogs par mdza// 'e'u 'a na ngos gsol pa/ khyad kyis tho bad pastar te// se
111b1(dkon brtsegs): nges par zung // khu'i bu ba g.yod rapa gnas kyis gsol ba/ bag yod pa lar ba gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel// saras bcu gzhan yang sangs rgyas chos// bsam kyis mi khyabar ba spel// lha'i zu
111b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bgayod pal brtson pas na// byang chub phyogs rnams yang dag skyes// chu chen dang yang grol gyur nas// de dag rnams ni 'jig rten 'grol// lu'i bub g.yodangs par byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems pa
111b3(dkon brtsegs): thos dag/ ji snyed thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par 'gyur// lha'i bu ba ga yang gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 
111b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dil ma chags par// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // lha'i bu ba g.yod badrungs kyis gsol pa/ byang chub lam la bsten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// Sh+ya ru
111b5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa pa te/ bar gyur// lha'i bu ba g.yod btson gyis gsol ba/ bgayod pa la rab brtson zhing// mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs pa gyis pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bub
111b6(dkon brtsegs): don par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga' ba'i brtan pa rnams// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jig pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa
111b7(dkon brtsegs): mags pa yang rtse// da kyi gas zusas na// rgal gyi ba mas med// khyod kyi chu ni rgya ma thug/  zhiganas can kyi ga lag ma nas da de// 
112a1(dkon brtsegs): // 'das// rgya chung ba dag gang zugs dang // zam dang rnyed de yi'i rigs//  ts+lig nas pa nga dag par gnas pas gsolapa/ sangs rgyas ni gnas bzhugs pa ste// 'on kya de la chags mi ma
112a2(dkon brtsegs): semapa 'i myed la phyag kyang 'jal// lha'i bu ni gnas rdul gyi gsol pa/ khyo gyi sras rnams ma gud pa// niganas kyis ni yongs su dul// bdun pa byebs mi drugs te// 'did chags kyis ni gnod mi 'grus
112a3(dkon brtsegs): 'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsolag/ zhi ba'i yid mngar ni gnas la// dpa' bo chen po bsgom mdzad pas// cil gnas te bsam gtan mdzad// lus kyang spyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i grwa ni gnas sngon du los
112a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ ston pa sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// bdag gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur ba'i// chos ga/ na de yi rjes su brang // lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'dza
112a5(dkon brtsegs): na ston ma'i ni gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa 'dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyis 'chir// dpyod bza' yas dbang du byung // lce'i bu ni gnas skyed dul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod sul
112a6(dkon brtsegs): / zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med skyed pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i buzhi gnas brlan gyis gsol ba/ bsam gtan gyis ni sngon brlan te// shes rab kyis na sdom
112a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas pas// dbye rdzogs pa'i rgyachu banas// de na kyi rnams kya chen//  ni gnas pa med gyis gsol pa/ sas rgya chos rnams nang ma yang //  gsan pad/ sa pa mtshang ste// gnan
112b1(dkon brtsegs): na thong na// ra byung shed du nges par 'byug/  gas nga mngon dgas gsol ga da ba chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// deg khyod kyis sras spyod nga// rang byung nyid rdza' par 'gyur/ 
112b2(dkon brtsegs): lhag pa 'o zung gis gsol pa/ shes rab par ba byin gnas ni// rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'drug// spad pa'i rgyal ba yin pa ste// debs lhag mthong dag pa lags// lha'i bu mthong ba gnas kyis gsol pa
112b3(dkon brtsegs): 'bras thams cad batshal ba gyis te// yang dag rje bzhin mdzang gyur na// brtan pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'theb// byang chub nyid paganas par 'ad// lha'i bu lcags song ngas 'byung gis gsol pa/ gang zug sog rnams
112b4(dkon brtsegs): sa kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i dran pa skye mi 'gyur// lha'i ru lcag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams sna
112b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i ru lug mthong la mngon par brtson pas gsol ba/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod pa kyi dag/ 
112b6(dkon brtsegs): gnol chogs thams cad kyis// pham par bgyi bar yong sa rus// lha'i ru sug mtho byang gis gsol pa/ chos rnams nam mthong ba kyi spang nga // rgyal sras gang dgazhugs pa'i rnams// chos rnams ba nyid ma
112b7(dkon brtsegs): shang ni thob 'gyug/ lha'i bu lhag ma 'ong pa 'asnyen pas garol ba/ nam chen spyod kyis bur ri du// ye shes bsnyen mdzad ba pa// bsnga can rkyen pa rgyas ma 'di// srog chags bye ba krol bar mangs
112b8(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba lan gyis gsalang/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pa sa thams da byed// 'dren pa dam pa na 'phags/ srid sa rgya ma ma ma byed pa'i// 'jig rten dpes sbrel par ba sa bu'i bu lugs tho gnas
113a1(dkon brtsegs): / gsalag gags ma bashrIn nas ma cing// chos su rnam pa gnyigs pas// sa thas chos rnams 'a tu / sa rab grod bye 'am/ 'i bu lcags dang mthal pas pas/ 
113a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rnam par 'dzin pa khyod kyi zas// leshes kyi ngani ngas bzung // byang rnam mchog ni thob bgyis shing//  so mas par bgyid// lha'i tha lag mtha la rnam par brtse bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pa
113a3(dkon brtsegs): par rol// chos rnams can la 'jigs ma mngag// zhum pa ma mchis dang mi mngab// rdzu pa 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen// lha'i ru lcag mamong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol pa/ dpa' tshe chen po chos kun ni/ !
113a4(dkon brtsegs): mthong nyid du nga dag 'dra// rang bzhin med par nam mad na// de ni da byung byang chub lags// su'i 'u lhag mthong zhing pos gsolapa/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong shi ma ste// chos rnams sun la 'jigs mi mngag/ 'di/ 
113a5(dkon brtsegs): tan mug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // lugs rje chen po shin du skyed// lha'i bu khrag mthong 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phyir ni zhes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa nges par byung // de dag byang chub mchog kyang 'thog/ 
113a6(dkon brtsegs): grol nas skyed bu 'di dag 'azal// lnga song pa nyid la bstan byas gsol pa/ sto zhin po chos sten pa'i// ma'as pa byang chub 'tshangs ste// sems can cing sa la 'grol bgyi byeng// mamams mam mdan pa par
113a7(dkon brtsegs): co// b+ha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid la mos gyur pa// 'gro ba 'di dag srog me dag zigs// dmigs med nga tha nad med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la stod// lha'i bu stong bzhin kyi smo
113a8(dkon brtsegs): sa pasan can kyi ga ni//  nam zhe sa te// srog cags rnapa pas thugs pa ga/ da du pa /  rlo da kyi mapa pana' lag byan pa
113b1(dkon brtsegs): sad pa// 'jigs snga ga thams cad rab tu smras// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // rnamam pa'i rung banin spyod pa mdang// lha'i chu stong pa nyid la mngon pa dga' 'as gso ma/ ma na mam pasnyen pabyed cing // sas
113b2(dkon brtsegs): lngagang mos pa// de dag ston pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha du sno pa nyid kyis pang dag par 'phags kyis gsol ba/ gang gis 'dren pa 'phags gyur ba// de ni nga dga' bags shes gsungs// slong nyid chos pa
113b3(dkon brtsegs): kye ga/ mang ma ga sangs rgyas ba // lha'i khriseM ldad kyis 'dzin gyis gsal ga dpa po chen po chos rnams dang // byangan das min ston ma mchis// kun kya kyang na 'das par 'dzin// rdza blo chen pa'i byang chu
113b4(dkon brtsegs): 'bu srung pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol ba/ stong nyid zhi ba rnyed das ni/ khyod kyi slob ma yang dag shang// stong pa nyid la gang skyed pa/ de dag rim gro bgyid palags nya'i ro ba nyid bsnyen kyis gsol ba/ gang rnas
113b5(dkon brtsegs): nga ba 'ang sten pa/ mkhas pa da da mangs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing la med rnams// byang chub rdul med tho par 'gyur// lci'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba/ gang rnams stong zhing bsnyen pabyid pa// 'das
113b6(dkon brtsegs): mchos rnams pan su ma tshogs// dang gang pas pa med par 'akrug// 'jig rten don kyang babyed par 'gyur// ma sa ba nyid la yang dad pa zhugs pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos la zhugs sbyar te// gong bzhid la ga
113b7(dkon brtsegs): // de la bdud rnams bye ba prag// snang gis dkrug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol pa/ mtshan pa med la mngon dgyes te// dngos po thams cad rnam bshig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten
113b8(dkon brtsegs): rnams mas dang // mtshan marnams la chags mi ra bal/ lha phre batshan ma med pa la gnas pas gas papa/ mtshan ma med pa gyu //  shes da nams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis// tshul ni bdud kyis
114a1(dkon brtsegs): shes mi // 'i bumatshan sa ma pa'i spyod dus kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi s+hod sul la// 'dren pa khyod na spyod pa dade/ yanamami sa togs dga' ning // ni sung myod phyag tha
114a2(dkon brtsegs): 'i chu mtshan ma med pas sgos kyis gsol pa/ thung pa'i 'bar 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma med papa slong byur te// yab kyi dgor ni gyi gyu // de bzhin gshegs la bgrar sti brjid// rgya can pa med sa
114a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas gsolag/ mtshan ma med pa zhin mtshan du// gang zag mchog ni tsud pa dngas/ lud drib mi dag cad // khyod kyi tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bum tshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol ga cho rnams la
114a4(dkon brtsegs): cad rnam pashig cing // dpa' chen 'jig rten skyon ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas par mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// khwa'i mamatshan ma med pa la rnam par rtse bas gsol pa/ grub chen da 'a bo chenamargya
114a5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med la rnam par rol// mi rnams yongs su smin mdzad cing // pas rgyas me zhes mchog la zhugs// d+ha'i bumatshan ma med pas yongs su gru kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyu sa// de dag kya / 
114a6(dkon brtsegs): grub ba ste// lab gyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma rnam bzhig pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dgag/ 
114a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pal rten pas gsol ga zhes spyod chen ma grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten blan med// 'byung po kun gyi skyab dang rten// dpung gzhen/ 
114a8(dkon brtsegs): da gnas kya sas sa/  canam me lams pas gsamag mtshanam med pa mas gyu ga/ ni dkyil sa rgyal byu pa// sas rgyas rnal ba ma gyu ba/ da pa nga gas / @
114b1(dkon brtsegs): med ba rtogs kyis gsol pa/ mgon po gang dag smon lam ni// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs byas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lhab bu ston pa med pa la ston pas gsol ba/ zhi ba'i thugs pa
114b2(dkon brtsegs): na brjod// srid pa rnams su skyon mi mengs// phred pa yongs su chad pa pa na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten pangam mi gos/ lha'i du smon pa med pa sa skyes kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa langs bcom pa// de dag gzi mchog ste
114b3(dkon brtsegs): pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smod pa med pas bskyed kyis gsol pa/ spyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// sred pa yongs su bcad pas na// srid pa 'jig bapyid srid pa la// deng
114b4(dkon brtsegs): da pa mi bgyid do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ gang dag smon pa'i byed ga/ gaTi R+Sha khyod kyi zas kyi rnams// reb btang zhing snying grol ba// de dag yongs su grol bar 'gyur// su'i bu rtson pa med pa
114b5(dkon brtsegs): sa gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa// de dag kyang na dgon pa rgal// de dag mi nom cing med// dpa' chen khyod ladeng phyag 'tshal// 'i du smon pa med pa des pas gsol pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba
114b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms pa// mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi phab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha la sbyar zhing sred sel
114b7(dkon brtsegs): sems su khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal!/ bi smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i dkon las byung ba rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon mongs dam rnams pa ma mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phrag kyang 'a
114b8(dkon brtsegs): slon pa med pas la mtsham kur pas gsol pa/ g.yul las rgyal bar thar pa ste// khyod ni nam rgyal bam mi mang ga// bdud kyi yang rnams pa ma mdzad cing // srid bkur du smod mi mdzang // lha'e ba skon pa med smo
115a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol ga/ mas la mas ldan pas// dudadu byegags pa yongs pan ci// khyod kyims mam bdu ga pa/ brgya ma dun ma gyid//  sa rnam par rtags
115a2(dkon brtsegs): gsolag/ yum med 'chi ba med du la du// sum 'drigang gis mthong byu ba// de dag sangs rgyas spyod pa dgag// 'drad pa khyod kyi rjes su zhugs// lha'i bu lus dpa par semams pas gsol pa/ migacang dul ba nag bgag
115a3(dkon brtsegs): khrus 'di mi gdangs pasams te// yang dag de bzhin 'chal gyur nas// rnam 'dren khyod la byag kyang 'chal// lha'i bu lus rtogs kyis gsal pa/ lus la mig ca lhags pacis te// sa ladran pa rnam byud cing / 
115a4(dkon brtsegs): lus kyi sdug bsngal nam grol nas// des pa khyod la phyag kyang 'chal// kwa bu lus yangs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sbrus kyi lpags pa ding bzhin du// nag can lus 'di sangs nas ni// de bzhin gshegs pasub tso// 
115a5(dkon brtsegs): mnga' la phyag kyang batshal// lha'i bu lus la spong bas gsol ba/ migacang dring rnag zag cing // dras pa'i lus la rtag smad de// mig cang gang ba rnam spangs nas// 'dren pa khyod la phag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis
115a6(dkon brtsegs): skyobs gsol ba/ gang dag rul ba'i lus skyo zhing // rgyal sras gtsang ba 'tshal ba rnams// chos kyis rab tu bskyed pa'i sras// de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis smag pas gsol pa/ 
115a7(dkon brtsegs): ba chen po sbrul gdug 'jag// gang gis shin du tegs gyur pa// de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gtsapa phyag kyang 'tshal// b+ha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol ba/ lus kyi skyon la mngon sum ste/ 
115a8(dkon brtsegs): gis ga zhes pa'i sbyi pa bas// nga sa rgyas pargyan pas mkhas pad// sre gsu mams cad yongasasug gas// lha'i lus pa 'dod chags da thal bas gsol la/ sum kyi 'dugs 'ad cag
115b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi pa gnas pa// ca tu dran pas 'das pas// rnam 'thal pas rgyas phyag kyang bachar//  bu med pa 'dis blothas kyis gang lag med pa sred pa ma mad ga/ byad kyi med daza 'dugs ma
115b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams gapa babyed // mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'char bya// sA'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol ba/ srid pa rnams rtse nyes dmigs mthong // myangangan 'das pa 'degs med mthong// byed kyi sras rnams 'gro ba na phyir/ 
115b3(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa pa byed// lha'e'i bu phred pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa rnam spangs shing // 'jig las mngon par me dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa// mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
115b4(dkon brtsegs): dbebs pa gyis gsol ba/ mi yi dam pa khyod kyi sras// srid pa srid pa rab ba pal te// khyod kyi bslab la bslabs bdag/ stong gsum 'di na rnam par mdzes// lha'i bu srid las rgal bas gsolang/ srid pa'i
115b5(dkon brtsegs): lab y-i// 'jig rten mgon mchog sa rnams pa// zas kyis rgyun tu bzang ba'o// grang bani 'jig rten 'ad med// rtswa khri srid pa 'joms kyis gsal pa/ srid pa thams cad yongs pabam pa// ba dag
115b6(dkon brtsegs): na spong ba// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu srid pa las rar tu grol bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa zhal// srid pa
115b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyan sangs rgyas te// srid pasi lal phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gas lag sring par srid parab ni zhing// srid pa pam par mdzad nas gshegs// brten pa srid pa mthar 'byen na// khyod yang rnam sa
115b8(dkon brtsegs): kwa'i bu sring pa'i mthar 'grob sa gas la ga srid pa'ababar byed ba zhig// mgan po khyod kyi srid pa'i mazag// khri pa byir 'byin thams cad ma byed// sang brgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu med pa'i tham 'i
116a1(dkon brtsegs): bden gyisags pa/ phre 'i byani nam spangs nas// sred pa pa dzin mdzadag/  gru 'i/ da kyis rgya nga ba mthog/ khwa'i tha srid pa dang / ga pa cang gyis gsolag spyang
116a2(dkon brtsegs): rmed pa stong ma khyeran te// srid pa'i chu yang de bzhin no// lum da shA tu sum mi mnga'// mnyam nyi byung ba phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i ba la tu 'grangs gsal pa/ srid pa'i pha la na lab ste// srid par thaMd pa langang/ 
116a3(dkon brtsegs): bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad// bam pa bcu pa/ lha'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis// sems ma mchi shing rtsol ma mchis khasamag
116a4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzad pa khyod kyis// tshor brgya bu sa bur mkhyen// lha'i bu char ba ston pas gsol ba/ rnga za nyid kyis dngog med papa// tshor bakhyod kyis rab tu mthun// rmilam sdug gi dga' 'drag// del sa pa'i skye ba chags// zhwa'i bu/ 
116a5(dkon brtsegs): tshorab la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// tshor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med pa dngos med par// de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas gsam
116a6(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo blta ka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan// lha'i bu tshang ba'i rgyung la nges pas gsol ba/ tshor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// de
116a7(dkon brtsegs): du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can dang brtul bas// 'gro ba the tshom ma mchis gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ tshor ba'i phung po mkhas pa po// mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 
116a8(dkon brtsegs): pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid pa// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol ba/ tshor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa// rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa'i// mkhas pa rnams kyi mtshad
116b1(dkon brtsegs): kyor ba bdag med da cu gzigs// ltung chong ba las rgal bsags pang/ rkang gnyis gaN bdam ma byed// nas dka tshor ba'i masems dal// 'das lasan lam sdig med pa/ byang chub ma chag 'dis
116b2(dkon brtsegs): sug/  'u tshor ba las gang gis gsol ba// rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// tshor ba rnams ni 'byung ma khyen nas/ tshad ba'i drung bar brkus te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi rang 'o// lha'i bu tshor ba rig sa
116b3(dkon brtsegs): ka mirnams dag la gang 'cher ba'i// nor ba thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// namangs zhags pa 'ched 'i gyur ba// de 'i rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// b+ha'i bu sems pa mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems kyis nam
116b4(dkon brtsegs): bam// bdud rnams kyang ni dpa' bkod ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i 'u se ma yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar ska ma'i mkhan po yis// sbrum sna tshogs sprul
116b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mabyer// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag par rtogs pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'gro ba'i de bcings pa'i// 
116b6(dkon brtsegs): dakhyod kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyed// rnam par 'dren pa rmi lA man// de ltar tshogs kyi grangs
116b7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid par gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyag gis gsol pa/ dul gyur las su rung ba yi// sems kyi rang bzhin tog med pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid pa can pa rjod
116b8(dkon brtsegs): garigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsal pa/ gang gis sems la sems med shes// mkhas bskyed lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sder ba tu 'dul ba gyin pa// de dag 'di zhe dpa 'a shes pa ci// lha'i sus pas kyi
117a1(dkon brtsegs): ma ga'ajugs kyis gso ga ga segs la se sa le shes// de gas sa kya phras lags te// dab men pangs rgyas thos rnams pa// da nga gas// 'i tsun pa ma
117a2(dkon brtsegs): sa gsolag gra shes sems lad ya ces pa// sems can de gnye shi// bdu gags la sna bgrol bas// de dag 'dud ci nga sbyin ci/ pa/ seMn papa gang dag
117a3(dkon brtsegs): rkyen zhing // bsnyen pa dga'ad dpa' bdang / byad kyi bstan la ga mas pa// de dag da pa thus mi 'thung// lce bumams dgapas gsolags ma sa dgal sa rnams pyod byu ci// sa'adag
117a4(dkon brtsegs): kyidapa// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos nas// zab mo nams lagus mi 'gyur// lha'i bu chos nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dka' zhing thogs med pa// de dag mi dbang ma
117a5(dkon brtsegs): dani byin pa lags// kA'i mu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams// chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// 
117a6(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la nges par byung gis gso pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings la nges byung ste// 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gis nges byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod phul
117a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyings shes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' mi khyod nig spyod pa'i// me shes de ni pas ma mi khyab// lha'i chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi
117a8(dkon brtsegs): ga thugs pa// de dag mi shes pa samams te// sangs rgyas chos la chos med// sems can pasas 'de dag ma 'as/ byas ci sa pa bab kyis gsol pa/ ga da na dag ci/ 
117b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi gams// gsas la /  na pam ma sa sa/ gas dag // ngas la med ya pa
117b2(dkon brtsegs): na rnams kyi slongs dang slobs// del ma tshungs bsred pa 'byung / lha'i chos bye byings 'a mabs pas gsol ga spyod na chos dbyes mams paste// cos rnams kun la shin tumapas// lag sa bri ba sku rur bzhag panin/ 
117b3(dkon brtsegs): k+She dbyings kyang rnam par ston// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol ba/ chos rnam dang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos gyi dbyings la bzhugs// mi gunas zhum pam mchis te// bzung ba ma mchisapa
117b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha'adang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chom
117b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi matan pa gsolapa/ ga nga shing gi rgod nus/ skye lda pa pa ston ma ga/ de mi rnon sa chos dkyis s+ho// da tad pa gzugasakyi sa pa brtson pas gsas
117b6(dkon brtsegs): par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes zungs pa khyod kyis 'byed// brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// ye shes pa rol phyin par gyur// klu'i bu chos kyis tshim gyis gsol pa/ da' bo khyod kyis skye ba 'di/ 
117b7(dkon brtsegs): dab kyi ma pa mdza// a kyi byings ni nam mkhyen papa// 'dren pa byang chu'i mchog sa bzhugs/  sa nyid kyi gto nas gsol pa/ gti rnye gra pa'i grob ca// 'dren mo myed kyi ni la du
117b8(dkon brtsegs): rarnam par ma byed pa mi// dren pa pyod la phyag kya 'tshal// lu'i zu gang nganas pa la rab tu gnas pas gsol ga mi mchog dren pa sangs rgyas kyi// se shes gnas 'di chos dpis te// rnam par 'dren pa pa
118a1(dkon brtsegs): / gang smrad sa so// lha'i druganas pa gnas pas gsol ga car gyi dpyis ni gnas can te// khams cadas byed pa 'dud pa'i lag/ den chos rnams thams cadapa / mtshan nyid gcig par shes
118a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i tha gan mngon par shes pas gas lag/ spyod na chom 'byings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan nyid gcig la mams pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yag// na gnyis gtso pa khyod kyis ma khyen// b+ha'i bu gnas nas de sa
118a3(dkon brtsegs): bar byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs pas gsol pa/ chos kyi
118a4(dkon brtsegs): dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rangad byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag na gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol ga gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba// de dag
118a5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yong mi nus// lha'i bu gnas med pa mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag bdag cag
118a6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi spyod ces// ma sa bde dag shi tu dga'/ lha'i zuganas med pa'i dgongs pa lam khas pas gsol pa/ gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chom nyid la ni bgan te// sdig can bdud nas
118a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ni// ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin// lha'i 'u gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med do zhes bya
118a8(dkon brtsegs): gangs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol ga/ gnas da de bzhin gnas min pa// byis pa'i branan rnams la bstan// rang gi nan thugs chud nas// sems can rnams la spyod kyis pa
118b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa la sa 'as pas gsol pa/ smon ca ni ga dag dang/ las 'gra srung bam 'chal ba'i// rgyu rgyo gyis thugs su chung// ya kyag nas kyang rab tu khyen// lu'i thulas la pa las pas gsolag chags da she sa
118b2(dkon brtsegs): / las kyi rgyu zhes khyod kyis mkhyen// gang gis rgyu yis pagyis de 'ang // gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud// lha'i bum pangs pa la mkhas pas gsalag ma 'angs pa yi dus dgan// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba/ 
118b3(dkon brtsegs): dang len pa dang// gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bud ltar byung ba la khyabs gsol pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ sems can rnams dang r+b+ha dang las// gnas dang las kyi len pa rnams// kun kyang 'tshe
118b4(dkon brtsegs): da kyis mkhyen// khu'i bu stobs kyi spod phul gyis gsal pa/ med pang pyod kyis ma gcigs pa'i// las dang tu dag ma mchis te// gnas dang skye ba'angam mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la ma
118b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bas gas la pa/ las dang srA nga de bzhin gnas/ dus la nam ston nam gsum dang // ji myur de mi len pa yang // khyod kyis mnyen pas sred mchod// lha'i bu stongs kyi gagros kyis gsol pa/ myud las dang len pa dang / 
118b6(dkon brtsegs): rna nad rkyen dang gnas// ra ni tha pa cad kyi mkhyen//  kye+e rgyal pa mags pa me // lha'i bas kyis byung gis gas lag rgya mas dang yin pa dang // gnas pa rkyen da nanams dang// rnam na
118b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag rig/ thams cad stong par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs la dka' bas gsol ga/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang gi mngon mkhyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan pa
118b8(dkon brtsegs): kyim rnam pa mas sas rgya sam pa les// gas kyid myed zhems sa ga /  ga / 
119a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par smin pa snyen pa rnams// de kun nga bzhin snang ngonas// se ge'i ngo khyod kyis gang ga// lha'i dri thobs kyirjes su grang bas gsol ga 'jig rten las nen
119a2(dkon brtsegs): ke/ khams ni gang shig srel ga ba/ de dag nang gnyis gtso bosam khyen// debs byed nado rnam/ 'i bu slobs dang ldan kyis gsol ba/ khams gang ni bsan pa rnaMs shi// gang gis mngan par las bkyis
119a3(dkon brtsegs): deyi rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag 'a phags kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen
119a4(dkon brtsegs): sma gisar mo ldangs pa// lha'i bu sgribs sa spyod pas gsal pa/ khams gang la ni brten pagyis shing // bzhes gnyen ci 'dra da gyur nas/ 'du' ci 'drub kyid kur ba// dadag blan med pas mkhyen// lha'i
119a5(dkon brtsegs): byin gyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ stobs kyi byin gyi brlabs mkhyen cing // 'dren pa de ni khams dang ni// 'du 'dzib shes gnyen tshogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis ma byed// lha'i grukhams nges pas nam
119a6(dkon brtsegs): ga/ khams de dang ni len pa dang // bzhes gzhan ded de 'grogs pa// da la khyod kyi mkhyen pa des// dbyer blo tshom yod mi mngag// lha'i su 'ams la rten pas gsol pa/ sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// la'o
119a7(dkon brtsegs): dededang khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog byed kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol ba/ ye shes gang gi khams de ni// 'dren pas mngon par ma
119a8(dkon brtsegs): dmang babs ya da bstar// lha'i sakhams nasanges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ sems gang la ni bstan bgyis na// 'dus byas dag la ji srid gnas// de ni byed kyi ji 'din ma khyen
119b1(dkon brtsegs): thugs pas gsol pa/ 'ams gang la ni snyen dzi // 'tho me das nyid// de da na 'byur//  byod ni mam pas /  bul ma na par shes pa sa ga po drug
119b2(dkon brtsegs): sh-in gyi pas// 'gro // sa rnarnams kyil / ma / 'tsha ma mi jigs pas sa ga sas tshan mag she / 
119b3(dkon brtsegs): bakhyod// napa pa thags pa med la ga//  bul ma lams pas gsol gsas su sa gyur pa // gang ga rnams gnas pa rnams// de ya na pa ngan thod// stan 'dal 'ang khyod kyis pastan/ 
119b4(dkon brtsegs): bye bdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas pa mam shin lags te// de bzhin byapas dang shes dag pa mi ba dregs pa ni me de bzhin // kun ces ni nub pas gsus// lha'i dul dag par 'thong bas gsolapa/ 
119b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs tham sa rgya tshamanapas med// legs panas pa gan // nas 'an sa// de zhen gagags pa rgyad kyi mkhyen// 9'i mas la gnas kyisags lag sa rgyam chos pasto pa
120a1(dkon brtsegs): / kun rdzo na don dpa dang // ba pa dmigs sum mchis so// rgya chu po ge smra ljid kyis gsol ba/ brjod thams na gnan/ chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gnas// yadza mam
120a2(dkon brtsegs): sh+ye/  ma chom kyimatshan ga/ 'i du ma la brtson pas gsal ga de pa/  ba'i sems can nams// gan ci na pagyi'i gnas sa mchis/ mag par na mas sa so// 
120a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis garigs// lha'i rnams pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa// khams gang la ni bsnyen pagyis te/ gang rnams ci 'ad mor byung zheg// 'did chags khams la sdug bsngal pa// de dag su
120a4(dkon brtsegs): 'i bu'i sdug pa las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa des 'byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lbu khre byabs pas
120a5(dkon brtsegs): sa par byung gis gsol ba/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// nes khams ni rab tu byung // des mog pa des 'thung ga/ de dag spyod kyis ji bzhin gshegs// lha'i ru chen 'dis nges par byung gis gsol pa
120a6(dkon brtsegs): la gyis rangs brtags pas na// gte graka 'ams ni sadabyung / dal thos pa des 'ablang ba// dedag khyod kyi madri bzhin zhicigs/ lha'i bug tor bas nges par dang gis gsol pa 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed padag / 
120a7(dkon brtsegs): se sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// del mos pa nges 'byu ga/ de dag thub chen khyod kyis gabanyis// lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol ba/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na/ 
120a8(dkon brtsegs): sa ba 'byung // de sems pas song 'gyur la yos 'dzin pas rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol ga/ 'bor ma na po mas kyi// ci bda'i 'amam sa la snyen papa/ 
120b1(dkon brtsegs): latha phyid pa dang/ khyod kyis ma lus rabatu ma khyed// su bun na tan dung bor byed pas pasol pa/ 'khod ba na ni ba 'or rnabs kyis/ zhag gi sus kun tan dang / mos pa da las gyur pa yang / smad ba med pa khyod kyis garigs/ 
120b2(dkon brtsegs): shA'i budab par ma sa ga ma pa/ se na/ dgis 'ams gas// snyen de skye 'gyung ba 'in tu spyod kyis sa sa byen// dzin gyi rnaM pa ba ma sa// kwa'i bu nga pas da ma gsol pa/ sbyang ba ga shes
120b3(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang // dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyis rab tu mkhyer// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par byung gis gsol ba/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred pa mngon par 'jug pas
120b4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhi par bgyi ba'i dor// de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dang po'i spyod yul gyis gso ba/ dbang pogs car nam dag ni/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dben par 'tshal// srid rnam par gzhig pa yang / 
120b5(dkon brtsegs): nga gnyis dam pas bstun pa mdzad// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa dbang po rtul po dur khrod bsnyen// rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// gang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas pa khyod pa
120b6(dkon brtsegs): bu dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags can dang 'dod chags dang // zhidang shes dang mi shes dang // srid bzhi dang dbang po rnams// nam pan gzegs na sngon ma dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po la gnas pas nas
120b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa li// gnod sems med da ben padag/ dbang rgyal ba snyen pa'i che// spyod kyis 'gro pa'i rnams pa gzigs su su'i bre ma khom brtson pas gsol gan sdang gnyen po byams gsug
120b8(dkon brtsegs): shes nge sa ste//  grang ma nani 'a / de gas chag khyod kyis mabyer// rtswa'i la tshal bas gzil pa gad thams sad rnam pa pa dang /  ma ma
121a1(dkon brtsegs): / dag dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te// des na 'jig rten tu par 'phags// lha bu pa po rjes su drang gis gsol pa/ log par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam byu
121a2(dkon brtsegs): //  gams pa dpar 'gyur ba gzigs// kwa'i bu le shes yang dag ga kyis gsol pa/ do chags zhes gti mugasas// das pa 'dzinas sun pa ste// klog pas ldang ba chen po gyu// de ni grag chen kyang/ 
121a3(dkon brtsegs): emakhyen// skye'i bu me zhes 'dod chags chad pas gas lag/ 'dod chags shesang gti mug dang // mun pa snang ba das po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te// da ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs// lha'i bu sna nga / 
121a4(dkon brtsegs): don gyis gsol pa/ sems can gang gi shes pa gang // de ma yongs su bsgrub bkyis dang // snod du gang cu de snyed ga/ de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// 'i bu dbang po dang zhe 'gras pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs pa
121a5(dkon brtsegs): shes gang gig/ shes pa de la tog pacid pa// de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyed// de bas khyod la mngod par dka'// lha'i bu dbang po la dga' bas gsol pa/ yul dang dus dadu gnas dag dang // spyod pa rnam par bsgom pa dang / 
121a6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs smon slongs rnam dag pa// thub pa khyod kyis skyong bar gzigs// lha'i bu re shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po na rtul 'bring dag dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // btsongs dang par dang zad dang shes/ 
121a7(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rtul po dang // nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang // gdul dang gdul bar bgyid pa dag/ khyod
121a8(dkon brtsegs): / sgra'i drung sa po rnam par bdags kyis gsolapa/ sems can rnams kyim matan dang // na yang su rab na 'ongs pa kholal 'du kyi 'dzin nga ba dang // nam kyang chu pa pyad kyis mthun/ 
121b1(dkon brtsegs): 'ing co pa 'i thugs kyis gsalag shi ti 'dzin pa te// chos kun popa nyid kyis ni// rang zhin med nga byad ci khyer// de san bams cad mthun ce gyi// lhani du stongs kyi na chas gsol pa/ chos nas
121b2(dkon brtsegs): gang dang rang bzhin gang // chos gang gis ni brjod bkyis pa// yang dag bzhin thugs sa chud// desan dus gsum chags mi mnga' a lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par brtags pas kun nyon mongs// rnam pa
121b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag sa khyen// des na khyod la do dram de// lha'i bu stabs zhes kyis gsol pa/ zhon mongs nams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba dang // bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu
121b4(dkon brtsegs): brjen// des na khyod la do tho med// lha'i bu spobs kyi 'ad kyis gsol pa/ 'amam gtan rnam par ldang bdang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang // kun nas nyan mongs nam byang dag/ ming tsam mo zhes spyod kyis pacu
121b5(dkon brtsegs): bu stobs las byung gis gsol ba/ bsam gtan nam thar rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin// bgayod pa las byung ba ste// de la khyod kyis ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gso
121b6(dkon brtsegs): gdapa'i baspyod kyis khyen pa ni// bsam gtan las gas de dag dang // ldang dang rnam par dbyung la 'jug/ de ni drang ltar chags pa med// lha'e 'aldan gyi mtha' la mkhas pas gsal pa/ bskal ba bye ba grangs med du/ 
121b7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs tshe// srid pa'i skyon dang yong ma 'dres// des na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gas la pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// byang chub gzhal yas tshol mdzad cing
121b8(dkon brtsegs): das pa ngas su rung bas // das kya ni dpa bolags// su'i bu khyod khyis pa la tags pa sa gsol pa/ sngon ma thang sbyin pa cwa chags da// thamachog gsung chag polabs pa/ slongs pa rna chags pas
122a1(dkon brtsegs): mnga' bag/ rnam par 'dre pa des de 'byung// lu'i bu sngon gyi mtha' 'a byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad ba byud par rtsa// chul rnams pa ni rgyal ba mas pa// 'jig rten sngod rnams khyod kyis ga gas/ 
122a2(dkon brtsegs): des byad na rgyu ya ngas/ lha'i busrod kyi mthab ca byin pas gso pa/ ston mthar rgyas rgyal mang pol// dpa' bos sngon chad srod ma dpas/ thams cad mkhyen dus par yang // sems can ma la
122a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba/ byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bon btag/ lha'i
122a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul la nges pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye bar brtag mdzad pas// chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen// 'du 'phrod tsam du rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la
122a5(dkon brtsegs): sems pas gsol pa/ bskal bye ba grangs med du// gnas dang gnas min pa mkhyen par// rnam par badren pa spyad mdzad pas// de san 'jig rten mangs mi mnga'o// DI Ta snod kyi mtha' la spyad pas gsol
122a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gnas dang gnas min brten bgyis nas// las dang rgya rnams dpyad pas na// khams dang bang po mas pa dang // risam gtan sngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen// lha'i bu skyon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtog pas gsol
122a7(dkon brtsegs): gastobs kyi la shes rnam bcu 'o// dpa' na chen pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la gcigs// rtswa'i bu nyon gyimatha'i spyod chul kyis gsol ga/ dpa' tha sems can thams cad ci// rnam
122a8(dkon brtsegs): skyes // dge med ge'i rgyu ba rnams// mkhyen pas 'jig rten gas pa mang // lca bu 'on gyi mtha' mi myed pa lam sor rtog sa mi gsol pa/ zub bsngon gyi sems can gyi//  pa pa'i spyod pa
122b1(dkon brtsegs): mam myos pas khye sa// kyi canan sa/ ba rnams pa'i stos na kyis na sa/ nas ba 'bas su// na kyi ma sa btag rjes nga//  la
122b2(dkon brtsegs): /  mgan sa dag mo lags// 'i 'i shes sa mos la sa gsol / la rje T+Te sa/ papa'i sri pas d+hA 9// gang na sanan pa'i ngan tan //  kyi
122b3(dkon brtsegs): 'akA' ma mchis// 'i pa phyi ma'i mtha' mamakhas pas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'didag kri/ smye su tshigs las ldan ga/ shi po skyeb 'gyur ba dag/ ud mis sangs rgyas spyan kyis gnanas
122b4(dkon brtsegs): phyi ba'i mthal las la byung gis gso ga/ rgyag gis ni las ga she// bkyis gling rgyu du pa'i 'byur ba// de dag thams kyid rgyal bas khyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces pagyi// rtswa'i na
122b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzin shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang gis ni sems pa na gang // bskam par kun ci las bgyid pa'i// bag chags las dang sems can da// khyod kyis gsob med par mkhyen// 'a'i bub ci'i pod sted \u0f7f
122b6(dkon brtsegs): ko khyo la //  sa la lagyisapa/  sa /  ma sags pa/ dpa 'a migs pa dang // 'ardza ma pa sa pa la

123a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chags pa gang gis las de rnams// nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyon mongs de dag yang dag ma byen// de bas khyod ni bdag gi mgon// lha'i bu 'grob la mkhas pa sa

124a6(dkon brtsegs): pa bzhin// smra mchog spyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu yongs su rtog pazhi bar byed pas gsol ba/ yongs su rtog par bzhibs// non mengs zad par rab bstan te// mi lam ni ni sprin med ltar// mi mcho bya

124b3(dkon brtsegs): phigs// 'grong dri bzhin tshim par badzad// lha bu'i zhes yid kyis gsol ba/ khyod ci dam pa'i ces myong pa// thos na yid ni dgar 'gyur te// skyil bdagan tho stan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa ma dzang// d+ha
124b4(dkon brtsegs): dngas su dka' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ me long gzugs brnyan snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na// bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo gros nges pas
124b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ thub pa pi bang sgra 'dra ba'i// khyod kyi dam chos thos gyung na// lha bu rnams kyang the tshom bor// rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu snrums tshim gyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dka/ byis pa

124b7(dkon brtsegs): bsta pa de thos na// bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// lha'i bu sbyi ma las nges par byung gis gsol ba/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sku sprul kyang // sbrum lags par 'tshal pas na// de la rmongs par 'gyur ma mches// de bzhin
124b8(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'grob ga shes// lha'i bu tog pa'i rjes su rtog pas gsol ba/ ji ltar brtson pas mi laman// sangs rgyas sdug zugs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam par 'dren pa spyod kyis gcigs

125a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ s+tha ni gang yang ma mchis// swa ni zag cha 'dra ba lags// 'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan// byis pa mang po rab tu btsud// lha'i bu dad tan la mkhas pas gsol la/ chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang //

127b8(dkon brtsegs): thos thung // ded gas ma //  busab mad pas gsol pa/ rkyen gyis ngagacigasung pos nas// skyon gyi sras po pa 'das pa// lus dang srog la ma lta ba // byang chub dan du gcer ba byed// lha'i bug
128a1(dkon brtsegs): sems pa'i groms kyis gsolapa/ rtsub rnam pa'i yang sa kyang byed chos 'a sa// gzhan du sems pa ma mchis pa da/ dul thugs mchog can gyu chu batshal/ lha'i gzhan du
128a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mid 'khyod kyi gsung zas ngas// theg pa gnyis pa sto bgyis shig// lam gzhan du na mi chib/ 
128a3(dkon brtsegs): / nas// sangs rgyas chos sa spyod TI zug/ kun kyang dga' ba sa babyud// lha'i bu stobs pathob pas gsol pa/ 'jigs med byed kyis gsung bzhugs pa// ma spang sras kyis thos blang ma// dedadag spongs pan
128a4(dkon brtsegs): // sangs rgyas nyid las kyi mi 'o// 'i gtu bdags gas pal/ 'jigs med khyod kyis gtu bzhugs pas/ tshan khyod kyi sras kyirnams/  ga // ma de ga
128a5(dkon brtsegs): chol// lha'i bu'idi bum pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis gdung bsgrags pos ga nas// gapa gnyis dpa pa byed pa sras// dga' ni bum pa ma mchis papa// byang chub mchog ni tshol bar bgyid// lha'i bu thags me 'i
128a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsomapa/ khyod kyis gsung bsgrags thos pas na// sems dngas kya cing yid dga' ste// de dag yid ni nam du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad med pas bas pas gsol
128a7(dkon brtsegs): cho ba rnams gangal bsnyen pargyas kyang // dag pa'i phyogs dag mi 'grib cing// de 'i bang bye mi 'dur ba'i// gnas ni us khyod kyis ma khyed// lha'i bu cha sangs par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol ga dag
128b1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs la spyod pa la// khang 'an 'byung ba mi 'gyu na// gnas kyang dang sa zu pas ma byed// de ban ston pa pasnye sa mi mangs// b+ha sum rgyaca zhad lamangs pas gas lag/ dag bkud nas nyon mangs pa// nag zani ts+tshan / 
128b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin to// gyad ci thugs ni des mi gos// gnas kyang med par 'ab bas mkhyen// b+ha'i bu rig pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ nan pa'i chos ni nam du yang // dkang po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par// rigs par bcom ldan
128b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis gsungs// des na bcom ldan pa dag gi zla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rigapas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres par// dpa' 'a chen mo khyod kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na/ 
128b4(dkon brtsegs): dad che phyogs la pa 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i bu lam las bas pas gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la// da ci phyogs na mi 'byung ste// de ltar 'tshal bar mgyur la// bang chad du ni 'gyur ba gas/ 
128b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ibu thar pa 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag po'i phyogs la bsten bgyid na// thar pa 'dod pa mang po yi// bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs// des na rgyal khyad thams cad mkhyer// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsos pa/ 
128b6(dkon brtsegs): sems bral bkyi bar gang 'tshal ba la// kuran nas nyon mongs shes byagapa// dpa' ba chen po khyod kyis gsungs// de khyod 'jig ter mtshad rten lags// lha'i bu nyon mongs mthong gis gsol ba/ kun nas nyon mongs
128b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod ba kyid cig// ku nas nyon mos ma 'tshalan// dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus// de skad pade ba ga shegs pas gsungs// lha'i bu sdig sa mang gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la bsten byas kyang // dgeb ma gyi
128b8(dkon brtsegs): smug/ ded tha chos skal med ces// nang gnyes dam pa khyod kyis gsusus// lha'i bu 'dul bar byabs gsol pa// chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // na nga gte mug 'dul tshodad pas// thub pa'o/ 
129a1(dkon brtsegs): mobs bci 'drag/ dam ba mnan tan la// rgyababru kun nas nyan mongs padag pas gsos pa/ dag dang bun nas nyon mongs pa// mim bas gang rnams mi shes pa/ de dag ston pa yang
129a2(dkon brtsegs): de na dang srong mchog gis gsus// rtswa bubar pa la brtson gyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs 'grib pa pa grang ba'i chos// rgyal ba 'i mni gang bsnyen pa// de bsnyun nag mongs ma rung
129a3(dkon brtsegs): sa// Tha'i bu tha pa las na par phyogs pas gsol pa/ chos ganganan mongs gang gi rnams// ga byung chu bas bstan pa la// yang dag 'artson bya mi 'a cos// rgol pa 'di de song mi dmigs/ 
129a4(dkon brtsegs): 'byor la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyi nyan thos la// gang gi don du chos bstan pa// de brtson pa kyis pas mi 'thob ces// 'dir khyod la rgom ma mchig/ lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gso
129a5(dkon brtsegs): dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad par mi ku shel// khyod la rgol ba long ma mchis// lha'i bu 'grob med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/ shin tu bsnyengs pa mim
129a6(dkon brtsegs): gan da byams gas pa// de bsgrubs pal pa sa spya //  mas spyod pa ni sa la mchil//  bu mi rnam pa gis gsol pa/ shes rab gti sngags kyi gyi// gsungs pa
129a7(dkon brtsegs): bsten bkyis kyang // gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// 'dir khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni// dbugs dbyung rngub pa drams
129a8(dkon brtsegs): dal 'artson 'byas bgags/ de byed 'anol ma mchis// rtswa'i bum chan ma bdab gyung med pas gsal ba/ ba'o rnam pa spa sa dang // rtang nad kyang kyis bka'aphrul te// dpe da gis rus
129b1(dkon brtsegs): spyon pa rgol ma mches// lha'i 'u 'o snyam pa'i rgyal rdzas kyis 'asol pa/ bsnam pargyal spang swAd du// mtshan ma med pa rjod kyis gsus// bsnyen kyang shib mi bku nas// 'das tshang na las
129b2(dkon brtsegs): nus mas rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ sdug pa'i bsam pas dag pa yi// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// des ni nyon mongs mi zad ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma ma
129b3(dkon brtsegs): rab shig gis gsol pa/ phyogs gang la nyeran po'i rnam pa dang // non mongs lam dang lam 'jug pa// bdegs pa med par rgol ba ni// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bub spang shin du shes la gsol ba/ 
129b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gas dang phyogs min dang // bad nga ma zad pa'ad tsam// 'jigs pa ma mchis nod 'byid pa// thub pa de de ming tsam mo// ltu du lus kye las dul bas gsol pa/ mkhyen pas yongs sus khyen du nas// 
129b5(dkon brtsegs): su mi phrin las 'jug/ thams cadam lus mkhyen pas na// des na 'dren pa thams cad mabyed// lha'i bu lus kyems yongs su shes pal gsol pa/ sems can nams la thugs bce ba/ 
129b6(dkon brtsegs): / mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags// 'jig rten mgon 'dug kyang 'tshal// la'i 'u lus kyi las shin tu nges pas gsal pa/ yul phrin las dbangs par// lus can ku la smad slad du// 'jig ci
129b7(dkon brtsegs): mdad // des ga khyod ni gang gas chog/ lha'i bu lus pa las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong ba sa gsol pa/ sems cad kun la sman spang dr-i// 'arjed pa thams cad mkhyen pa re// sras nas las dag dang
129b8(dkon brtsegs): legs par yangasas brtags pa sa//  bu kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas gsol ba/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag sru nga // sku phrin pas rnam da// sA pa sems can pa
130a1(dkon brtsegs): 1ra na 8/  ma ldan yod naldan // rtsub yos sa shig tug/  lashin / na
130a2(dkon brtsegs): sa/ sa pa da/ sa na khyod pas sa gyung/  gsapa za pa du
130a3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa rnams su brdzun pa gsungs// de bas khyod kyi grags pa bar// 'jigatan gan thogs ma mchis// byas bu lang dag par skabs gsol ba/ 'di ltar 'gro 'thams cad cang // sas rgyas chis rnams
130a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang// nang gnyis dam pa khyod kyil ma khyed// lha'i bu yang dag pa la rdul bas gsol ba/ 'dus byas dag gi chos kyi rnams// yang dag ji bzhin pa lta ba dang // chos rnams yang na
130a5(dkon brtsegs): na ti byab// mi mi dbang pas rab ta ma byed// lha'i bulas patog pas gsor pa/ ye shes yongs su dag pa yis// bdag nyid dang ni gagan dag gi/ chog gi las kyang rab tu ma khyer// sa na rgyal ba ma nyamam
130a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi la rtog pas gsol pa/ mi dbang po'i thugs kyi las// de snyed gang dag 'jug pa ni// de dag 'phral lugs rjes 'jug/ 'gro ba na khyod la phyag kyang 'cham// lha'i bu yid benas
130b1(dkon brtsegs): ga la gabs pas gsol pa/ gro 'khrugs skyed nas ni// gang sa byad ni spyod ma dag/ de bathug nasul bar byung // gro na ston la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha zungs lam labs gsasapa/ 'brang 'a
130b2(dkon brtsegs): dam gyud nas// rnam 'as thas kyi srin las 'jug/ ma pa la shes ga ni// mkhyen bani nga rgya // l+h+wa gu yo napa pa shig gis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sa dang mid ci las/ 
130b3(dkon brtsegs): /  rjes garigs pas 'byung // sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas pas gsoram/ sbyi da tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus pa
130b4(dkon brtsegs): tan dag la yang // gang gis gang ma ldan spyad pa/ sdor mi dus kyang rab tum khyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la rtag pas gsal pa/ bya chub mchog ni tshol mdzad cang // gang bu byed kyis ldan srudapa/ 
130b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas brtags nas// sangs rgyas bye ba ra' rdza ma khyed// lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa byed grangs med du// gang du khyod kyis sngon sprad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdza
130b6(dkon brtsegs): zugs yid dkyigs mi ma la// lha'i bu ldan gyi rgyal la yongs su rtag pas gas la pa/ rangs rgyas ma khas grang ba yi// ting 'din ldan par bka 'byub// seM rnaMs bya bgrangs medal// rnam pa
130b7(dkon brtsegs): byas dus// lha'i bu sngon gyi skor ba las nges pa dang gis gsol pa/ sngon kyi sangs rgyas drung dgatu// zangs med pag tu med pa ye// ting 'dzin sgongadag 'dran pa yis// lus ni bsgom mang par dag
130b8(dkon brtsegs): kyiganas brteg pas gsol pa/ mthor ba'i nyes par mang dang // 'dud nimam pasnamags dang/ gzigs pas sems can rnams la ston// sems can yang rnams kyang 'akrol/ 
131a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi sun khrul pas gsal pa/ gzha dang gzhan dgazos gang 'tshal//  d+hi rab tu dga' ba bsdig/ gnod pa mi ba bgyis bdag/ gzhan dang gzhan yang pyod kyis gtsigs/ 
131a2(dkon brtsegs): mA dag par byung bas gsolapa/  kyi 'grotags pa// da kyi'i shes sa dus kyi// 'du mas su gan rdzos da/ dmas
131a3(dkon brtsegs): baphyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gso pa/ 'dun pakhyod kyis khyen pa ni// mdongs dus kyi 'chi 'apo dang// skyed nga las kyin ma rmim/ zags par bkru ba ma mtsham // lha'i bum mas
131a4(dkon brtsegs): dngul gyis gsol pa/ brten pa 'thob mkhas khyod kyi// mkhyen pa byi dus sems can gyi// bsam dang las kyi 'bras bu ngang// 'arlob rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las bskyod kyis
131a5(dkon brtsegs): salab// khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsus kun la mkhas khyod kyi// ye shes mchog ni mi chags te// srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis ma khyed// lha'i bu ba snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ 
131a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can / nas na byang // dad khams sa meng ma// gangs kyis dam pa bstan pa yas// 'a seM byung la bas pa ga ga
131a7(dkon brtsegs): / ngas snang b.lags ma mchis/ 'as me 'das rgyas shing nas ni// 'dig rten ma gnapas rabs kyi// lha'ings subyu ba 'inam par spyod pa la gsol pa/ ma ma cosan
131a8(dkon brtsegs): 'bram tshangs byed pa// dus gsum dam po ma mchis par// des par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs// lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing // nga nyid
131b1(dkon brtsegs): nas te// da ma yomams cad ngas med papa// rnam par brjen sa kyis gshegs// khwa'i bdus gsum mngon par bsngal pas gsol pa/ 'das bdag dang ma'ongs dang // dalta ba po rnams// mamatsham
131b2(dkon brtsegs): 'i bya chags med byed kyis gsal pa/ dus ga pa sems can thams cad la// snyi mo mchis pa ma bstan te// snam grib tu mig yong dang// thag
131b3(dkon brtsegs): chu grod kyis bstan// lha'i ba dus gsum dadog gis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyi mkhyen pa de// dus gsum po dag kun du yang// spum lta bur ma khyed pas na/ khyad kyi dbang ba chags ma mnga'// lha'i bu mos pa
131b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nu pa khyod ces// bya sgrub mang dug kyis bya la/ de du tu chang mos pal// bri bar gyur bar yang mi gdag// lha'i bu mos pa lang dag thob kyis gsol
131b5(dkon brtsegs): ga nyen sgron ma'i thos pa ni// bar dun chad ni bzla te// rtag par khyod kyi mos pa des// kod kyi sras rnams mos pa che// b+ha'i bu mos pas mngon 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad mang
131b6(dkon brtsegs): / myong rnamos pas madrod du 'phags// 'jig rten dgagis mgos te// pad ma chab kyis de bzhin no// lha bu mos pas yongs su grol gyis gso sopa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni// chos kyi skye
131b7(dkon brtsegs): nas rjod pas// gnyis me gnyis su 'i ma mchis// dang ba med pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ kwa'i 'arjid chen po rtson 'grus kyis// bya chu da
131b8(dkon brtsegs): dris par byad// dang yang kyang mad pa bya// lan krub btang ba 'ongos pa dang / nya'i bungan pa phun su mtshogs pas gsol pa/ dpa' bcan pa 'dagos pa'i// thams pad bun cings phul // 
132a1(dkon brtsegs): mad mangs man sa kyang // gos ya sachis// 'i byams nya pa gas gsol / mnan rtag rgyas nyam pagag sa// sems ca rnams kyi
132a2(dkon brtsegs): bya 'gyis //  rnam kyi pan sa s+ho/  gsopa/ namatha sa sbyin kyisam rnas pas// margyas
132a3(dkon brtsegs): sa ni// rnam grom yongs su nyams mi mngal/ 'i bunam thor rgyal pa'i ye shes la brtson pas gsol ba/ thu la khyod nas thol nas//  da das byed pa pa na// nam grol legs gzigs pa ni// ya
132a4(dkon brtsegs): //  sa kyi srid nam pang byed kyis ni mags nga ldan dang//  'gro dag migs kyid pa// rlos 'phrul pa mi ma // de nas ngas rgyas lags shes brtsod/ 
132a5(dkon brtsegs): spyod pas gsolag srog chags gzha dag / di bzhin du/ bde gshegs spyod la chags mi ma ba// chos kyi rang bzhin pa skyen pas// rang bzhid de la mongs mi ma la// shA'i bu mo gros yangs pas gas la pa/ thams cad
132a6(dkon brtsegs): bakhyod la ni// rnam pa kun du bsnyel ma mnga'// mgon po'i dgongs pa nyer gzhag pas// thub pa 'brumar snod dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten smon ma khyod la ni// mnyam par ma bzhags
132a7(dkon brtsegs): mang ga/ ma rgyas sangs rgyas chob 'i rnam pa/ khrogacags kun gyis shes pa dad / 'a/ lta bus zhes pa tu ga na kyis gsol ga de bar gshegs pa khyod la ni/ btags da stoms mim skye me'i dag sems
